60b2('bum): rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// ke'u
60b3('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba batha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de cim
60b4('bum): phyir zhe na/ ka 'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// ke'u shi ka sa'i khams mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems
60b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar sa'i khams kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dpags so// ke
60b6('bum): shi ka chu'i khams mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar
60b7('bum): chu'i khams kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// ke'u shi ka ma'i khams mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha
61a1('bum): yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'dir ltar me'i khams kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// ke'u shi ka rlung gi khams mtha' yas
61a2('bum): ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar rlung gi khams kyi mtha' dang
61a3('bum): dbus mi dmigs so// ke'u shi ka nam mkha'i khams mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de
61a4('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar nam mkha'i khams kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// ke'u shi ka rnam par shes pa'i khams mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems
61a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi mtha' dang dbus
61a6('bum): mi dmigs so// ke'u shi ka ma rig pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
61a7('bum): ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar ma rig pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// ke'u shi ka 'du byed mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol
61b1('bum): tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'du byed kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// ke'u shi ka rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir
61b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnams par shes pa'i mtha' dang dbus
61b3('bum): mi dmigs so// ke'u shi ka ming dang gzugs mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i
61b4('bum): phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar ming dang gzugs kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// ke'u shi ka skye mched drug mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems
61b5('bum): dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar skye mched drug gi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// ke'u shi ka
61b6('bum): reg mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mthas yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar reg pa'i
61b7('bum): mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// ke'u shi ka tshor ba mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin 'di mtha' las pa ste/ de tsa
62a1('bum): phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar tshor ba'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// ke'u shi ka sred pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
62a2('bum): rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar srid pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// ke'u shi ka len pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems
62a3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mthas yas pa snyed ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar len pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// ke'u shi ka srid pa mtha' yas pa'i
62a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar srid pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// ke'u shi ka skye
62a5('bum): ba mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar skye ba'i mtha' dang dbus mi da
62a6('bum): so// ke'u shi karga shi mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar rga shi'i mtha
62a7('bum): dang dbus mi dmig so// ki'u shi ka sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke
62b1('bum): 'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar byen pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// ke'u shi ka tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
62b2('bum): rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe ne/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// ke'u shi ka bzod pa'i pha rol
62b3('bum): tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin/
62b4('bum): pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// ke'u shi ka brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas
62b5('bum): ba ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtha' dang dbus mo gsogs so// ke'u shi ka bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir
62b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtha' dang dbus
62b7('bum): mi dmigs so// ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
62b8('bum): ke'u shi ka don 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// ke'u shi ka nang stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
63a1('bum): chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar nang stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//
63a2('bum): ke'u shi ka phyi stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di
63a3('bum): ltar byi stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// ke'u shi ka phyi nang stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
63a4('bum): mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar phyi stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// ke'u shi ka stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub
63a5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// /
63a6('bum): ke'u shi ka chen po stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar
63a7('bum): chen po stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// ke'u shi ka don dam pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha'
63b1('bum): yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// ke'u shi ka 'dus byas stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems
63b2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//
63b3('bum): ke'u shi ka 'dus byas stong pa nyid batha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di
63b4('bum): ltar 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// ke'u shi ka mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
63b5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// ke'u shi ka thog ma dang
63b6('bum): tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar tho
63b7('bum): ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// ke'u shi ka dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha
64a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// ke'u shi
64a2('bum): ka rang bzhin stong pa nyid maza' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di
64a3('bum): ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus pa dmigs so// ke'u shi ka chos thams cad stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi
64a4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// ke'u shi ka rang gi mtshan nyid
64a5('bum): stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar rang gi mtshan
64a6('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// ke'u shi ka mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu
64a7('bum): phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// ke'u shi ka dngos po med pa stong pa nyid
64b1('bum): mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar dngos po med pa stong pa nyid
64b2('bum): kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// ke'u shi ka ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas
64b3('bum): ba ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// ke'u shi ka dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i
64b4('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar dngos po med pa rdo za nyid stong
64b5('bum): pa nyid pa kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// ke'u shi ka dran pa nye bar gzhag pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin
64b6('bum): ba 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// ke'u shi ka yang dag par spong ba
64b7('bum): mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar yang dag pa
65a1('bum): spong ba rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// ke'u shi ka rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa mtha' yas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
65a2('bum): chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus pi dmigs so// ke
65a3('bum): shi ka dbang po mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar
65a4('bum): dbang po rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// ke'u shi ka stobs mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' ya
65a5('bum): ba ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar stobs rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// ke'u shi ka byang chub kyi yan lag mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
65a6('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmig
65a7('bum): so ke'u shi ka 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/
65b1('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'phags pa'i lam lag brgyad pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// ke'u shi ka 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mtha' yas pa'i/
65b2('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi mtha'
65b3('bum): dang dbus mi dmigs so// ke'u shi ka bsam gtan mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir/
65b4('bum): zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar bsam gtan darbA kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// ke'u shi ka tshad med pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
65b5('bum): po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar tshad med pa rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// gi gzugs med pa'i snyoms
65b6('bum): par 'jug pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar gzugs
65b7('bum): med pa'i stobs par 'jug pa rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// ke'u shi ka rnams par mthar pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi
66a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam par thar pa rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// /
66a2('bum): ke'u shi ka mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/
66a3('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// ke'u shri ka rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
66a4('bum): dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi
66a5('bum): ka de ni 'di ltar rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshon ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// ke'u shi ka mngon par shes pa mtha' yas phyir byang chub
66a6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar mngon par shes pa rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus mi
66a7('bum): dmigs so// ke'u shi ka ting nge 'dzin mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
66b1('bum): ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// ke'u shi ka gzungs kyi sgo mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
66b2('bum): rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// ke'u shi ka de bzhin
66b3('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni
66b4('bum): 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// ke'u shi ka mi 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
66b5('bum): chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// ke'u shi ka sos
66b6('bum): yang dag par rig pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar so so yang
66b7('bum): dag par rig pa rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// ke'u shi ka byams pa chen po mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sem dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
67a1('bum): pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar byams pa chen po'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// ke'u shi ka snying rje
67a2('bum): chen po mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar snying rje chen po'i mtha' dang
67a3('bum): dbus mi dmigs so// ke'u shi ka sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/
67a4('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// ke'u shi ka thams cad shes pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang
67a5('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar thams cad shes pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus mi
67a6('bum): dmigs so// ke'u shi ka lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rjes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir
67a7('bum): zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so// ke'u shi ka rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems
67b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus mi
67b2('bum): dmigs so// ke'u shi ka rnams grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gzugs mtha' yas pa dang / tshor ba mtha' yas pa dang /
67b3('bum): 'du shes mtha' yas pa dang / 'du byed mtha' yas pa dang / rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa dang / mig mtha' yas pa dang / rna ba mtha' yas pa dang / sna mtha' yas pa dang /
67b4('bum): lce mtha' yas pa dang / lus mtha' yas pa dang / yid mtha' yas pa dang / gzugs mtha' yas pa dang / sgra mtha' yas pa dang / dri mtha' yas pa dang / ro mtha' ya
67b5('bum): pa dang / reg mtha' yas pa dang / chos mtha' yas pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes
67b6('bum): pa mtha' yas pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa dang / mig gi 'dus
67b7('bum): te reg pa mtha' yas pa dang // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mtha' yas pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa mtha' mas pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa mtha' yas pa dang / lus kyi
67b8('bum): 'dus te reg pa mtha' yas pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mtha' yas pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mtha' yas pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
68a1('bum): tshor ba mtha' yas pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mtha' yas pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mtha' yas pa dang /
68a2('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mtha' yas pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mtha' yas pa dang / sa'i khams mtha' yas pa dang / chu'i khams
68a3('bum): mtha' yas pa dang / me'i khams mtha' yas pa dang / rlung gi khams mtha' yas pa dang / nam mkha'i khams mtha' yas pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams mtha' yas
68a4('bum): ba dang ma rig pa mtha' yas pa dang / 'du byed mtha' yas pa dang / rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa dang / ming dang gzugs mtha' yas pa dang / skye mched drug mtha'
68a5('bum): yas pa dang / reg pa mtha' yas pa dang / tshor ba mtha' yas pa dang / sred pa mtha' yas pa dang / len pa mtha' yas pa dang / srid pa mtha' yas pa dang / skye ba mtha' yas
68a6('bum): pa dang / rga shi mtha' yas pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mtha'
68a7('bum): yas pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa dang /
68b1('bum): nang stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / byi nang stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / chen po stong pa
68b2('bum): nyid mtha' yas pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / mtha' las
68b3('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / thog ma dang ba med pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid pa mtha'
68b4('bum): yas pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / dngos po
68b5('bum): med pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams
68b6('bum): mtha' yas pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams mtha' yas pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mtha' yas pa dang / dbang po rnams mtha' yas pa dang / stobs rnams
68b7('bum): mtha' yas pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mtha' yas pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mtha' yas pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mtha'
69a1('bum): pa dang / bsam gtan rnams mtha' yas pa dang / tshad med pa rnams mtha' yas pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mtha' yas
69a2('bum): pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad mtha' yas pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mtha' yas pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa
69a3('bum): dang smon pa med pa mtha' yas pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams mtha' yas pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams mtha' yas pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams mtha' yas pa dang / de bzhin
69a4('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mtha' yas pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi mtha' yas pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi mtha' yas pa dang / byams pa chen po mtha' yas pa
69a5('bum): dang / snying rje chen po mtha' yas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mtha' yas pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mtha' yas pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong /
69a6('bum): pa'i 'bras bu mtha' yas pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mtha' yas pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / rang byang chub mtha' yas pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes
69a7('bum): pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir mtha' yas pa ste/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang
69b1('bum): dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// brgya
69b2('bum): byin gyis smras pa/ btsum pa rab 'byor de rnam pa gang gis na dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas
69b3('bum): ba ste/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin zhes bya/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ke'u shi ka rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ bya
69b4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa dang / de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang chos dmig
69b5('bum): pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// brgya byin
69b6('bum): gis smras pa btsun pa rab 'byor de rnam pa gang yin na/ dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha'
69b7('bum): yas pa ste/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin zhes bya rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ ke'u shi ka chos kyi dbyings mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems
70a1('bum): dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa ste/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang de bzhin nyid dang /
70a2('bum): dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
70a3('bum): brgya byin gis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de rnam pa gang gis na dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
70a4('bum): mtha' yas pa ste/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin zhes bya rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar de bzhin nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir dmigs mtha'
70a5('bum): yas so// dmigs mtha' yas pa'i phyir de bzhin nyid mtha' yas so// ke'u shi ka de bzhin nyid dang dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dang
70a6('bum): chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas so// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha ro
70a7('bum): tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas so// brgya byin gis smras pa btsun pa rab 'byor de rnam pa gang gis na sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
70b1('bum): rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa yin zhes bya rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ 'di lta ste sems can sems zhes bya ba de chos gang gi
70b2('bum): tshig bla dgas yin/ brgya byin gis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de ni chos kyi tshig bla dgas kyang ma yin/ chos ma yin pa'i tshig bla dgas kyang ma yin te/ 'di ltar sem
70b3('bum): can zhes bya ba 'di ni blo bur du ming du btags pa/ dngos po med par ming du btags pa/ dmigs pa med par ming du btags pa'o// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ke'u shi ka de
70b4('bum): ji snyam du sems/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las sems can du bshad pa gang yang yod dam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de ni med do// btsun pa rab 'byor
70b5('bum): kyis smras pa/ ke'u shi ka gang la sems can du bshad pa gang yang med pa de la sems can mtha' yas pa yod de/ ke'u shi ka gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
70b6('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bskal pa gang gi klung gi bye ma snyed du bzhugs te/ sems can sems can zhes bya ba gsung du brjod na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ de la sems can gang
70b7('bum): skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ba yod dam/ smras pa btsun pa rab 'byor de ni med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can thog ma nas rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ ke'u
71a1('bum): / shi ka de ltar rnam grangs des na sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas par rig par bya'o// de nas dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha
71a2('bum): mas dang/ skye dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang skyes pa dang / byad med du bcas pa dag gis lan gsum du ched du brjod pa mched du brjod de/ gang gnas brtan rang rab 'byor gyis
71a3('bum): 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba'i don tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus bshad cing brjod de bstan pa'i chos 'di ni kye ma legs par
71a4('bum): bshad do// kye ma chos 'di ni legs par bshad do// kye ma chos kyi chos nyid ni legs par bshad do// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
71a5('bum): gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang ma bral ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du bzung bar bgyi'o// chos gang yang dmigs pa ma mchis te/ gzugs sam/ tshor ba 'am/ 'du
71a6('bum): shes sam/ 'du byed dam/ rnam par shes pa 'am/ mig gam/ rna ba 'am/ sna 'am/ lce 'am/ lus sam/ yid dam/ gzugs sam/ sgra 'am/ dri 'am/ ro 'am/ reg gam/ chos
71a7('bum): sam/ mig gi rnam par shes pa 'am/ rnamigam par shes pa 'am/ sna'i rnam par shes pa 'am/ lce'i rnam par shes pa 'am/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa 'am/ yid kyi rnam par shes
71b1('bum): pa 'am/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa 'am/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'am/ yid kyi 'dus reg pa
71b2('bum): 'am mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'am/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'am/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'am/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
71b3('bum): gyis tshor ba 'am/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyi tshor ba 'am/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyi tshor ba 'am/ sa'i khams sam/ chu'i khams sam/ me'i khams sam/ rlung gi
71b4('bum): khams sam/ nam mkha'i khams sam/ rnam par shes pa'i khams sam/ ma rig pa 'am/ 'du byed dam/ rnam par shes pa 'am/ ming dang gzugs sam/ skye mched drug gam/ reg
71b5('bum): pa 'am/ tshor ba 'am/ sred pa 'am/ len pa 'am/ srid pa 'am/ skye ba 'am/ rga shi 'am/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ bzod pa'i pha rol
71b6('bum): tu phyin pa 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ nang stong pa nyid dam/ phyi stong pa nyid dam/ byin
71b7('bum): stong pa nyid dam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dam/ chen po stong pa nyid dang/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dpa/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dam/ mtha' las 'das
72a1('bum): pa stong pa nyid dam/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dam/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid dam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam/
72a2('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dam/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dran pa nye bar
72a3('bum): bzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags
72a4('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad med pa rnams sam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jugs pa rnams sam/
72a5('bum): rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa 'am/ mngon par shes pa
72a6('bum): rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ mi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sa
72a7('bum): byams pa chen po 'am/ snying rje chen po 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i
72b1('bum): 'bras bu 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid dang/ rang byang chub 'am/ thams cad shes pa nyid dam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dam/ chos gang yang /
72b2('bum): dmig su ma mchis kyis kyang theg pa gsum rnams dgod pa mchis te/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
72b3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po dang bcas pa rnams la bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de bzhin no// chos gang yang
72b4('bum): dmigs su med do// gzugs sam/ tshor ba'am/ 'du shes sam/ 'du byed dam/ rnam par shes pa 'am/ mig gas/ rna ba 'am/ sna 'am/ lce 'am/ lus sam/ yid dam/
72b5('bum): gzugs sam/ zla 'am/ dri 'am/ ro 'am/ reg gam/ chos sam/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'am/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa 'am/ sna'i rnam par shes pa 'am/ lce'i rnam par
72b6('bum): shes pa 'am/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'am/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'am/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/ lce'i 'dus
72b7('bum): te reg pa 'am/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa 'am/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa 'am/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'am/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'am/ sna
73a1('bum): @'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'am/ lce'i 'dus te regs pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'am/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'am/ yid kyi
73a2('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'am/ sa'i khams sam/ chu'i khams sam/ me'i khams sam/ rlung gi khams sam/ nam mkha'i khams sam/ rnam par shes pa'i kham
73a3('bum): sam/ ma rig pa 'am/ 'du byed dam/ rnam par shes pa 'am/ ming dang gzugs 'am/ skye mched drug gam/ reg pa 'am/ tshor ba 'am/ sred pa 'am/ len pa 'am/ srid
73a4('bum): pa'am/ skye ba'am/ rga shi 'am/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
73a5('bum): bam bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ nang stong pa nyid dam/ phyi stong pa nyid dam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
73a6('bum): dam/ chen po stong pa nyid dam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dam/ 'du byas stong pa nyid dang/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dam/ thog ma dang ma
73a7('bum): ma med pa stong pa nyid dam/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid dam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ngam/ mi dmigs pa stong /
73b1('bum): pa nyid dam/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams
73b2('bum): sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/ 'phags
73b3('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams sam/ bsam gtan chen rnams sam/ tshad med pa rnams sam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jugs pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ mthar
73b4('bum): kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa 'am/ mngon par shes pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin
73b5('bum): rnams sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ mi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ byams pa chen
73b6('bum): po 'am/ snying rje chen po 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras/
73b7('bum): bu'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid ngam/ rang byang chub 'am/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dam/ chos gang yang mi dmigs mod kyi/ theg/
74a1('bum): / pa gsum rnam par dgod pa yang yod de/ gsum gang zhe na/ nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs/
74a2('bum): ba'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'o// lha'i bu dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang ma bral ba de ni de
74a3('bum): bzhin gshegs pa nyid du gzung bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan te/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'a
74a4('bum): ltar nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa bshad do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so//
74a5('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmig so//
74a6('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa
74a7('bum): mi dmigs so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// nang stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi
74b1('bum): dmigs so// phyi stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// byi nang stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// stong
74b2('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// chen po stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// don dam pa stong
74b3('bum): pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// 'du byas stong pa nyid las gan yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// 'dum byas stong pa nyid/
74b4('bum): las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// thog ma dang tha ma
74b5('bum): med pa stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang gshegs pa mi dmigs so// rang bzhin stong pa
74b6('bum): nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong
74b7('bum): pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa
75a1('bum): stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmig so//
75a2('bum): dngos po med pa ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// dran pa nye bar bzhags pa rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmig so// /
75a3('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// /
75a4('bum): dbang po rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// stobs rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
75a5('bum): las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// 'phags pa'i
75a6('bum): bden pa rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// bsam gtan rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// tshad med pa rnams
75a7('bum): las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// rnam
75b1('bum): par thar pa rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jugs pa rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa/
75b2('bum): mig dmigs so// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med dang smon pa med pa las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// mngon par shes pa rnams las
75b3('bum): gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// ting nge 'dzin rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs mi dmigs so// gzungs kyi sgo rnams las gzhan du yang
75b4('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// mi 'jigs pa rnams
75b5('bum): las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// byabs pa chen
75b6('bum): po las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// snying rje chen po las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
75b7('bum): rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// thams cad shes pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// lam gyi rnam pa
76a1('bum): shes pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa
76a2('bum): mi dmigs so// / bam po lnga pa// / lha'i bu dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos 'di dag thams cad slob ste/ sbyin pa'i pha
76a3('bum): rol tu phyin pa la slab po// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob bo// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slob bo// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob bo// bsam gtan
76a4('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob bo// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob bo// nang stong pa nyid la slob bo// byi stong pa nyid la slob po// byinang stong pa nyid la slob bo// stong pa nyid sto/
76a5('bum): ba nyid la slob bo// chen po stong pa nyid la slob bo// don dam pa stong pa nyid la slob bo// 'dus byas stong pa nyid la slong po// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la slob bo// mtha' las/
76a6('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid la slob bo// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la slob bo// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la slob bo// rang bzhin stong pa nyid la slob bo// chos thams cad stong pa nyid
76a7('bum): la slob so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la slob po// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la slab so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo// dngos
76b1('bum): po meng pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la slob po// yang dag par spong ba rnams la slob bo// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la slob bo// dbang po rnams
76b2('bum): pa slob bo// stobs rnams la slob bo// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la slob bo// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la slob bo// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la slob bo//
76b3('bum): gtan rnams la slob bo// ched med pa rnams la slob bo// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la slob bo// rnam par thar pa rnams la slob bo// mthar gyis gnas pa'i
76b4('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la slob bo// rnam par mthar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa la slob bo// mngon par shes pa rnams la slob bo// ting nge 'dzin rnams
76b5('bum): la slob bo// gzungs kyi sgo rnams la slob bo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la slob bo// mi 'jigs pa rnams la slob po// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la slob
76b6('bum): po/ byams pa chen po la slob po// snying rje chen po la slob po// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la slob po// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la slob po// lan cig/
76b7('bum): phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la slob po// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la slob bo// dgra bcom pa nyid la slob bo// rang byang chub la slob po// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la slob
77a1('bum): kya/ po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob po// lha'i bu dag de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di/
77a2('bum): dang mi 'bral bar spyod pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ces bya ste/ lha'i bu dag gang gi tshe nga de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyi zham 'bris
77a3('bum): byed cing / rgyal po'i khab pad mo'i yod pa'i nang gi tshong 'dus kyi dbus na 'dug pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur to// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar
77a4('bum): ma gyur to// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur to// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur to// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur/
77a5('bum): to/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur to// nang stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to// phyi stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to// phyi nang stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma
77a6('bum): gyur to// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to// chen po stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to// don dam pa stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to// 'dus byas stong pa nyid
77a7('bum): bral bar ma gyur to// 'dus ma byas stong ldang bar ma gyur to// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to//
77b1('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to// rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang bral bar gyur to// chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa
77b2('bum): nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang bral bar
77b3('bum): ma gyur to// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to// yang dag par spong ba rnams dang bral bar ma
77b4('bum): gyur to// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to// dbang po rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to// stobs rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
77b5('bum): dang bral bar ma gyur to// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang bral bar ma gyur to// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to// bsam gtan rnams dang bral bar ma
77b6('bum): gyur to// tshad med pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to// rnam par mthar pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to//
77b7('bum): mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to// rnam par sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med dang smon pa med pa dang bral bar ma gyur to// mngon par shes
78a1('bum): pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to// ting nge 'dzin rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to// gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to// de bzhin gshegs
78a2('bum): pa'i stobs rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to// mi 'jigs pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to// so so yang dag par rigs pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to// byams pa chen po dang
78a3('bum): bral bar ma gyur to// snying rje chen po dang bral bar ma gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to// de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi
78a4('bum): chos tshad med pa gzhan dag dang yang bral bar ma gyur to// lha'i bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyis/ nga la khyen
78a5('bum): khyod ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi bskal pa grangs med pa na/ bskal pa bzang po che/ 'jigs rten gyi khams 'di nyid du shag kya thub pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra macom pa yang dag
78a6('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen pa dang rkang par ldan par bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ bla na med pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba lnga dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs
78a7('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur ro zhes bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du lung ston to// de nas lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
78b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di/ de ltar gzugs mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / tshor ba mi len mi 'dor/
78b2('bum): ba'i tshul dang / 'du shes mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / 'du byed mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / mig mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul
78b3('bum): dang / rna ba mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / sna mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / lce mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / lus mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / yid mi len mi 'dor
78b4('bum): ba'i tshul dang / gzugs mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang // zla mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / dri mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / ro mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / reg
78b5('bum): len gi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / chos mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rna ba'i rnams par shes pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i/
78b6('bum): tshul dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /
78b7('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / sna'i 'dus
79a1('bum): te reg pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /
79a2('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mi len mi
79a3('bum): 'dor ba'i tshul dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / lus kyi
79a4('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / sa'i khams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / chu'i
79a5('bum): khams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / me'i khams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rlung gi khams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / nam mkha'i khams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /
79a6('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / ma rig pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / 'du byed mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i
79a7('bum): tshul dang / ming dang gzugs mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / skye mched drug mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / reg pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / tshor ba mi len mi 'dor ba'i
79b1('bum): tshul dang / sred pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / len pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / srid pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / skye ba mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rga/
79b2('bum): shi mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / bzod pa'i
79b3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa mi len mi 'ang ba'i tshul dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /
79b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu bla mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / nang stong pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / phyi stong pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid mi
79b5('bum): len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / chen po stong pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid mi len mi
79b6('bum): 'dor ba'i tshul dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid nga len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi
79b7('bum): len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rang bzhin stong
80a1('bum): pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul
80a2('bum): dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /
80a3('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid pa len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams mi len gyi
80a4('bum): 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rdzu 'bral gyi rkang pa rnams mi len mo 'dor ba'i tshul dang / dbang po rnams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / stobs rnams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /
80a5('bum): byang chub kyi yan lan rnams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mi len mi 'dor
80a6('bum): ba'i tshul dang / bsam gtan rnams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / tshad med pa rnams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jugs pa rnams mi len
80a7('bum): mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rnam par mthar pa rnams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnam mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rnam par thar
80b1('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / mngon par shes pa rnams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams mi len mi 'don
80b2('bum): nga'i tshul dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi 'dor mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams mi len mi 'dod
80b3('bum): ba'i tshul dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang // byams po chen po rnams mi 'thar ba'i tshul dang // snying rje chen po mi len mi 'dong ba'i tshul dang /
80b4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi len mi 'dong ba'i tshul dang / thams cad shes pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul
80b5('bum): dang rna ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi 'dor ba'i tshul gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'thun par yongs su 'dzin pa
80b6('bum): ni ngo mtshar che'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dang dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor bzhi dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
80b7('bum): rnams dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i bu dang // 'tshe ma'i lha'i bu dang / dga' ldan gyi lha'i bu dang / 'phrul dga'i lha'i bu dang / gzhan
81a1('bum): 'phrul dbang byed gyi lha'i bu dang / tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu dang / tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha'i bu dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha'i bu dang / tshangs chen gyi lha'i bu dang /
81a2('bum): snang ba'i lha'i bu dang / chung snang gi lha'i bu dang / tshad med snang ba'i lha'i bu dang / kun snang dang ba'i lha'i bu dang / dge ba'i lha'i bu dang / chung dge'i lha'i bu dang / tshad med dge ba'i lha'i
81a3('bum): bu dang / dge rgyas kyi lha'i bu dang / che ba'i lha'i bu dang / chung che'i lha'i bu dang / tshang med che ba'i lha'i bu dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha'i bu dang / mi che ba'i lha'i bu dang / mi gdung ba'i lha'i bu dang /
81a4('bum): shin tu mthong ba'i lha'i bu dang / gya sdom snang ba'i rtsa'i bu dang / 'og min gyi lha'i bu de/ dag 'dus shing tshogs par mkhyen nas/ de dag thams cad dbang du btsugs te/ lha'i dbang
81a5('bum): po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'am/ dge slong 'am/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ rigs kyi bu 'am/
81a6('bum): rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ lha'i bu 'am/ lha'i bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / sgom pa dang / gzhan la rgya cher
81a7('bum): 'chang ba dang / tshul bzhin yid la byed cing / rna ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang yang mi 'bral ba de dag ni bdud sdig can dang / bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnam kyis grags rnyed par
81b1('bum): mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang rig kyi bu mo de dag gis gzugs stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur tshor ba stong pa nyid shin tu
81b2('bum): byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur/ 'du shes stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ 'du byed stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rnam par shes pa stong
81b3('bum): pa nyid shin tu byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags mi rnyed/ mtshan ma med pas mtshan ma med pa la glags
81b4('bum): mi rnyed/ smon pa med pas smon pa med pa la glags mi rnyed do// de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis/ mig stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro//
81b5('bum): sna ba stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ sna stong pa nyid shin tu gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ lce stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ lus stong pa nyid shin
81b6('bum): tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ yid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glag mi rnyed/ mtshan
81b7('bum): ma med pas mtshan ma med pa la klags mi rnyed/ smon pa med pas smon pa med pa la glags mi rnyed do// de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis gzugs stong pa
82a1('bum): nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ sgra stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ dri stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/
82a2('bum): ro stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ reg stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ chos stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir
82a3('bum): zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags mi steng / mtshan ma med pas mtshan ma med pa la glags mi rnyed/ smon pa med pas smon pa med pa la glags mi rnyed/
82a4('bum): doni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid shin tu byen
82a5('bum): kyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rtswa'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ lus kyi rnam par
82a6('bum): shes pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis
82a7('bum): stong pa nyid la glags mi rnyed/ mtshan pa med pas mtshan ma med pa la klags mi rnyed/ smon pa med pas smon pa med pa la glags mi rnyed/ de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de/
82b1('bum): dag gis mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa
82b2('bum): nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ lus kyis 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/
82b3('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags mi rnyed/ mtshan ma med pas mtshanam
82b4('bum): med pa la glags mi rnyed/ smon pa med pas smon pa med pa la glags mi rnyeng // de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu de dag gis mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid
82b5('bum): shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ sna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid
82b6('bum): shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong
82b7('bum): pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ yid kyis 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis bslabs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar
83a1('bum): stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags mi rnyed/ mtshan ma med pas mtshan ma med pa la glags mi rnyed/ smon pa med pas smon ma med pa la glags mi rnye //
83a2('bum): de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis sa'i khams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ chu'i khams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/
83a3('bum): me'i khams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rlung gi khams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis
83a4('bum): brlabs par 'gyur/ rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// de'i ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la
83a5('bum): klags mi rnyed/ mtshan ma med pas mtshan med pa la klags mi rnyed/ smon pa med pas smon pa med pa la glags mi rnyi ngo // de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis
83a6('bum): ma rigs pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ 'du byed stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs pa
83a7('bum): 'gyur/ ming gzugs stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ skye mched drug stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ reg pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis ba
83b1('bum): par 'gyur/ tshor ba stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ sred pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ len pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/
83b2('bum): srid pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ skye ba stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rga shi stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ de ci'i phyir
83b3('bum): zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags mi snyed/ mtshan ma med pas mtshan ma med pa glags mi rnyed/ smon pa med pas smon pa med pa la glags mi rnyed do//
83b4('bum): de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid shin tu
83b5('bum): byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs
83b6('bum): par 'gyur ro// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro//
83b7('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la grags mi rnyed/ mtshan ma med pas mtshan ma med pa la glags mi rnyed/ smon pa med pas smon pa med pa la glags
84a1('bum): mi rnyed do// de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ phyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
84a2('bum): shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs
84a3('bum): par 'gyur/ don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ 'dus ma byas
84a4('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong
84a5('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu
84a6('bum): byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs
84a7('bum): par 'gyur/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur//
84b1('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyuraro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
84b2('bum): de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags mi rnyed/ mtshan ma med pas mtshan ma med pa la glags mi rnyed/ smon pa med pas smon pa med pa la glags mi rnyed do// de ni
84b3('bum): 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu de dag gis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ yang dag par spong ba rnams stong pa nyid shin
84b4('bum): tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ dbang po rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par
84b5('bum): 'gyur/ stobs rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par pagyur/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ 'phags pa'i
84b6('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags mi rnyed/ mtshan ma
84b7('bum): med pas mtshan ma med pa la glags mi rnyed/ smon pa med pas smon pa med pa la glags mi rnyed do// de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo do dag gis 'phags
85a1('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ bsam gtan rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ tshad
85a2('bum): med pa rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jugs pa rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rnam par
85a3('bum): thar pa rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rnam par thar
85a4('bum): ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ mngon par shes pa rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ ting
85a5('bum): de 'dzin rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis
85a6('bum): stong pa nyid la glags mi rnyed/ mtshan ma med pas mtshan ma med pa la glags mi rnyed/ smon pa med pas smon pa med pa la glags mi rnyed// de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo
85a7('bum): de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ mi 'jigs pa rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ so so
85b1('bum): yang dag par rig pa rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ byams pa chen po stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ snying rje chen po stong pa nyid shin
85b2('bum): tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyuraro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid
85b3('bum): kyis stong pa nyid la glags mi snyed/ mtshan ma med pas mtshan ma med pa la glags mi rnyed/ smon pa med pas smon pa med pa la glags mi rnyed// de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang /
85b4('bum): rigs kyis bu de dag gis thams cad shes pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ lam gyi rnams pa shes pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rnam
85b5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu gyis brlabs par 'gyuraro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la klags mi rnyed/ mtshan ma
85b6('bum): med pas mtshan ma med pa la glags mi rnyed/ smon pa med pas smon pa med pa la glags mi rnyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang gis glags pa rnyed par 'gyur ba/
85b7('bum): dang / gang du glags rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / gang la grags rnyed par 'gyur ba de dgi ngo bo nyid med do// ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag la ni mi 'ag
86a1('bum): mi ma yin pa glags lta zhing grags tshol ba dag gis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu
86a2('bum): de dag gis de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sems can thams cad la byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms shin tu sgoms pa'i phyir ro// rigs
86a3('bum): kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi nyams nga ba mi spongs pas dus byed par yang 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo sbyin
86a4('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de dag gis sems can thams cad la yang dag par spangs pas bsnyen bkur byas pa'i phyir ro// ke'u shi ka gang yang stong gsum
86a5('bum): gyi stong chen po'i 'jigs rten gyi khams na rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha dang / mche ma'i lha dang / dga' ldan gyi lha dang / 'phrul dga'i lha
86a6('bum): gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha dang / kun snang dang ba'i lha dang / dge rgyas kyi lha dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhug
86a7('bum): pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang / lha'i bu gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mthel pa dang / mazungs pa dang / ma bcangs pa dang / kun chub par ma byas pa de dag gis kyang
86b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mnyan par bya'o// gzungs par bya'o// bcang bar bya'o// klag par bya'o// kun chub par bya'o// tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o// rnam
86b2('bum): pa thams can mkhyen pa'i sems dang nam yang me 'bral bar bya'o// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang /
86b3('bum): klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin yid la byed cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang yang mi 'bral bar byed pa de dag ni/ khyim stong pa na 'dug kyang rung / bla gag
86b4('bum): med na 'dug kyang rung / lam gol na 'dug kyang rung ste/ 'jigs pa'am sdang bar mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis
86b5('bum): nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so// phyi stong pa nyid de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so// phyi nang stong pa nyid de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
86b6('bum): gyis shin tu bsgoms so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so// chen po stong pa nyid de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so//
86b7('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so// 'dus ma byas stong pa
87a1('bum): bya/ nyid de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgobs so// thog ma
87a2('bum): dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid de ma
87a3('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid de mi dmigs pa'i tshu
87a4('bum): gyis shin tu bsgoms so// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so// dngos po mang ba'i stong pa nyid de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgom
87a5('bum): so/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so// de nas de'i
87a6('bum): tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jigs rten gyi khams na rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha dang / mche ma'i lha dang / dga' ldan gyi lha dang / 'phrul dga'i lha dang /
87a7('bum): gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha dang / tshangs ris kyi lha dang / kun snang dang ba'i lha dang / dge brgyas kyi lha dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha dang / gnas gtsang ma'i rigs kyi lha ji snyed cig
87b1('bum): yod pa de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la/
87b2('bum): mos shing 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid cing gzhan la rgya cher ston pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
87b3('bum): du yid la bgyid pa dang / mi 'bral ba de dag la rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsrung ba dang / bskyabs pa dang / bskyang bar bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
87b4('bum): dpa' sems chen po mchis na/ sems can dmyal ba rnams kyang rgyan chad par 'gyur/ byol song gi skye gnas rnams kyang rgyun chad par 'gyur/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnams
87b5('bum): kyang rgyun chad par 'gyur/ lha las 'phongs pa rnams kyang rgyun 'chad par 'gyur/ mi las dbul ba rnams kyang rgyun 'chad par 'gyur/ nad dang gnod pa dang / 'gro ba'i nad thams
87b6('bum): cad kyang rgyun chad cing 'jig pa dang nad ma mchis par 'gyur/ mu ge'i zhugs ngan thams cad kyang rgyun tshang bar 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchis na/
87b7('bum): dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ bsam gtan bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ ched med pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/
88a1('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ mngon par shes pa lnga 'jigs rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ sbyin pa'i pha rol
88a2('bum): tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jigs rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ brtson
88a3('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung ba
88a4('bum): 'gyur/ nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ phyi stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ phyi nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ stong pa nyid stong pa
88a5('bum): nyid 'jigs rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ chen po stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ don dam pa stong pa nyid 'jigs rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ 'dus byas stong nyid pa 'jig
88a6('bum): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa
88a7('bum): stong pa nyid 'jigs rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ chos thams cad
88b1('bum): stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ dngos po meng ba
88b2('bum): stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ dran pa nye bar
88b3('bum): gzhags pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ yang dag par spongs ba bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ dbang po lnga
88b4('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ stobs lnga 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'jig
88b5('bum): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ rnam par mthar pa brgyad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
88b6('bum): 'jug pa dgu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo/ gsum 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ gzungs kyi
88b7('bum): sgo thams cad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ so so yang
89a1('bum): shAkya/ dag par rig pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ byams pa chen po 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ snying rje chen po 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur//
89a2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ thams cad shes pa nyid 'jig rtes 'byung bar 'gyur/ lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung
89a3('bum): bar 'gyur/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchis na/ rgyal rig che zhing mtho ba mchis par 'gyur/
89a4('bum): bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba mchis par 'gyur/ khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho bar 'gyur/ 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po rnams mchis par 'gyur/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ras
89a5('bum): kyi lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams mchis pa 'gyur/ mtshe ma'i lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ dga' ldan gyi lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ 'phrul
89a6('bum): dga'i lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ tshangs ris kyi lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ tshangs lha nye pan rnams mchis pa
89a7('bum): 'gyur/ tshangs pa kun 'khor kye lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ tshangs chen gyi lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ snang ba'i lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ chung snang gi lha rnams
89b1('bum): mchis par 'gyur/ tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams mchis pa 'gyur/ kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ dge ba'i lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ chung dge'i
89b2('bum): lha rnams par 'gyur/ tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ dge' rgyas kyi lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ che ba'i lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ chung che'i lha rnam
89b3('bum): mchis par 'gyur/ tshad med che ba'i lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ mi mche ba'i lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ mi gdung ba'i
89b4('bum): lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ 'og min gyi lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/
89b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchis na// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mchis par 'gyur/ rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams mchis par 'gyur/ lan cig phyir
89b6('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mchis par 'gyur/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba mchis par 'gyur/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mchis par 'gyur/ phyi mi 'ong ma 'ong ba mchis par 'gyur/
89b7('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid mchis par 'gyur/ dgra bcom pa mchis par 'gyur/ rang byang chub mchis par 'gyur/ rang sangs rgyas mchis par 'gyur/ byang chub sems
90a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchis na/ sems can yongs su smin pa mchis par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa mchis par 'gyur/
90a2('bum): 'jig rten du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra macom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'byung bar 'gyur/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba mchis par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas
90a3('bum): dkon mchog 'byung bar 'gyur/ chos dkon mchog 'byung bar 'gyur/ dge 'dun dkon mchog 'byung bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ lha dang mi dang lha
90a4('bum): ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / bskyang bar bgyi'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / macom
90a5('bum): ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ke'u shi ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yod na se
90a6('bum): can dmyal ba thams cad rgyun chad bar 'gyur ro// byol song gi skye gnas thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro// gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro//
90a7('bum): mi las dbul ba thams cad rgyun chang bar 'gyur ro// nad dang gnod pa dang / 'gro ba'i nad thams cad rgyun chad pa dang / 'jigs pa med par 'gyur ro// mu ge'i mya ngan tham
90b1('bum): cad rgyun chad par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yod na/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams 'jigs rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bsam gtan bzhi
90b2('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshad med pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
90b3('bum): mngon par shes pa lnga 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jigs rten du
90b4('bum): 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bsam
90b5('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung ba
90b6('bum): 'gyur ro// phyi stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// phyi nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar
90b7('bum): 'gyur ro// chen po stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// doden dam pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten
91a1('bum): du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar
