121b6('bum): yongs su dag par bya'o snyam na'ang de bdag tu bgyi ba la mngon par chags pas nga rgyal du 'gyur ro// de 'di snyam du 'di ltar bdag gis rnams pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya'o//
121b7('bum): snyam na'ang de bdag tu bgyi ba la mngon par chags pas nga rgyal du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams la spong ba
122a1('bum): tshe/ bdag tu bgyi ba la mngon par chags pas nga rgyal du 'gyur ro// de la ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su 'dul ba dang nga rgyal ma mchis
122a2('bum): pa'i slad du nye bar gnas so// bcom ldan 'das 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi
122a3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu bsgoms pa'i slad du sbyin pa'ang mi dmigs gtong ba 'ang mi dmigs/ len pa 'ang mi dmigs te/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
122a4('bum): ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su 'dul ba dang / nga rgyal ma mchis pa'i slad du nye bar gnas so// de 'jigs rten las 'das
122a5('bum): ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu bsgoms pa'i slad du tshul khrims kyang mi dmigs/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa 'ang mi
122a6('bum): dmigs te/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su 'dul/
122a7('bum): ba dang / nga rgyal ma mchis pa'i slad du nye bar gnas so// de 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bzod pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu bsgoms
122b1('bum): ba'i slad du bzod pa yang mi dmigs/ bzod pa dang ldan pa yang mi dmigs te/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems
122b2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su 'dul ba dang / nga rgyal ma mchis pa'i slad du nye bar gnas so// de 'jig rten las 'das pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
122b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu bsgoms pa'i slad du brtson 'grus kyang mi dmigs/ brtson 'grus dang ldan pa yang mi dmigs te/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar na shes rab tu
122b4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su 'dul ba dang / nga rgyal ma mchis pa'i slad du nye bar gnaso//
122b5('bum): de 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod ba'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu bsgoms pa'i slad du bsam gtan yang mi dmigs/
122b6('bum): bsam gtan pa ying mi dmigs te/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
122b7('bum): dpa' chen po yongs su 'dul ba dang / nga rgyal ma mchis pa'i slad du nye bar gnas so// de 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab
123a1('bum): @kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu bsgoms pa'i slad du shes rab du yang mi dmigs/ shes rab dang ldan pa yang mi dmigs te/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar
123a2('bum): na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su 'dul ba dang / nga rgyal ma mchis pa'i slar
123a3('bum): du nye bar gnas so// de dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sgom yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu bsgoms pa'i slad du dmigs ma mchis/ de yang dag par spong ba rnams
123a4('bum): sgom yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu bsgoms pa'i slad du dmigs pa ma mchis/ de rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sgom yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu bsgom
123a5('bum): pa'i slad du dmigs pa ma mchis/ dbang po rnams sgom yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu bsgoms pa'i slad du dmigs pa ma mchis/ de stobs rnams sgom yang shes
123a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu bsgoms pa'i slad du dmigs pa ma mchis/ de byang chub kyi yan lag bdun sgom yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu bsgoms pa'i
123a7('bum): slad du dmigs pa ma mchis/ de 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu bsgoms pa'i slad du dmigs pa ma mchis te/ bcom
123b1('bum): ldan 'das de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su 'dul ba dang / nga rgyal ma mchis pa'i slad du nye bar gnas so// de 'phags
123b2('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams sgom yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu bsgoms pa'i slad du dmigs pa ma mchis/ de bsam gtan rnams sgom yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin
123b3('bum): tu bsgoms pa'i slad du dmigs pa ma mchis/ de tshad med pa rnams sgom yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu bsgoms pa'i slad du dmigs pa ma mchis/ de gzugs med
123b4('bum): ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgom yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu bsgoms pa'i slad du dmigs pa ma mchis/ de rnam par thar pa rnams sgom yang shes rab kyi pha rol
123b5('bum): tu phyin pa shin tu bsgoms pa'i slad du dmigs pa ma mchis/ de mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgom yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu bsgoms pa'i slad
123b6('bum): du dmigs pa ma mchis/ de rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa sgom yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu bsgoms pa'i slad du dmigs pa
123b7('bum): ma mchis/ de mngon par shes pa rnams sgom yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu bsgoms pa'i slad du dmigs pa ma mchis/ de ting nge 'dzin rnams sgom yang shes ra
124a1('bum): / kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu bsgoms pa'i slad du dmigs pa ma mchis/ de gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgom yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu bsgoms
124a2('bum): ba'i slad du dmigs pa ma mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su 'dul ba dang / nga rgyal ma
124a3('bum): mchis pa'i slad du nye bar gnas so// de de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sgom yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu bsgoms pa'i slad du dmigs pa ma mchis/ de mi
124a4('bum): 'jigs rnams sgom yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu bsgoms pa'i slad du dmigs pa ma mchis/ de so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sgom yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin
124a5('bum): tu bsgoms pa'i slad du dmigs pa ma mchis/ de byams pa chen po sgom yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu bsgoms pa'i slad du dmigs pa ma mchis/ de snying rje chen po sgom yang
124a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu bsgoms pa'i slad du dmigs pa ma mchis/ de sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sgom yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu bsgoms pa'i
124a7('bum): skad du dmigs pa ma mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su 'dul ba dang / nga rgyal ma
124b1('bum): mchis pa'i slad du nye bar gnas so// de thams cad shes pa nyid sgom yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu bsgoms pa'i slad du dmigs pa ma mchis/ de lam gyi rnam pa
124b2('bum): shes pa sgom yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu bsgoms pa'i slang du dmigs pa ma mchis/ de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sgom yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin
124b3('bum): tu bsgoms pa'i slad du dmigs pa ma mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su 'dul ba dang /
124b4('bum): ngargyal ma mchis pa'i slad du nye bar gnas so// shes kyab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgyab las// le'u bcwo brgyad pa'o// / de nas bcom
124b5('bum): ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang /
124b6('bum): klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang / kha ton du byed cing / tshul bzhin yid la byed pa zhig zab pa'i nang na 'dug cing g.yul dor chas pa'i tshe/ der gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs
124b7('bum): kyi bu mo des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di kha ton du byas nas song ste/ 'dug na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de 'pham par mi 'gyur te/ gdon mi za bar rgyal bar
125a1('bum): 'gyur ro// rgyal nas ma smras ma nyams par thab mo de las thar par 'gyur te/ ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi g.yo kyi
125a2('bum): zab mo 'di kha ton du byed cing g.yul der song song ba las srog gi bar chad du 'gyur ba ni mi srid de/ gnas med skabs med do// gal te de'i lus la la la zhig gis mdas 'phangs
125a3('bum): sam mtshon gyis btab na lus la phog cing 'jug par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des yun ring por pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spang de/ shes rab
125a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la rten/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bsgoms te/ bdag gi 'dod chags kyi mtshon dang / 'dod chags kyi mnga' 'ang bcom/ gzhan gyi
125a5('bum): 'dod chags kyi mtshon dang / 'dod chags kyi mda' 'ang bcom/ bad gi zhe sdang gi mtshon dang / zhe sdang gi mda' yang bcom gzhan gyi zhe sdang gi mtshon dang / zhe sdang gi mnga' yang
125a6('bum): bcom/ bdag gi gti mug gi mtshon dang / gti mug gi mda' yang bcom/ gzhan gyi gti mug gi mtshon dang / gti mug gi mnga' yang bcom/ bdag gi lta ba'i rnam pa'i mtshon
125a7('bum): dang / mda' yang bcom/ gzhan lta ba'i rnam pa'i mtshon dang mda' yang bcom/ bdag gi kun nas ldang ba'i mtshon dang mnga' 'ang bcom/ gzhan gyi kun nas ldang ba'i mchom
125b1('bum): dang mda' 'ang bcom/ bdag gi bag la nyal ba'i mtshon dang mnga' yang bcom/ gzhan gyi bag la nyal ba'i mtshon dang mnga' yang bcom pa'i phyir te/ ke'u shi ka rnam grangs des
125b2('bum): na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i yul tu phyin pa'i tshe lus la mtshon tam/ mangs phog cing zug par mi 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi
125b3('bum): bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems dang yang
125b4('bum): mi 'bral na de la la zhig gis/ dug gis gtor tam/ byang byas sam/ me'i 'obs su rngod dam/ mtshon gyis btab bam/ dug blung ngam/ chur bor yang rung ste/ de dag
125b5('bum): thams cad kyis de gnod par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rigs sngags chen po'o// ke'u shi ka 'di ltar shes
125b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rigs sngags bla na med pa'o// ke'u shi ka 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rigs sngags gong na med pa ste/ rigs sngags 'di la
125b7('bum): slob pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo ni bdag la'ang gnod par mi byed/ gzhan la'ang gnod par mi byed/ gnyid ka la bang gnod par mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di snya
126a1('bum): 'di la slob pa'i tshe/ bdag mi dmigs/ sems can mi dmigs/ srog mi dmigs/ 'gro ba mi dmigs/ gso ba mi dmigs/ skyes bu mi dmigs/
126a2('bum): gang zag mi dmigs/ sheng can mi dmigs/ shed bdag mi dmigs/ byed pa po mi dmigs/ tshor ba po mi dmigs/ shes po mi dmigs/ mthong ba po mi dmigs so// /
126a3('bum): gzugs mi dmigs/ tshor ba mi dmigs/ 'du shes mi dmigs/ 'du byed mi dmigs/ rnam par shes pa mi dmigs so// mig mi dmigs/ rna ba mi dmigs/ sna mi
126a4('bum): dmigs/ lce mi dmigs/ lus mi dmigs/ yid mi dmigs so// gzugs mi dmigs/ sgra mi dmigs/ dri mi dmigs/ ro mi dmigs/ / reg mi
126a5('bum): dmigs/ chos mi dmigs/ mig gi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mi dmigs/ sna'i rnam par shes pa mi dmigs/ lce'i rnam par shes pa mi
126a6('bum): dmigs/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs/ sna'i 'dus
126a7('bum): te reg pa mi dmigs/ lce'i 'dus te reg mi dmigs/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi dmig so// mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byang
126b1('bum): ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dmi dmigs/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa las
126b2('bum): byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs so// sa'i khams
126b3('bum): mi dmigs/ chu'i khams mi dmigs/ me'i khams mi dmigs/ rlung gi khams mi dmigs/ nam mkha'i khams mi dmigs/ rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dmin/
126b4('bum): ma rig ba mi dmigs/ 'du byed mi dmigs/ rnam par shes pa mi dmigs/ ming dang gzugs mi dmigs/ skye mched drug mi dmigs/ reg pa mi dmigs/ tshor ba
126b5('bum): mi dmigs/ sred pa mi dmigs/ len pa mi dmigs/ srid pa mi dmigs/ skye ba mi dmigs/ rga shi mi dmig so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dpe dmigs/ tshul
126b6('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi
126b7('bum): dmigs/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu pa mi dmigs so// nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs/ phyi stong pa nyid mi dmigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dmigs/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi
127a1('bum): dmigs/ chen po stong pa nyid mi dmigs/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dmigs/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
127a2('bum): mi dmigs/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dmigs/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs/ der ba med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi
127a3('bum): dmigs/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi dmigs/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid pa dmigs/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid pi dmig
127a4('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mi dmigs/ yang dag par spong ba rnams mi dmigs/ rdzu 'phrul/
127a5('bum): gyi rkang pa mi dmigs/ dbang po rnams mi dmigs/ stobs rnams mi dmigs/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mi dmigs/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rnams
127a6('bum): mi dmigs/ 'phags bden pa rnams mi dmig/ bsam gtan rnams mi dmigs/ chang med pa rnams mi dmigs/ gzugs med pa'i snyom par 'jug pa rnams mi
127a7('bum): dmigs/ rnam par thar pa rnams mi dmigs/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyom par 'jug pa rnams mi dmigs/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang
127b1('bum): smon pa med pa mi dmigs/ mngon par shes pa rnams mi dmigs/ ting nge 'dzin rnams mi dmigs/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi dmigs/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mi dmigs/
127b2('bum): mi 'jigs pa rnams mi dmigs/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mi dmigs/ byams pa chen po mi dmigs/ snying rje chen po ma dmigs/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
127b3('bum): pa rnams mi dmigs/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mi dmigs/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi dmigs/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi dmigs/ dgra bcom pa nyid mi
127b4('bum): dmigs/ rang byang chub mi dmigs/ thams cad shes pa nyid mi dmigs/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mi dmigs/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi dmigs so// de ltar
127b5('bum): mi dmigs pas na/ bdag la yang gnod par mi byed/ gzhan la yang gnod par mi byed/ gnyis ka la yang gnod par mi byed de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
127b6('bum): chub thob cing / sems can thams cad kyi sems la rnam par lta bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'o
127b7('bum): sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang rigs sngags 'di nyid la bslabs te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// gang ma byon
128a1('bum): pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag kyang rig sngags 'di nyid la bslabs shing bla na med pa yang /
128a2('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// gang da ltar byung ba'i phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
128a3('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas ched med grangs med pa de dag kyang rigs sngags 'di bslabs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// kre'u
128a4('bum): shi ka gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzung ba ma byas/ kha ton ma byas/ klag pa dang / kur chub par ma byas/ tshul bzhin du yid la ma byas kyang / gang na bris
128a5('bum): shing 'chang ba'i khyim 'am/ grong ngam/ grong rdal lam/ grong khyer der mi 'am mi ma yin pa glags lta bas glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar
128a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mchod pa'i phyir/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams na/ rgyal chen bzhi ris kyi lha'i bu dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i
128a7('bum): bu dang / mche ma'i lnga'i bu dang / dga' ldan gyi lha'i bu dang / 'phrul dga'i lha'i bu dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed gyi lha'i bu dang / tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu dang / tshang
128b1('bum): lnga nye ban gyi lha'i bu dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha'i bu dang / tshangs chen gyi lha'i bu dang / snang ba'i lha'i bu dang / chung snang gi lha'i bu dang / chang med snang ba'i lha'i
128b2('bum): bu dang / kun snang dang ba'i lnga'i bu dang / dge ba'i lha'i bu dang / chung dge'i lha'i bu dang / tshad med dge ba'i lha'i bu dang / dag rgyas kyi lha'i bu dang / che ba'i lha'i bu dang /
128b3('bum): chung che'i lha'i bu dang / tshad med che ba'i lha'i bu dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha'i bu dang / mi che ba'i lha'i bu dang / me gdung ba'i lha'i bu dang / shin tu mthong ba'i lha'i bu dang /
128b4('bum): nom snang ba'i lha'i bu dang / 'og min gyi lha'i bu dang / 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa'i rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i bu
128b5('bum): dang / mtshe ma'i lha'i bu dang / dga' ldan gyi lha'i bu dang / 'phrul dga'i lha'i bu dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu dang / tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu dang / tshangs
128b6('bum): lha nye phan gyi lha'i bu dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha'i bu dang / tshangs chen gyi lha'i bu dang / snang ba'i lha'i bu dang / chungs snang gi lha'i bu dang / tshad med snang ba'i lha'i
128b7('bum): bu dang / kun snang ngang ba'i lha'i bu dang / dge ba'i lha'i bu dang / chung dge'i lha'i bu dang / tshang med dge ba'i lha'i bu dang / dge rgyas kyi lha'i bu dang / che ba'i lha'i bu dang /
129a1('bum): chung che'i lha'i bu dang / tshad med che ba'i lha'i bu dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha'i bu dang / mi che ba'i lha'i bu dang / mi gdung ba'i lha'i bu dang / shin tu
129a2('bum): mthong ba'i lha'i bu dang / gya nom snang ba'i lha'i bu dang / 'og min gyi lha'i bu gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi shes rab kya
129a3('bum): rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bris shing bcangs pa de dag la rtag tu rgyun mi chad par srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / bskyang bar byed de/ lha'i bu de dag 'ongs nas kyang shes rab
129a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la rim 'gro dang / bkur sti dang / bu dud dang / mchod par byas shing 'dong bar 'gyur te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
129a5('bum): 'di bris te/ bcangs na de la 'ang che 'di'i yon tan dang legs pa de dag yod par 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ snying po byang chub 'am/ snying po byang chub kyi 'a
129a6('bum): tam/ snying po byang chub kyi nang na byol song gi skye gnas su rtogs pa'i srog chags sam/ mir gyur pa gang su 'dug kyang rung ste/ de dag la mi 'am mi ma yin pas gtse ba raM/
129a7('bum): mtho 'tsham par mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe ra/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang de la bzhugs nas//
129b1('bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// gang ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
129b2('bum): sangs rgyas de dag kyang de nyid du bzhugs shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang brgya par 'gyur ro// da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten
129b3('bum): gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag kyang de nyid la bzhugs te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
129b4('bum): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag thams cad kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
129b5('bum): ba'i byang chub du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang / sems can thams cad 'jig pa med pa dang / khon med pa dang / gcugs med par nan tan mdzad nas/ sems
129b6('bum): can tshad med grangs med pa lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa la bkod par gyur to// bkod do// bkod par 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod par gyur to// bkod do//
129b7('bum): bkod par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod par gyur te/ bkod do// bkod par 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod par gyur to// bkod do// bkod
130a1('bum): par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid la blar gyur to// bkod do// bkod par 'gyur ro// rang byang chub la bkod par gyur to// bkod do//
130a2('bum): bkod par 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid kyis sa phyogs de sems can thams cad kyi mchod rten du byas pas me tog dang / 'phrengs pa dang /
130a3('bum): spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan mang pos phyag bya ba dang / gdud pa dang / phu dung du bya ba dang / rim 'gror bya ba dang / bkur
130a4('bum): stir bya bar 'gyur ro// / bam po brgyan pa// / brgya byin kyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi
130a5('bum): bu mo gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing / glegs bam du bgyis te/ bcangs la/ de la me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang /
130a6('bum): na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan mang pos mas rim 'gro dang / bkur sti dang / pu dud dang / mchod pa bgyis pa dang / gang la las yang de bzhin gshegs
130a7('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten du rtsal te/ mchod
130b1('bum): dam ring po che sna bdun gyi snod du gsal te/ de la me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan
130b2('bum): pos rim 'gro dang / bkur sti pa dang / budud dang / mchod pa bgyis na/ de gnyis las gang gi bsod nams kyi phung po mang du 'phel ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
130b3('bum): pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas na de khyod nyid las dris khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lung ston cig/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa/
130b4('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsnyes pa dang / sku 'di lta bu mngon par grub pa de lam gang la bslabs pas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
130b5('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes te/ sku 'di lta bu mngon par sgrubs par 'gyur/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab
130b6('bum): kyis pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes te/ sku 'a
130b7('bum): lta bu yang mngon par grub bo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ngas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs nas
131a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes so// sku 'di 'dra ba'ang mngon par grub bo// ke'u shi ka nga'i sku 'di brnyes pas ni de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba
131a2('bum): / grangs su yang mi 'gro ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes pa de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'i grangs su 'gro ste/ ke'u shi ka rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
131a3('bum): ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ngo // ke'u shi ka de ltar lus 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi gzhi ste/ gzhi de la rten nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
131a4('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes so// de bas ni sku 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes de'i bzhir gyur pa ste/
131a5('bum): sems can thams cad kyi mchod rten du gyur cing / phyag bya ba dang / pu dung du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba dang / rim 'gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya bar 'gyur te/ ke'u shi kang yongs
131a6('bum): mya ngan las 'das nas/ sku gdung la mchod pa'ang sku la mchod pa nyid du 'gyur gyi/ mchos la shin tu mchod par mi 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang
131a7('bum): la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bril ste/ 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / me tog dang / 'breng ba dang / sro/
131b1('bum): dang / byug pa dang / bye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan mang pos rim 'gro dang / bkur sti dang / pu dud dang / mchod pa byas pas ni/ de rnam pa
131b2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pas de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par 'dod pas
131b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid bris te bzungs par bya'o// bcang bar bya'o// klog par bya'o// kun chub par bya'o// tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o// me tog dang / 'phreng
131b4('bum): ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan mang pos rim 'gror bya'o// bkur stir bya'o// phu dud du bya'o//
131b5('bum): mchod par bya'o// ke'u shi ka gang la las de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sku gdung rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten du bcug gam/ rin po che sna bdun
131b6('bum): gyi snod du blugs te/ de la me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan mang pos rim
131b7('bum): 'gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dung dang / mchod pa byas pas gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris te/ bzungs pa dang / bcangs pa dang / klags pa dang / kun chub par
132a1('bum): byas pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byas pa dang / me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang /
132a2('bum): rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan mang pos rim 'gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dung dang / mchod pa byas nas 'di nyid de bas ches bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// ke'u shi ka de ci'i
132a3('bum): phyir zhe na/ pha rol tu phyin pa lnga yang 'di las byung ngo // nang stong pa nyid kyang 'di las byung ngo // phyi stong pa nyid kyang 'di las byung ngo // phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang 'di las byung ngo // /
132a4('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'di las byung ngo // chen po stong pa nyid kyang 'di las bya // don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang 'di las byung ngo // 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang 'di las
132a5('bum): byung ngo // 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang 'di las byung ngo // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang 'di las byung ngo // thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang 'di las byung ngo //
132a6('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang 'di las byung ngo // rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang 'di las byung ngo // chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang 'di las byung ngo // rang gi mtshan nyid
132a7('bum): stong pa nyid kyang 'di las byung ngo // mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang 'di las byung ngo // dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang 'di las byung ngo // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'di las
132b1('bum): byung ngo // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'di las byung ngo // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yang 'di las byung ngo // yang dag par spong ba bzhi yang 'di las byung //
132b2('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yang 'di las byung ngo // dbang po lnga yang 'di las byung ngo // stobs lnga yang 'di las byung ngo // byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yang 'di las byu'o//
132b3('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang 'di las byung ngo // 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yang 'di las byung ngo // bsam gtan bzhi yang 'di las byung ngo // tshad med pa
132b4('bum): bci yang 'di las byung ngo // gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jugs pa bzhi yang 'di las byung ngo // rnam par thar pa brgyad kyang 'di las byung ngo // mthar gyis gnas pa'i
132b5('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yang 'di las byung ngo // rnam par mthar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa yang 'di las byung ngo // mngon par shes pa lnga
132b6('bum): yang 'di las byung ngo // ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyang 'di las byung ngo // gzungs kyi sgo thams cad kyang 'di las byung ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yang 'di las
132b7('bum): byung ngo // mi 'jigs pa bzhi yang 'di las byung ngo // so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yang 'di las byung ngo // byams pa chen po yang 'di las byung ngo // snying rje chen po yang 'di
133a1('bum): @las byung ngo // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi 'di las byung ngo // sems can yongs su smin par bya ba yang lngas byung ngo // sangs
133a2('bum): rgyas kyi zhing phun sum tshogs pa yang 'di las byung ngo // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rigs phun sum tshogs pa yang 'di las byung ngo // gzugs phun gsum
133a3('bum): tshogs pa yang 'di las byung ngo // longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa yang 'di las byung ngo // 'khor phun sum tshogs pa yang 'di las byung ngo // byams pa chen po yang 'di las
133a4('bum): byung ngo // snying rje chen po yang 'di las byung ngo // rgyal rig che zhing mtho ba yang 'di las byung ngo // bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba yang 'di las byung ngo // khyim bdag gi
133a5('bum): rigs che zhing mtho ba yang 'di las byung ngo // rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo // sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i bu rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo //
133a6('bum): mtshe me'i lha'i bu rnam kyang 'di las byung ngo // dga' ldan gyi lha'i bu rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo // 'phrul dga'i lha'i bu rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo // gzhan 'phrul dbang
133a7('bum): byed kyi lha'i bu rnams kyang 'di bas byung ngo // nangs ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo // tshangs lha nye ban gyi lha'i bu rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo // tshangs pa kun 'khor
133b1('bum): gyi lha'i bu rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo // tshangs chen gyi lha'i bu rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo // snang ba'i lha'i bu rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo // chung snang gi lha'i bu rnams
133b2('bum): kyang 'di las byung ngo // tshad med snang ba'i lha'i bu rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo // kun snang dang ba'i lha'i bu rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo // dge ba'i lha'i bu rnams kyang 'di
133b3('bum): las byung ngo // chung dge'i lha'i bu rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo // ched med dge ba'i lha'i bu rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo // dge rgyas kyi lha'i bu rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo //
133b4('bum): che ba'i lha'i bu rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo // chung che'i lha'i bu rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo // cang med che ba'i lha'i bu rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo // 'bras bu che ba'i lha'i bu
133b5('bum): rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo // mi che ba'i lha'i bu rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo // mi gdung ba'i lha'i bu rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo // shin tu mthong ba'i lha'i bu rnams kyang 'di
133b6('bum): las byung ngo // gya nom snang ba'i lha'i bu rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo // 'og min gyi lha'i bu rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo // rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo // lan
133b7('bum): cig phyir 'ong ba rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo // phyir mi 'ong ba rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo // dgra bcom pa rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo // rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang 'di las
134a1('bum): byung ngo // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
134a2('bum): sangs rgyas rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'di las
134a3('bum): byung ngo // rgya byin gyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'dzam bu gling gi mi gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la rim 'gror mi bgyid/ bkur stir mi bgyid/ phu dud du mi bgyid/ mchod
134a4('bum): bar mi bgyid pa de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa de ltar mthu che bar ma 'tshal tam/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyams du sems
134a5('bum): 'dzam bu gling gi mi de ngag las gang sangs rgyas la mos pa mi byed pa dang ldan pa dang / gang chos la mos pa mi byed pa dang ldan pa dang / gang dge 'dun la mos pa mi byed pa dang /
134a6('bum): ldan pa dang / gang sangs rgyas la nem nur med pa dang / gang chos la nem nur med dang / gang dge 'dun la nem nur med pa dang / gang sangs rgyas la shin tu rton pa dang / gang tshe
134a7('bum): la shin tu rton pa dang / gang dge 'dun la shin tu rton pa dang / de lta bu ni ji snyed cig yod/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam bu gling gi mi gang sangs rgyas
134b1('bum): la mos pa mi byed pa dang ldan pa dang / chos la mos pa mi byed pa dang ga sa dge 'dun la mos pa mi byed pa dang ldan pa dang / gang sangs rgyas la nes nur ma mchis pa dang / gang
134b2('bum): chos la nem nur mchis pa dang / gang dge 'dun la nem nur ma mchis pa dang / gang sangs rgyas la ne pa dur rton pa dang / gang chos la shin tu rton pa dang / gang dge 'dun la shin
134b3('bum): tu rton pa de lta bu ni nyung ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyams du sems/ 'dzam bu gling gi pi las byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa
134b4('bum): bdun thob pa de lta bu ni ji snyed cig yod/ 'dzam bu gling gi mi las rnam par mthar pa'i sgo gsum thob pa de lta bu ni ji snyed cig yod/ 'jam bu gling gi mi las rnam par thar pa
134b5('bum): brgyad thob pa de lta bu ni ji snyed cig yod/ 'dzam bu gling gi mi las mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu thob pa de lta bu ji snyed cig yod/ 'dzam bu gling gi me
134b6('bum): las so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob pa de lta bu ni ji snyed cig yod/ 'dzam bu gling gi mi las mngon par shes pa drug thob pa de lta bu ni ji snyed cig yod/ 'dzum bu gling
134b7('bum): gi mi las kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs pa'i phyir/ rgyun tu zhugs par gyur pa de lta bu ni ji snyed cig yod/ 'dzam bu gling gi mi las 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug
135a1('bum): bsrabs pa'i phyir lan cig phyir 'ong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu ni ji snyed cig yod/ 'dzam bu gling gi mi las dam pa ma yin pa'i tshe'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pa'i
135a2('bum): phyir/ phyir mi 'ong bar gyur pa de lta bu ni ji snyed cig yod/ 'dzam bu gling gi mi las pa'i cha'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pa'i phyir dgra bcom par gyur pa de lta bu ni ji snyed cig/ 'dzam bu gling
135a3('bum): gi mi las rang byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de lta bu ni ji snyed cig/ 'dzam bu gling gi mi las bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de lta bu ni ji snyed cig/
135a4('bum): brgya byin gis gsol pa/ 'dzam bu gling gi las byang chub kyi phyogs kyis chos sum bcu rtsa bdun thob pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo // de bas kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum thob pa de lta bu
135a5('bum): ni ches nyung ngo // de bas kyang rnam par thar pa brgyad thob pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo // de bas kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu thob pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo // de bas
135a6('bum): kyang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo // de bas kyang mngon par shes pa drug thob pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo // de bas kyang 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi las kun tu
135a7('bum): sbyor ba gsum spang ba'i slad du/ rgyun tu zhugs par gyur pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo // de bas kyang 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug rnams bsrabs pa'i slad du lan cig phyir 'ong bar
135b1('bum): gyur pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo // de bas kyang dam pa ma lag pa'i cha'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pa'i slad du phyir mi 'ong bar gyur pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo // de bas kyang bla ma'i cha'i kun tu
135b2('bum): sbyor ba lnga spangs pa'i slad du dgra bcom par gyur pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo // de bas kyang 'dzam bu gling gi mi las rang byang chub tu zhugs par gyur pa de lta bu ni nyung ngo // de bas kyang
135b3('bum): 'dzam bu gling gi mi las bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs par gyur pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de de bzhin no//
135b4('bum): de de bzhin te/ 'dzam bu gling gi mi de dag las sangs rgyas la mos pa mi byed pa dang ldan pa dang / chos la mos pa mi byed pa dang ldan pa dang / dge 'dun la mos pa mi byed pa dang ldan pa dang /
135b5('bum): sangs rgyas la nem nur med pa dang / chos la nem nur med pa dang / dge 'dun la nem nur med pa de lta bu ni nyung ngo // de bas kyang sangs rgyas la shin tu rton pa dang / chos la shin tu rton pa dang /
135b6('bum): dge 'dun la shin tu rton pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo // de bas kyang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun thob pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo // de bas kyang rgyun tu zhugs par gyur pa de lta bu
135b7('bum): ni ches nyung ngo // de bas kyang lan cig phyir 'ong bar gyur pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo // de bas kyang byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs ba de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo // de bas kyang bla na med pa
136a1('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo // de bas kyang byang chub tu spyod par gyur pa de lta bu sa nyung ngo // de ci'i phyir
136a2('bum): zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sngon 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe// sangs rgyas ma mthong ba dang / chos ma ma thos pa dang / dge 'dun la bsnyen ma bkur ba dang / sbyin pa ma byin pa dang / tshul
136a3('bum): khrims ma srung ba dang / bzod pa ma bsgoms pa dang / brtson 'grus ma brtsams pa dang / bsams tan rnams la ma bsgoms pa dang / shes rab ma bsgoms pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol
136a4('bum): tu phyin pa ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
136a5('bum): tu phyin pa ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma thos ma bsgom pa dang / nang stong pa nyid ma thos
136a6('bum): ma bsgoms pa dang / byi stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / chen po stong
136a7('bum): pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid ma thos ma sgoms pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgom
136b1('bum): pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgobs pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms/
136b2('bum): pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / mi dmigs
136b3('bum): pa stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / dngos po meng pa stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
136b4('bum): nyid ma thos ma bsgobs pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma
136b5('bum): thos ma bsgoms pa dang / dbang po rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / stobs rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / 'phags
136b6('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyang ba ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / bsam gtan rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / tshad med pa rnams
136b7('bum): mthos ma bsgoms pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i
137a1('bum): snyoms par 'jugs pa dgu ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa pa ma thos pa
137a2('bum): bsgoms pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / de
137a3('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang /
137a4('bum): byams pa chen po ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / snying rje chen po ma thos ma bsgoms dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / thams cad shes rab
137a5('bum): nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / lam gyi rnams pashes pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa'i phyir/ ke'u shi ka rnam grangs
137a6('bum): des 'di ltar 'dzam bu gling gi sems nan la sangs rgyas la mos pa mi byed pa dang ldan pa dang / chos la mos pa mi byed pa dang ldan pa dang / dge 'dun la mos pa mi byed pa dang ldan
137a7('bum): ba de lta bu ni nyung ste/ de bas kyang rnam par mthar pa'i sgo gsum thob pa des nyung ngo // de bas kyang rnam par thar pa brgyad thob pa ches nyung ngo // de bas kyang mthar gyis gnas par
137b1('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu thob pa ches nyung ngo // de bas kyang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob pa ches nyung ngo // de bas kyang mngon par shes pa drug thob pa ches nyung ngo // de bas kyang
137b2('bum): 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams las kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs pa'i phyir// rgyun tu zhugs par gyur pa ches nyung ngo // de bas kyang 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug bsrabs pa'i phyir/
137b3('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong bar gyur pa ches nyung ngo // de bas kyang dam pa ma yin pa'i cha'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pa'i phyir/ phyir mi 'ong bar gyur pa ches nyung ngo // de bas kyang bla mi'i cha'i
137b4('bum): kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pa'i phyir/ dgra bcom par gyur pa ches nyung ngo // de bas kyang 'dzam bu gling gi mi las rang byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par gyur pa res nyung ngo //
137b5('bum): bas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par gyur pa ches nyung ngo // de bas kyang bsam pa dag pa byang chub tu spyod pa ni ches nyung
137b6('bum): bar rig par bya'o// ke'u shi ka mi rnams lta zhog gi// de ji snyam du sems 'dzam bu'i gling gi srog chags rnams las byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun thob pa dang /
137b7('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum thob pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad thob pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu thob pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi
138a1('bum): thob pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug thob pa de lta bu ni ji snyed cig yod/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi srog chags rnams las kun tu sbyor ba spangs pa'i phyir/ rgyun
138a2('bum): tu zhugs par gyur pa dang / 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug bsrabs pa'i phyir/ lan cig phyir 'ong bar gyur pa dang / dam pa ma yin pa'i cha'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pa'i phyir/
138a3('bum): phyir mi 'ong bar gyur pa dang / bla ma'i cha'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pa'i phyir dgra bcom par gyur pa nyid dang / rang byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de lta bu ni ji snyed cig yod/
138a4('bum): 'dzam bu gling gi srog chags rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la nem nur med pa dang / sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la nem nur med pa ni/ ji snyed cig
138a5('bum): yod/ badzam bu'i gling gi srog chags rnams las mar shes pa dang / par shes pa dang / dge 'dun du shes pa dang / bram zer shes pa dang / rigs kyi gtso bo la rim 'gro
138a6('bum): byed pa dang / sbyin pa byin pa dang / tshul khrims srungs pa dang / gso' sbyong la gnas pa dang / 'dod pa la kha na ma tho bar 'du shes shing rnam par spong ba dang / de bzhin du mi rtag
138a7('bum): par 'du shes pa dang / bdag med par 'du shes pa dang / mi rtsang bar 'du shes pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad du mngon par dga' bar med par 'du shes ji snyed cig yod/ 'das
138b1('bum): bu gling gi srog chags las bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par zhugs pa ni ji snyed cig yod/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'dzam bu
138b2('bum): gling gi srog chags/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun thob pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum thob pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad thob pa dang / mthar gyis
138b3('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu thob pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug thob pa dang / kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs pa'i
138b4('bum): slad du rgyun tu zhugs pa ru gyur pa dang / 'dod chags dang sdang dang gti mug bsrabs pa'i slad du lan cig phyir 'ong bar gyur pa dang / dam pa ma lags pa'i cha kun tu sbyor ba lnga
138b5('bum): spangs pa'i slang du phyir mi 'ong bar gyur pa dang / bla ma'i cha'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pa'i slad du dgra bcom par gyur pa dang / rang byang chub tu zhugs pa de lta bu ni shin tu nyung ngo //
138b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'dzam bu'i gling gi srog chags las bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de lta bu ni de bas kyang chos nyung ngo // bcom
138b7('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ ke'u shi ka 'jam bu gling gi srog chags las byang chub kyi phyogs kyi
139a1('bum): chos sum bcu rtsa bdun thob pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum thob pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad thob pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par/
139a2('bum): 'jug pa dgu thob pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug thob pa dang / kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs pa'i phyir/ rgyun tu zhugs pa thob
139a3('bum): ba dang / 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug bsrabs pa'i phyir lan cig phyir 'ong bar gyur pa dang / dam pa ma yin pa'i tshe'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pa'i phyir/ byi
139a4('bum): mi 'ong bar gyur pa dang / bla ma'i cha ba kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pa'i phyir/ dgra bcom par gyur pa dang / rang byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa dang / bla na med pa'i byang chub
139a5('bum): tu yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ste/ de bas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sbyong ba de lta bu ni ches
139a6('bum): nyung ngo // de bas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyas par 'dod pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo // ke'u shi ka ngas 'di nas sangs
139a7('bum): rgyas kyi spyan bsgribs pa med pas/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can grangs med ched med pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
139b1('bum): pa'i byang chub tu spyod kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu pa'i thabs mkhas pa dang mi ldan pa dang / de las gcig gam gnyis shig phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur gyi/
139b2('bum): de las bal cher nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba mthong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni le lo
139b3('bum): can brtson 'grus med pa bsam pa zhan pa/ mos pa dma' ba/ shes rab 'chal pa can rnams kyis bsgoms par bka'o// ke'u shi ka ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan bsgrir
139b4('bum): pa med pas/ lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can tshad med grangs med pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu spyod kyang //
139b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i thabs mkhas pa dang mi ldan pas/ de la cig gam gnyis shig phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur gyi// de las phal cher nyan thos dang
139b6('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par mya myong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni le lo can/ brtson 'grus med pa/ bsam
139b7('bum): bzhan pa/ mos pa dma' ba dang / shes rab 'chal pa can rnams kyis bsgrubs par dka'o// ke'u shi ka ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan bsgribs pa med pas/ nub phyog
140a1('bum): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can tshad med grangs med pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu spyod kyang
140a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i thabs mkhas pa dang mi ldan pas/ de las gcig gam gnyis shig phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par gyur gyi/ de las phal cher nyan thos dang rang sangs
140a3('bum): rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba mthong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni le lo can/ brtson 'grus med pa/ bsam pa zhan pa/ mos
140a4('bum): pa dma' ba/ shes rab 'chal pa can rnams kyis bsgrub par dka'o// ke'u shi ka ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan bsgribs pa med pas/ byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi
140a5('bum): klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can tshad med grangs med bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu spyod kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i thabs mkhas pa dang mi ldan pas/
140a6('bum): de las gcig gam gnyis shig phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur gyi/ de las phal cher nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sar gnas par 'gyur ba mthong ngo // de ci'i phyir
140a7('bum): zhe na/ ke'u shi ka bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni/ le lo can brtson 'grus med pa/ bsam pa zhan pa/ mos pa dma' ba/ shes rab 'chal ba can rnams
140b1('bum): kyis bsgrubs par dka'o// ke'u shi ka ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan bsgribs pa med pas/ byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma
140b2('bum): snyed dag na/ sems can tshad med grangs med pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chutu spyod kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i thabs mkhas pa dang mi ldan pas/ de las
140b3('bum): gcig gam gnyis shig phyir mi ldog pa'i sa gnas par 'gyur gyi/ de las phal cher nyan thos kyi sa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba mthong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/
140b4('bum): ke'u shi ka bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni le lo can/ brtson 'grus med pa/ bsam pa zhan pa/ mos pa dpa' ba/ shes rab 'chal pa can rnams kyis bsgrubs
140b5('bum): bar dka'o// ke'u shi ka ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan bsgribs pa med pas/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems
140b6('bum): can chad med grangs med pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu spyod kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i thabs mkhas pa dang mi ldan pas/ de la gcig gam gnyis
140b7('bum): shig phyir mi ldog pa'i ma la bur 'gyur gyi/ de las phal cher nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis la gnas par 'gyur ba mthong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka bla na med pa yang
141a1('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni le lo can/ brtson 'grus med pa/ bsam pazhan pa/ mos pa dma' ba/ shes rab 'chal pa can rnams kyis
141a2('bum): bsgrubs par dka'o// ke'u shi ka ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan bsgrib pa med pas/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/
141a3('bum): sems can tshad med grangs med pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu spyod kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu pa'i thabs mkhas pa dang mi ldan pas/ de bas gcig
141a4('bum): gam gnyis shig phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur gyi/ de las phal cher nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba mthong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/
141a5('bum): ke'u shi ka bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni le lo tsan/ brtson 'grus med pa/ bsam pazhan pa/ mos pa dma' ba/ shes rab 'chal pa can rnams kyis bsgrubs
141a6('bum): bar dka'o// ke'u shi ka ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan bsgribs pa med pas/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems
141a7('bum): can tshad med grangs med pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu spyod kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i thabs mkhas pa dang mi ldan pas/ de las gcig gam gnyis
141b1('bum): zhig phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur gyi/ de las phal cher nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba mthong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka bla
141b2('bum): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni le lo can brtson 'grus med pa/ bsam pa zhan pa/ mos pa dma' ba/ shes rab 'chal pa can rnams kyis bsgrub par dka'o//
141b3('bum): ke'u shi ka ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan bsgribs pa med pas/ 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can tshad med grangs med pa bla na
141b4('bum): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu spyod kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i thabs mkhas pa dang / mi ldan pas de las gcig gam gnyis shig phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la
141b5('bum): gnas par gyur gyi/ de las phal cher nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba mthong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
141b6('bum): ba'i byang chub ni le lo can brtson 'grus med pa/ bsam pazhan pa/ mos pa dpa' ba/ shes rab 'chal pa can rnams kyis bsgrub par dka'o// ke'u shi ka ngas 'di nas
141b7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi rgyun bsgribs pa med pa/ steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can tshad med grangs med pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
142a1('bum): pa'i byang chub tu spyod kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i thabs mkhas pa dang mi ldan pas/ de las gcig gam gnyis shig phyir mi ldog
142a2('bum): ba'i lha gnas par 'gyur gyi/ de las pha la cher nyan thos kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba mthong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka bla na med pa yang
142a3('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni le lo can brtson 'grus med pa/ bsam pa zhan pa/ mos pa dma' ba/ shes rab 'chal ba can rnams kyis bsgrub par dka'o// ke'u shi
142a4('bum): ka de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de dag myur zhing bde bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
142a5('bum): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod na/ yang dang yang du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mnyan par bya'o// bzung bar bya'o// bcang bar bya'o// klag
142a6('bum): par bya'o// kun chub par bya'o// tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o// de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzungs zhing bcangs pa dang / klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang /
142a7('bum): tshul bzhin du yid la bya zhing bris te/ me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba ngan mang pos rim
142b1('bum): 'gror bya'o// bkur stir bya'o// phu dung du bya'o// mchod par bya'o// dge ba'i chos gang ji snyed pa gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i nang du 'dus te/ de dag kyang
142b2('bum): bzung bar bya/ brkyang bar bya/ kun chub par bya'o// tshul bzhin du yid la bya ste/ 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i ba
142b3('bum): rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang /
142b4('bum): byi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma 'dus stong pa nyid dang / mtha'
142b5('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid
142b6('bum): stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gnas
142b7('bum): ba bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan
143a1('bum): lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms brlab zhi dang /
143a2('bum): rnams par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /
143a3('bum): gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jig pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po
143a4('bum): dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med gang ji snyed/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i nang du 'dus pa de dag kyang
143a5('bum): gzung bar bya'o// bcang bar bya'o// klag par bya'o// kun nub par bya'o// tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am/
143a6('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag ji ltar shes bar gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa sngod byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe// yang 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
143a7('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol
143b1('bum): tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus
143b2('bum): byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor bar med pa stong pa nyid dang /
143b3('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo
143b4('bum): stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po
143b5('bum): lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang /
143b6('bum): tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar brgyad dang / mthar gyi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar
143b7('bum): ba'i sgo gsum dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa
144a1('bum): bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
144a2('bum): po 'di dag dang / gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa dag la bslab pa mdzad kyis/ bdag cag gis kyang de'i rjes su bslab par bya'o// 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol
144a3('bum): tu phyin pa 'di ni bdag cag gi ston pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos gzhan tshad med pa'i bar du yang bdag cag gi ston pa ste/ de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bstan
144a4('bum): pa'o// rang sangs rgyas dang dgra bcom pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams kyis bstan pa yang 'di yin te/ 'di ltar
144a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la slob slob pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob slob pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi ba
144a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa la slob slob pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu byin sa la slob slob pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa slob slob pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la
144a7('bum): slob slob pa dang / nang stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob slob dang /
144b1('bum): chen po stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang /
144b2('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / rang bzhin stong
144b3('bum): ba nyid la slob slob pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la slob slong
144b4('bum): ba dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / dran pa
144b5('bum): nye bar gzhag pa rnams la slob slob pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la slob slob pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la slob slob pa dang / dbang po rnams la so
144b6('bum): slob pa dang / stobs rnams la slob slob pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la slob slob pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la slob slob pa dang / 'phags
144b7('bum): ba'i bden pa rnams la slob slob pa dang / bsam gtan rnams la slob slob pa dang / tshad med pa rnams la slob slob pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
145a1('bum): pa rnams la slob slob pa dang / rnam par thar pa rnams la slob slob pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la slob slob pa
145a2('bum): dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smod pa med pa la slob slob pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la slob slob pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams
145a3('bum): la slob slob pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la slob slob pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la slob slob pa dang / mi 'jig pa rnams la slob slob pa dang /
145a4('bum): so so yang dag par rigs pa bzhi la slob slob pa dang / byams pa chen po la slob slob pa dang / snying rje chen po la slob slob pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos 'dres pa rnams
145a5('bum): la slob slob pa dang / thams cad shes pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob slob
145a6('bum): ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba
145a7('bum): rnams dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams kyis kyang / pha rol tu phyin par gyur to// pha rol tu phyin to// pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar shes par 'gyur ro//
145b1('bum): ke'u shi ka de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs kyang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan la 'das kyang rung /
145b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brtan par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub
145b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gi bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la
145b4('bum): brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams
145b5('bum): cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ de dag gi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi
145b6('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye
145b7('bum): dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gi bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
146a1('bum): dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gi tshul
146a2('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems
146a3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid la brtan par
146a4('bum): bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/
146a5('bum): lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi ske dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis nang stong pa nyid la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka nang stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang rang sangs
146a6('bum): dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis phyi stong pa nyid la brtan
146a7('bum): par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka phyi stong pa nyid ni nyar thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang
146b1('bum): mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis phyi nang stong pa nyid la rten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka phyi nang stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang /
146b2('bum): rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin to// de dag gis
146b3('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zher/ ke'u shi ka stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thob dang rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
146b4('bum): dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang mi dang lba ba yin gyi skye dgri' bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis chen po stong pa nyid la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke
146b5('bum): shi ka chen po stong pa nyid ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i
146b6('bum): bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis don dam pa stong pa nyid la rten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka don dam pa stong pa nyid ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang / byang
146b7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis 'dus byas stong pa nyid la rten par
147a1('bum): bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams
147a2('bum): cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka 'dus pa
147a3('bum): byas stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi
147a4('bum): rten yin no// de dag gis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang rang sangs
147a5('bum): rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis thog ma dang tha
147a6('bum): ma med pa stong pa nyid la rten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
147a7('bum): chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang mi dang su mo yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi
147b1('bum): mdor ba med pa stong pa nyid ba can thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' sems chen po thams cad kyi chen yin te/ lha dang mi dang lham yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin
147b2('bum): no/ de dag gis rang bzhin stong pa nyid la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems
147b3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang mi dang lha mi yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis chos thams cad stong pa nyid la rten par
147b4('bum): bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin
147b5('bum): te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la rten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka rang gi mtshan nyid
147b6('bum): stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rdzas
147b7('bum): yin no// de dag gis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang / byang
148a1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gi dngos
148a2('bum): po med pa stong pa nyid la rten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka dngos po med pa stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
148a3('bum): chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang mi dang lha mi yin gyi skye dga'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la rten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u
148a4('bum): shi ka ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i
148a5('bum): bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la rten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang
148a6('bum): rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis dran
148a7('bum): pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka dran pa nye bar gzhag pa 'di ni thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
148b1('bum): chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang mi dang lha mo yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis yang dag par spong ba rnams la rten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
148b2('bum): ke'u shi ka yang dag par spong ba 'di dag ni nyan thos dang langs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin
148b3('bum): gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi keng pa rnams la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa 'di ni nyan thos dang rang sangs
148b4('bum): rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang mi dang lha mi yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis dbang po rnams la brtan
148b5('bum): par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka dbang po 'di ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te lha dang mi dang
148b6('bum): ma yin gyi skye dbu kyigyi na yin// de dag gis stobs rnams la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka stobs 'di dag ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub
148b7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i rten yin no// deg gis byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la rten par byaste/
149a1('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka byang chub kyi yan lag 'di dag ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams
149a2('bum): cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka 'phag
149a3('bum): ba'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye
149a4('bum): dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la rten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka 'phags pa'i bden pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang sangs
149a5('bum): rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis bsam gtan rnams la
149a6('bum): rten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka bsam gtan 'di dag ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/
149a7('bum): dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis tshang med pa rnams la rtun par bya ste/ ngo ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka tshad med pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang sangs/
149b1('bum): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lnga dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rte yin no// de dag gis gzugs med pa'i
149b2('bum): sgoms par 'jug pa rnams la brtan par byaste/ de tso'i phyir zhen/ 'u shi ga gzugs med pan rnams par 'dun pa bde dag ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang / bya
149b3('bum): mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi chen yin to// lnga da mi dang lda ma yin gyi skye dbu'i bar gyi rten yinan// de dag gis rnam par mthar pa rnams la ban
149b4('bum): bar bya ste/ de ci'i phyir she na/ ke'u shi ka rnam par thar pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin
149b5('bum): te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgra'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir me nu/
149b6('bum): shegasas kyi sa tsho snyoms par 'jug pa 'angad de// nyan pas dang rang sangs rgyas dang byung chub sem pa dpa sem pa pa chen pa pa sa ca kyi mi
149b7('bum): rna tshas rgya ma med kyi skye bu ma bye na// de ga'i yang pa ba can pa da na ya ba yon pa pa la ldan pa /
150a1('bum): @#phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka rnams par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa 'di ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
150a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis mngon par shes pa rnams la rten par bya ste/
150a3('bum): / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka mngon par shes pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin
150a4('bum): te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis ting nge 'dzin rnams la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka ting nge 'dzin 'di
150a5('bum): dag ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te// lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin//
150a6('bum): de dag gis gzungs kyi sgo rnams la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka gzungs kyi sgo 'di dag ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'
150a7('bum): sems dpa' chen pa thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang mi dang lce ba yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten no// de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stob sa rnams la brtan brgya/
150b1('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs 'di dag ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten
150b2('bum): yin te/ lnga dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis mi 'jig pa rnams la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka mi 'jigs pa 'di
150b3('bum): dag ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyis rten yin no// de dag
150b4('bum): gis so so yang dag par rig pa rnas la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka so so yang dag par rig pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyab dang / byang chub sems dpa'
150b5('bum): sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i rkyen yin no// de dag gis snying rje chen po la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka snying
150b6('bum): rje chen po 'di dag ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin//
150b7('bum): de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos 'dres pa rnams la brtan par bya ste/ de ni'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sem
151a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis thams cad shes pa nyid la
151a2('bum): brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka thams cad shes pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/
151a3('bum): lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi brten yin no// de dag gis lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka lam gyi rnam par shes pa
151a4('bum): nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dma' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag
151a5('bum): gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka rnams pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems
151a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// // bam po dgu pa// // ke'u shi ka
151a7('bum): rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongasu mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i phyir/ rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten 'bang du
151b1('bum): dpag ched tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad phyed pa byas ste/ de la nam mtsho'i bar du lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi 'phreng ba dang / lha rjes kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang
151b2('bum): lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi chos gos dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil
151b3('bum): snyan mang pos rim 'gror byas/ bkur bstir byas phu dung du byas mchod par byas na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ de'i phyir rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod namA mang
151b4('bum): du 'phel lam/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am
151b5('bum): rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'bris shing / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / gzhan
151b6('bum): la yang rgya cher ston cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang mi 'bral la gong du me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdug
151b7('bum): dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim 'gror byed/ bkur stir byed bu dung du byed/ mchod par byed na/ bsod nams du 'phel lo// ke'u shi ka mchod
152a1('bum): rten gcig la lta zhog go// ke'u shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas
