152a2('bum): mchod pa'i phyir/ 'dzam bu gling 'di rin po sna bdun las byas pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad phyed pas yongs su bkang ste/ de dag la nam 'tsho ba'i bar du
152a3('bum): lha rdzas kyi me tog dang lha rdzas kyi 'phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi chos gos dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas
152a4('bum): kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan mang pos rim 'gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas na/ ke'u shi ka de la ji snyam du sems
152a5('bum): de'i phyir rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lam/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo / bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo / bcom
152a6('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa
152a7('bum): dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yin la byed cing rnams pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang yang mi 'bral la/ gong du me tog dang 'phreng ba dang / spos dang /
152b1('bum): byug pa dang / phye ma dang na bza' dang / gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed bkur stir byed/ phud dung du byed/ mchod par byed na bsod
152b2('bum): nams mang du 'phel lo// ke'u shi ka 'dzam bu gling 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyis yongs su bkang ba lha zhog go/ ke'u shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu
152b3('bum): mo gang la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i phyir gling ba'i 'jig rten gyis khams 'di rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i mchod rten 'phang du
152b4('bum): dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad phyed pas yongs su bkang ste/ de dag la nam 'tsho'i bar du lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi 'phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi
152b5('bum): byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi chos gos dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas
152b6('bum): kyi sil snyan mang pos rim 'gror byas/ bkur sti byas/ phu dung du byas/ mchod par byas na ke'u shi ka de la ji snyam du sems/ de'i phyir rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams
152b7('bum): mang du 'phel lam/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas kyang rig
153a1('bum): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du byas te/ 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang klog pa dang / kun par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin
153a2('bum): du yid la byed pa dang / bris shing me tog dang 'phreng ba dang / spos dang byug pa dang / phye ma dang na bza' dang / gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim 'gror
153a3('bum): byed bkur stir byed/ phu dud du byed/ mchod par byed na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// ke'u shi ka gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod
153a4('bum): rten gyi yongs su bkang ba lta zhog gi/ ke'u shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ mchod
153a5('bum): ba'i phyir stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu 'di rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad phyed pas yongs su bkang ste/ de dag la
153a6('bum): nam 'tshe'i bar du lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi 'phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byus pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi chos gos dang /
153a7('bum): byin bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyisil snyan mang pos rim gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ phu dung du bus/ mchod par byas na ke
153a8('bum): lnga rdzas kyi ba dan dang /
153b1('bum): shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ de'i phyir rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lam/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar
153b2('bum): gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rig kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du byas
153b3('bum): shing 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / bris shing me dog dang / phreng ba dang / pes dang /
153b4('bum): byug pa dang / phye ma dang na bza' dang / gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed bkur stir byed/ phu dud du byed/ mchod par byed

153b6('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i phyir/ 'jig rten gi khams 'bring po stong gnyis pa 'di
153b7('bum): rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i mchod rten 'bang dung bag chad tsal/ rgyar dpag cang byed pas yongs su bkang ste/ de dag la nam 'tsho'i bar du lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rngas
154a1('bum): kyi 'phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi chos gos dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha
154a2('bum): rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan mang pos rim 'gror byas/ bkur bstir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod
154a3('bum): par byas na ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ de'i phyir rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lam/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
154a4('bum): mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
154a5('bum): ba 'di bris shing 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing / me tog dang 'phreng ba dang spos dang byug pa dang phye ma dang /
154a6('bum): na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sel snyan sna tshogs kyis rim 'gror byed/ bkur bstir byed/ phu dud du byed/ mchod par byed na/ de'i bsod
154a7('bum): nams ches mang du 'phel lo// ke'u shi ka 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po stong gnyis pa 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyis yongs su bkang ba lta zhog gi/ ke'u shi
154b1('bum): ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i phyir/ stong gsum gyis stong chen po'i 'jig rten
154b2('bum): gyi khams rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad byed pas yongs su bkang ste/ de dag la nam 'tsho'i bar du lha rdzas kyi me tog dang /
154b3('bum): lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi bye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi chos gos dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang /
154b4('bum): lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil sran mang pos rim gror byas/ bkur bstir bus/ bung dung du byas/ mchod par byas na ke'u shi ka de ji
154b5('bum): snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lam/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mdo/
154b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin par byed/ 'phang bar byed/ klog pa
154b7('bum): byed/ kun chub par byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing / me tog dang 'phreng ba dang / blos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na baba' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshar dang /
155a1('bum): ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim 'gror byed/ bkur bstir byed/ pu dud du byed/ mchod par byed na bsod nams che mang du 'phel lo// ke'u shi ka
155a2('bum): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyis yongs su bkang ba lta zhog gi/ ke'u shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
155a3('bum): na sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag las sems can re res de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i phyir/ rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i mchod rten 'dra
155a4('bum): du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad phyed pa sha stag byas te/ de dag la nam 'tsho'i ba'i bar du lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi 'phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas
155a5('bum): kyi byug dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi chos gos dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan mang pos rim
155a6('bum): 'gror byas/ bkur bstir byas/ phu dung du byas/ mchod par byas ga rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing / gzungs pa dang / bcangs
155a7('bum): ba dang / klags pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang yang ma bral bar bya ste/ de la me tog dang /
155b1('bum): 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byab pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byas/ bkur bstir byas/
155b2('bum): phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas na/ de nyid bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// rgya byin gyi gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de de lags so// bde bar gshegs pa de de
155b3('bum): lags te/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rim 'gror bgyis pa dang / bkur bstir bgyis pa dang / phu dung du bgyis pa dang / mchod par bgyis pas ni/ 'das pa dang /
155b4('bum): ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la rim 'gror bgyis pa dang / bkur bstir bgyis pa dang / phu dud
155b5('bum): du bgyis pa dang / mchod par bgyid par 'gyur ro// shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na sems can ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag las/ sems can
155b6('bum): re res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod pa'i slad du rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag ched tsam la/ rgyar dpag chad phyed pa
155b7('bum): sha stag bgyis te/ de dag la bskal pa 'am bskal pa'i lha mar lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi 'phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi
156a1('bum): phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan
156a2('bum): sna tshogs kyis rim 'gror bgyis/ bkur bstir bgyis/ phu dud du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis pa dang / lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sem
156a3('bum): can ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag las sems can re res kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i slad du rin po sna bdun las bgyis pa'i mchod
156a4('bum): rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad phyed pa sha stag bgyis te/ de dag la bskal pa'i lhag mar lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi 'phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos
156a5('bum): dang lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi
156a6('bum): sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim 'gror bgyis/ bkur bstir bgyis/ pu dud du bgyis// mchod par bgyis pa dang / nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi
156a7('bum): bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag las sems can re res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i slad du rin po che sna bdun
156b1('bum): las bgyis pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad phyed pa sha stag bgyis te de dag la bskal pa 'am bskal pa'i lhag mar lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas/
156b2('bum): kyi 'breng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang /
156b3('bum): g+ha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan sna tshogs kyi sa rim 'gror bgyis/ bkur bstir bgyis/ bu dung ngu bgyis/ mchod par bgyis pa dang / byang phyogs kyi 'ji
156b4('bum): rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag las sems can re res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod
156b5('bum): ba'i slad du/ rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam/ rgyang dpag tshad byed pa sha stag bgyis te/ de dag la bskal pa 'am bskal pa'i lhag
156b6('bum): mar lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdug
156b7('bum): dang lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim 'gror bgyis/ bkur bstir bgyis/ phu dung du bgyis/ mchod par
157a1('bum): bgyis dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi klung gi bye ba snyed na sems can ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag las sems
157a2('bum): can re res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i slad du rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad
157a3('bum): phyed pa sha stag bgyis ste/ de dag las bskal pa 'am bskal pa'i lhar mar lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi 'phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha
157a4('bum): rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis/
157a5('bum): bkur bstir bgyis/ phu dung du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis pa dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na sems can ji snyed cig mchis
157a6('bum): bde dag las sems can re res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i slad du rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/
157a7('bum): rgyar dpag chad byed pa sha stag bgyis te/ de dag la bskal pa'am bskal pa'i sdug mar lda rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi 'phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang /
157b1('bum): lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan sna tshogs kyi rim gror bgyis/
157b2('bum): bkur bstir bgyis/ phu dung du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis pa dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed cig mchis
157b3('bum): pa de dag las sems can re res kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i slad du rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/
157b4('bum): rgyar dpag tshad byed pa sha stag bgyis te/ de dag la bskal pa'am bskal pa'i lhag mar lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi 'phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug
157b5('bum): ba dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim
157b6('bum): gror bgyis/ bkur bstir bgyis/ phu dung du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis pa dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems
157b7('bum): can ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag las sems can re res kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i slad du rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i mchod
158a1('bum): sh+ya/ rten 'phang du dpag ched tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad phyed pa sha stag bgyis ste/ de dag la bskal pa 'am bskal pa'i lhag mar lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas
158a2('bum): kyi 'phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi bye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas
158a3('bum): kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis/ bkur bstir bgyis/ phu dud du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis pa dang / 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi kham
158a4('bum): gang ga'i klung gi bye ma byed dag na/ sems can ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag las sems can re res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i slad du
158a5('bum): rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i mchod rten 'bang du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad phyed pa sha stag bgyis te/ de dag la bskal pa 'am bskal pa'i lhag mar lha rdzas
158a6('bum): kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi 'breng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi bye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi
158a7('bum): rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis/ bkur bstir bgyis/ phu dud du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis pa dang / steng
158b1('bum): gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag las sems can re res kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan
158b2('bum): las 'das nas mchod pa'i slad du/ rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag chad phyed pa sha stag bgyis ste/ de dag la bskal pa
158b3('bum): 'am bskal pa'i lhag mar lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi 'phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyis byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang /
158b4('bum): rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyis ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis/ bkur bstir bgyis/ phu dud du bgyis/
158b5('bum): mchod par bgyis na/ bcom ldan 'das de la ji ltar dgongs/ de'i slad du rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bsod nams mang du 'phel ba lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das
158b6('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka mang ngo // brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
158b7('bum): bris shing 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid cing de la me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs
159a1('bum): / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sel snyan sna tshogs kyis ri ma gror bgyis/ bkur bstir bgyis/ bu dud du bgyid/ mchod par bgyis na/ bsod napas ches mang
159a2('bum): 'phel lo// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 'di'i nang du dge ba'i chos thams cad 'dus te 'di ltar dge bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang / bsam gtan
159a3('bum): bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol
159a4('bum): tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang /
159a5('bum): nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
159a6('bum): dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /
159a7('bum): mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang /
159b1('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam brgyad pa
159b2('bum): dang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang /
159b3('bum): lam bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs
159b4('bum): gyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jig pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang /
159b5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / thams cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'dus so// de ni sang
159b6('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bstan pa ste/ de la bslabs shing 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas bcom
159b7('bum): ldan 'das thams cad kyis chos thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin par gyur to// phyin to// byin par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u sra dgu /
160a1('bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ke'u shi ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu 'am
160a2('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing glegs bam du byas te/ 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing
160a3('bum): kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing / gong du me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan
160a4('bum): dang ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byas/ bkur bstir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas na/ de'i phyir rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bsod
160a5('bum): nams ni tshad med/ bsam gyi mi khyab mtshungs pa med dpag tu med par 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa
160a6('bum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shes
160a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
160b1('bum): byung ba ni tshul khrums kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni nang stong pa
160b2('bum): nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni phyi stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyid pa las byung ba ni phyi nang stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
160b3('bum): las byung ba ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni chen po stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni ngor dab pa stong pa nyid//
160b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
160b5('bum): ba las byung ba ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byad ni/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
160b6('bum): las byung ba ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// sher rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni chos thams cad
160b7('bum): stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi
161a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha
161a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu
161a3('bum): phyin pa las byung ni yang dag par spong ba rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni
161a4('bum): dbang po rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni stobs rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so// shes
161a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so// shes rab
161a6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni bsam gtan rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni tshad med pa rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni
161a7('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ rnam par thar pa rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ni/
161b1('bum): mthar gyi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'o//
161b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni mngon par shes pa rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni ting nge 'dzin rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
161b3('bum): pas byung ba ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni
161b4('bum): mi 'jigs pa rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni byams pa chen po'o//
161b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin pa las byung ba ni snying rje chen po'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so// shes rab kyi pha
161b6('bum): rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan lnga'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni sems can yongs su smin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su da//
161b7('bum): ba'o// ke'u shika shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni thams cad shes pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ngo // shes
162a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// ke'u shi ka shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni nyan thos kyi theg pa'o//
162a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni theg pa chen po'o// ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu
162a3('bum): byin pa las byung ba ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub po// ke'u shi ka de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
162a4('bum): bris te glegs bam du byas shing 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byag
162a5('bum): pa dang / phye ma dang na bza' dang / gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis/ bkur bstir bgyis/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas na/
162a6('bum): bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba 'di la/ bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba snga mas brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro// stong gi cha dang brgya phrag stong gi cha dang / bye ba'i cha dang /
162a7('bum): bye ba brgya'i cha dang / bye ba steng gi cha dang / bye ba brgya phrag stong gi cha dang / grangs dang cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dper yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ rgyud yang nye bar mi bzod do// de
162b1('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ji srid du 'dzam bu gling na gnas pa de srid du sangs rgyas dkon mchog nub par mi 'gyur ro// chos dkon mchog
162b2('bum): nub mi 'gyur ro// dge 'dun dkon mchog nub par mi 'gyur ro// de srid du dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bsam gtan bzhi rnam
162b3('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chang med pa bzhi rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi rnams 'jig du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
162b4('bum): mngon par shes pa lnga rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung
162b5('bum): bar 'gyur ro// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzi
162b6('bum): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// phyi stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung
162b7('bum): bar 'gyur ro// phying stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chen po stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur//
163a1('bum): dor dam pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'jig
163a2('bum): rten du 'gyur bar 'gyur ro// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dong
163a3('bum): ba med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyuraro//
163a4('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung
163a5('bum): bar 'gyur ro// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams
163a6('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// yang dag par spong ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dbang po rnams
163a7('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// stobs rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'bag pa'i lam yan
163b1('bum): lag brgyad pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bsam gtan rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
163b2('bum): tshad med pa rnams 'jigs rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rnam par thar pa rnams 'jig
163b3('bum): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mthar gyi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang
163b4('bum): smon pa med pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gzu
163b5('bum): kyi sgo rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mi 'jigs rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
163b6('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byams pa chen po rnams rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// snying rje chen po 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
163b7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// thams cad shes pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa
164a1('bum): nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de srid du rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams
164a2('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar
164a3('bum): 'gyur ro// rgyal chen bzhi'i rigs kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'tshe ma'i lha rnams
164a4('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
164a5('bum): tshangs ris kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung /
164a6('bum): tshangs chen gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// snang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chung snang gi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chad
164a7('bum): med snang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// kun snang ngang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dge ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
164b1('bum): chung dge'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
164b2('bum): che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chung che'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshad med che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'bras bu che
164b3('bum): ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mi che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// shin tu mthong ba'i
164b4('bum): lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'og min gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhugs
164b5('bum): pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / yang dag par
164b6('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'byung ba yod do// bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yedo/
164b7('bum): chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yod do// sems can yongs su smin pa yod do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa yo // de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khan
165a1('bum): 'di na/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang / mtshe ma'i lha rnams dang / dga' ldan gyi rnams dang / 'phrul dga'i
165a2('bum): lha rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams dang / tshangs
165a3('bum): chen gyi lha rnams dang / snang ba'i lha rnams dang / chung snang gi rnams dang / tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams dang / kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams dang / dge ba'i lha rnams dang / chung
165a4('bum): dge'i lha rnams dang / dge rgyas kyi lha rnams dang / che ba'i lha rnams dang / chung che'i lha rnams dang / tshad med che ba'i lha rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams dang /
165a5('bum): che ba'i lha rnams dang / mi gdung ba'i lha rnams dang / shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams dang / gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha gang ji snyed yod pa de la lha'i dbang po
165a6('bum): brgya byin gyis smras pa/ grogs po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzungs par bya'o// grogs por dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bcang bar bya'o// grogs po dag shes rab
165a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa klag par bya'o// grogs po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kun chub par bya'o// grogs po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o// grog
165b1('bum): po dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzungs pa dang / bcang ba dang klags pa dang / kun chub par byas pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byas pas ni sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun 'char
165b2('bum): par mi 'gyur ro// chos kyi tshul rgyun 'chang par mi 'gyur ro// dge 'dun gyi tshul rgyun 'chad par mi 'gyur ro// grogs po dag sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun ma chad la grogs
165b3('bum): po dag chos kyi tshul rgyun ma chad de/ grogs po dag dge 'dun gyi tshul rgyun ma chad na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
165b4('bum): phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bsam
165b5('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyuraro//
165b6('bum): phyi stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// phyi nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chen po stong pa
165b7('bum): nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// don dam pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'dus ma byas
166a1('bum): stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa
166a2('bum): nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chos thams cad stong
166a3('bum): ba nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dngos po
166a4('bum): med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/
166a5('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag kha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// yang dag par spong ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ba
166a6('bum): 'gyur ro// dbang po rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// stobs rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
166a7('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bsam gtan rnams 'dzi/
166b1('bum): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshad med pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
166b2('bum): rnam par mthar pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mthar gyi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rnam par thar pa
166b3('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin
166b4('bum): rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams 'jig rten du 'byung
166b5('bum): bar 'gyur ro// mi 'jig pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// snying rje chen po 'dzin
166b6('bum): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems da pe'i spyod pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyuraro//
166b7('bum): rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'jig
167a1('bum): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rang byang chub 'jig rten du 'gyur bar 'gyur ro// bla na med pa
167a2('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka khyod kyis shes
167a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di zung shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ ke'u shi ka khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshul bzhin du yid
167a4('bum): la gyis shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka nam lha ma yin rnams 'di snyam du sems shing / sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang thab mo bya'o// sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha
167a5('bum): rnams dang mtshams bsngal lo snyam na/ de'i tshe ke'u shi ka khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yid kyis soms la/ kha thon gyis shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis
167a6('bum): shig dang / des lha ma yin gyi bsam pa de dag phyir nub par 'gyur te/ sems skyed pa de dag slobs shig/ rnam par 'phel bar mi 'gyur ro// lha'i bu dang lha'i bu
167a7('bum): mo gang dag 'chi 'pho ba'i tshe nam bdag ngan song du skye bar mthong na yang / ke'u shi ka khyod kyis de dag gi mdun du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di kha thon du gyis shig da /
167b1('bum): de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mos pas lha'i gnas de nyid du skye bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
167b2('bum): ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ngos pa ni de ltar don dang ldan pa ste/ rigs kyi bu 'ab rigs kyi bu mo gang su yang rung ste/ gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
167b3('bum): pa 'di thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / dge ba'i rtsa ba des mthar gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// /
167b4('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa
167b5('bum): snyed cig 'byung ba de dag kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs nas/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// ma
167b6('bum): byon pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig 'byung ba de dag kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol
167b7('bum): tu phyin pa 'di nyid bslabs shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs pa 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// de ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
168a1('bum): na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'jo sgru
168a2('bum): ba de dag thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//
168a3('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i nang du nyan thos kyis chos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos
168a4('bum): sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang rung ste/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad 'dus so// brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
168a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rigs sngags chen mo'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ bla na med pa'i rigs sngags so// bcom ldan 'das
168a6('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rigs sngags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi
168a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa ni mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spong ba'o// dge ba'i chos thams cad sgrub pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de de bzhin no//
168b1('bum): de de bzhin te/ ke'u shi ka 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rigs sngags chen po'o// ke'u shi ka 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bla na med pa'i rig pa
168b2('bum): sngags so// ke'u shi ka 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu byed pa 'di ni mi mnyams pa dang mnyam pa'i rigs sngags so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'das
168b3('bum): ba'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig byung ba de dag kyang rigs sngags 'di nyid la brten te/ bla na med pa yang dag par
168b4('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag kyang rigs sngags
168b5('bum): 'di nyid la rton de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang bar 'gyur ro// da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gsheg
168b6('bum): ba dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig bzhugs shing / 'tsho skyong ba de dag kyang rigs sngags 'di nyid la brten te/ bla na med pa
168b7('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka 'di 'di ltar rigs sngags 'di yod na dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam
169a1('bum): n+ya/ rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ bsam gtan bzhi 'jigs rten na yod pa yin/ tshad med pa bzhi 'jigs rten na yod pa yin/ gzugs med pa'i
169a2('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ mngon par shes pa lnga 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ tshul khrims
169a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ bsam gtan
169a4('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ phyi stong pa nyid 'jig rten
169a5('bum): na yod pa yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid 'jigs rten na yod pa yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ chen po stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ don dam
169a6('bum): pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ mtha' las 'das pa
169a7('bum): stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ rang bzhin stong
169b1('bum): nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid 'jig
169b2('bum): rten na yod pa yin/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten ra yod
169b3('bum): pa yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams 'jig rten na yod na yin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ rdzu 'phral gyi rkang pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/
169b4('bum): dbang po rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ stobs rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 'jig rten na yong pa yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
169b5('bum): brgyad pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ bsam gtan rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ tshad med pa rnams 'jig rten na
169b6('bum): yod pa yin/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ rnam par mthar pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms pa
169b7('bum): 'jug pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ mngon par shes pa rnams
170a1('bum): 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
170a2('bum): rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ mi 'jig pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ byams po 'jig rten na yod pa yin//
170a3('bum): snying rje chen po 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyis chos 'dres pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ chos kyi dbyings 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ yang dag pa'i mtha' bajig
170a4('bum): rten na yod pa yin/ de bzhin nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ chos
170a5('bum): nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ chos kyi gnas nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ chos skyon med pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ mig lnga 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ rgyun
170a6('bum): tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'jig rten na yod pa yin/
170a7('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ rang byang chub 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ thams cad shes pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ lam gyi rnams pa shes pa nyid 'jig
170a8('bum): rten na yod pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin// / bam po bcu pa// // ke'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa'
170b1('bum): yod na dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ bsam gtan bzhi 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ tshad med pa bzhi 'jig rten na gdags
170b2('bum): su yod pa yin/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug bzhi 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ mngon par shes pa lnga 'dzag rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ sbyin pa'i pha
170b3('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na gdags su yong ba yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na gangags
170b4('bum): su yod pa yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ shes
170b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ bye stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ phyi nang
170b6('bum): stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yong ba yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ chen po stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yong ba yin/
170b7('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid 'jigs rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'jigs rten na yod pa yin/
171a1('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ ngo
171a2('bum): ba med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod
171a3('bum): pa yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ mi gamigs pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gangs
171a4('bum): su yod pa yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jigs rten na gdag su yod pa yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jigs rten na gdag su yod pa yon/ dran pa nye bar gzhags pa rnams 'jig rten
171a5('bum): na gdag su yod pa yin/ yang dag par spong ba rnam 'jig rten na gdag su yod pa yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnam 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ dbang po rnams 'jig rten na gdag su
171a6('bum): yod pa yin/ stobs rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 'jig rten na gdag su yod pa yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'jig rten na
171a7('bum): yod pa yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ rnam par mthar pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ mthar gyi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
171a8('bum): dang pogs dang 'di cang men no
171b1('bum): pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams 'jig rten
171b2('bum): na gdags su yod pa yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ mi 'jigs
171b3('bum): pa rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ snying rje chen po rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod
171b4('bum): pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ thams cad shes pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa/
171b5('bum): nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ rnams thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/
171b6('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ phyir mi 'ong ba 'jig rten na gdag su yod pa yin/ dgra bcom pa 'jig rten na gangag su yod pa yin/ sangs rgyas
171b7('bum): 'jig rten na gangag su yod pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yA dag pA pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten na gdag su yod pa yin no// ke'u shi ka 'di ltar dper na/ zla ba'i dkyil
172a1('bum): 'khor yod na/ rtsi dang rgyu skar dang / skar ma thams cad gdags su song ngo // ke'u shi ka de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yod na/
172a2('bum): dge ba'i spyod pa dang / yang dag pa'i spong ba dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / mngon par
172a3('bum): shes pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / rnam pa/
172a4('bum): thar pa dang / mthar gyi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jig pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs
172a5('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i rtsi thams cad gdags su yod do// slob pa dang / mi slob pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi rgyu skar dang skar ma thams cad kyang gdags
172a6('bum): su yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang 'jig rten na yod par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
172a7('bum): 'jig rten du ma byung ba de'i tshe yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can rnams la 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos ston to// de ci'i
172b1('bum): phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / theg pa chen po rnams te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thab
172b2('bum): mkhas pa gang dang ldan pas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu ba la sbyong ba dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spong ba dang / brtson 'grus
172b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / nang stong pa nyid lo spyod pa dang / byi stong pa
172b4('bum): nyid la spong ba dang / byin stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid la spong ba dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la spong pa dang / 'dus
172b5('bum): byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la
172b6('bum): spong ba dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la
172b7('bum): spyod pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spong ba dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
173a1('bum): @pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhags pa rnams la spyod pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa mas
173a2('bum): la spyod pa dang / dbang po rnams la spong ba dang / stobs rnams la spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod pa dang / 'phags pi lam yan lag brgyad pa
173a3('bum): la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod pa dang / bsag gtan rnams la spyod pa dang / tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms
173a4('bum): par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa dang / rnam par thar pa rnams la spyod pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms pa 'jug pa dgu la spyod pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
173a5('bum): dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa la spyod pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spong ba dang / de bzhin
173a6('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la spyod pa dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams la spyod pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la sbyong ba dang / snying rje chen po la skyong ba dang / sangs
173a7('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la spong ba dang / nyan thos kyi sar mi ltung ba dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa mngon tu mi byed pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par byed pa
173b1('bum): dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa dang / tshe phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / sems can phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / sangs
173b2('bum): rgyas kyi zhing phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa rjes su thob
173b3('bum): bar byed pa'i thabs mkhas pa de yang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung bar rig par bya'o// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes
173b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de ni tshe 'di'i yon tan 'di dag dang / tshe rabs
173b5('bum): gzhan gyi yon tan 'di dag dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
173b6('bum): 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de'i tshe 'di'i yon tan gang dang ldan par 'gyur ba lags/ bcom
173b7('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed
174a1('bum): / pa dang / tshul bzhin du yin la byed pa dang / sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ma togs par dug gis dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/ mtshon gyis dus byed
174a2('bum): par mi 'gyur ro// mes dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// chus dus byed par mi 'gyur ba nas/ nad brgya rtsa gcig gi bar gyis dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// rgyal po dang bla nas gnod par/
174a3('bum): bya ba zhig byung ba las/ gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di kha thon du byed cing / rgyal po'i pho brang du song na la glags tshol ba de dag
174a4('bum): gis klags mi rnyed de/ rgyal po'i bu dang rgyal po'i blon po chen po dag kyang gtam 'dri ba dang / gtam bya bar sems zhing dag par bya bar sems so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
174a5('bum): de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid gzi brjid dang mthus de ltar sems so// gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di kha thon
174a6('bum): byed cing rgyal po'i pho brang du song na/ de rgyal po'i bu bam rgyal po'i blon po chen po dag kyang dga' ba'i tshig gis gtam 'dri ba dang gtam bya bar sems shing / dga'
174a7('bum): bar bya bar sems par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems
174b1('bum): dga' ba'i seMs dang
174b2('bum): nye bar gzhag/ snying rje'i sems dang / btang snyoms kyi sems nye bar gzhag pa'i phyir te/ ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol
174b3('bum): tu phyin pa 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de ni tshe 'di'i yon tan de dag dang ldan par 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka rme
174b4('bum): rabs gzhan gyi yon tan gang dang ldan par 'gyur zhe na/ 'di lta ste nam yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang bral bar mi 'gyur te/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med
174b5('bum): pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /
174b6('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / lam rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam
174b7('bum): gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnam
174b8('bum): dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /
175a1('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams
175a2('bum): dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// de sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i smon lam gyi dbang po gtogs par nam yang sems can dmyal ba mi skye/ byol song gi skye gnas su
175a3('bum): mi skye/ shin rje'i 'jig rten du mi skye'o// de nam yang yan lag nyams par can du mi 'gyur/ nam yang dbul po'i rigs su mi skye/ smig mkhan gyi rigs sam/ sleg
175a4('bum): can gyi rigs sam/ mgar ba 'am/ phyag dar ba'am shan pa 'bag gsod pa'i rigs sam/ dmangs rigs su mi skye ste/ rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par/ mi chen po'i mtshan
175a5('bum): sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang ldan par 'gyur/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag du rdzus
175a6('bum): shing skye bar 'gyur ro// nam yang byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// de 'dod na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la blta ba dang /
175a7('bum): phyag pa dang / bsnyen bkur ba dang / chos nyan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur te/ de sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing
175b1('bum): du 'gro zhing / sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo
175b2('bum): yon tan 'di dag phun sum mtshogs par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzungs par bya/ bcang bar bya/ klog par bya/ kun chub par bya// tshul bzhin du yid
175b3('bum): la bya/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bar bya ste/ de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs spangs rgyas kyi bar du tshe 'di'i
175b4('bum): yon tan dang tshe rabs gzhan gyi yon tan de dag dang ldan par 'gyuraro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las// // le'u nyi shu pa'o// /
175b5('bum): de nas mu stegs can gzhan kun tu rgyu ba klags blta ba'i bsam pa can brgya tsam/ zhig bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su dong ba dang / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di
175b6('bum): snyams du sems par gyur te/ mu stegs can gzhan kun tu rgyu ba brgya po klags blta ba'i bsam pa can 'di dag bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong na/ de la bdag gis ci nas
175b7('bum): kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brjod pas mu stegs can gzhan dang kun tu rgyu ba 'di dag bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas bar chad byed par mi 'gyur bar bdag gis bcom ldan
176a1('bum): 'das las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las ji snyed cig gzung bar de dag kha thon du bya'o snyam nas/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das
176a2('bum): las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las ji snyed cig bzung ba de dag kha thon du brjod do// de nas mu stegs can gzhan yang kun tu rgyu ba de dag gis rgyang rnying po nas/ bcom ldan
176a3('bum): 'das la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ lam de nyid dang / sgo de nyid nas phyir dong ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di snyam du gyur te/ de ltar mu stegs gzhan
176a4('bum): dang kun tu rgyu ba de dag gis rgyang ring po nas bcom ldan 'das la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/ lam de nyid dang sgo de nyid nas phyir dong na/ de ci'i rgyu zhig snyam pa dang / de nas
176a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu'i sems kyi kun tu rtog pa thugs su chung nas/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni lha'i dbang
176a6('bum): po brgya byin gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par bsam pas/ de'i phyir mu stegs can gzhan dang / kun tu rgyu ba de 'di dag rgyang ring po nas nga la g.yas phyogs
176a7('bum): su bskor ba byas/ lam de nyid dang sgo de nyid nas phyir dong ba yin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu mu stegs can gzhan dang kun tu rgyu ba 'di dag las 'ga' tsam la yang dkar po'i sa
176b1('bum): dang ldan pa ma mthong ste/ mu stegs can gzhan dang kun tu rgyu ba de dag thams cad ni gnod par bya ba'i sems dang ldan pa klags lta ba'i bsam pa can sha stag ste/ 'khor 'dir/
176b2('bum): 'ong bar sems pa sha stag kyang sha ra dwa ti'i bu ngas ni/ 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/ bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge slong dang bram zer bcas pa'i
176b3('bum): skye dgu'i nang na/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di snyan pa'i tshe/ zhe sdang ba'i sems dang / glags lta ba'i bsam pas nye bar 'gro bar mthong ste/ de ni gnas med do//
176b4('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni 'di ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum dang /
176b5('bum): mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang lha'i bu dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs lha nye pan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang /
176b6('bum): tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad med snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dge ra dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang /
176b7('bum): tshad med che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og sbyin gyi lha gang ji snyed cig yod pa dang /
176b8('bum): pipad da ge ba
177a1('bum): bya/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas ji snyed cig yod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
177a2('bum): phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang shar phyogs
177a3('bum): kyis 'jig rten gyi khaMs gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang / rang sangs
177a4('bum): rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri ba dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po
177a5('bum): gang ji snyed cig pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su gzung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
177a6('bum): pa las byung ba sha stag go// lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa tso snyed
177a7('bum): cig bzhugs pa dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems chen po dang / lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang /
177b1('bum): mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu bla 'di yongs su bzung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste de dag
177b2('bum): thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go/ nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khamaso gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
177b3('bum): 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / lha dang klu dang gnod
177b4('bum): sprin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am cing dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang / shes rab kyi
177b5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag thams cad ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go/ byang phyogs kyi 'jig
177b6('bum): rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub
177b7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed
178a1('bum): cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes
178a2('bum): kA/ rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go/ byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan
178a3('bum): thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin
178a4('bum): dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / namakha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongasu
178a5('bum): bzung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go// shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
178a6('bum): gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems
178a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / lha dang klu dang / gnod sprin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed cig
178b1('bum): yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung
178b2('bum): ba sha stag go/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa
178b3('bum): ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha'
178b4('bum): lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar
178b5('bum): de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas
178b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / lha dang klu dang /
178b7('bum): gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs
179a1('bum): bzung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go/ 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten
179a2('bum): gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dus dang bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang /
179a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto ba phye
179a4('bum): chen po gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag thams
179a5('bum): cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go/ steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
179a6('bum): nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyi
179a7('bum): dang dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
179b1('bum): pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go/ de nas bdud sdig to can 'di snyam
179b2('bum): du sems par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'khor bzhi po 'di dag kyang mngon du gyur/ 'dod pa na spong ba dang //
179b3('bum): gzugs na spyod pa'i lha 'di dag kyang mngon tu gyur pa las 'di ni gdon mi za bar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs po'i
179b4('bum): byang chub tu lung ston par 'gyur gyi/ de la bdag gis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/ bar chad bya'o snyam nas/ bdud sdig to can gyis dpung gyi tshogs yan
179b5('bum): lag bzhi pa mngon par sprul nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der 'gro 'dod par gyur pa dang / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems par gyur to// kye ma
179b6('bum): bdud sdig to can dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa mngon par sprul te/ bcom ldan 'das ga na ba der 'gro bar 'dod la/ bdud sdig to can gyi dpung gi tshogs yan
179b7('bum): lag bzhi bkod pa 'di ni/ rgyal po 'bim pi sa ra'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa rnam par bkod pas kyang de tsam mi phod/ rgyal po sde rab tu 'pham byed dang /
180a1('bum): shag kya rnams dang / le tsa byi rnams kyi dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa rnam par dkod pas kyang de tsam mi phod do// bdud sdig to can 'di ni yun
180a2('bum): ring po nas bcom ldan 'das la yang klags lta zhing glags tshol/ sems can yang dag par brtson pa rnams la'ang gtse ba'i bsam pa can yin gyis/ bdag gis shes rab
180a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang dag par bsam par bya'o// dran pas brjod par bya'o snyam nas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang dag par bsams
180a4('bum): te dran pas gsal bar brjod pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis ji lta ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gsal bas brjod pa/ de lta de ltar bdud sdig to can de
180a5('bum): ngag lam de nyid dang sgo de nyid nas phyir log go// de nas 'khor de na rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu dang / 'og min gyi lha'i bar du ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag gis/ lha rdzas
180a6('bum): kyi me tog dang / na bza' mang po mngon par sprul nas/ bar snang gi nam mkha' la 'khod pa bzhin du bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der gtor te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der
180a7('bum): mngon par gtor nas tshig 'di skad du brjod do// 'dzam bu gling gi mi 'di rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la yun ring por sprod par gyur cig/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi dag
180b1('bum): ji srid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de srid du/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang nub par mi 'gyur la/ dam pa'i
180b2('bum): chos kyang yun ring du gnas shing / dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur zhe'o// 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams ji srid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
180b3('bum): 'di la spod pa de srid du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang / phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
180b4('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang nub par mi 'gyur la/ dam pa'i chos kyang yun ring du gnas shing / dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur zhe'o//
180b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi spyod pa khyad par du 'phags pa'ang yod par 'gyur zhe'o// phyogs gang na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes
180b6('bum): rang kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing / glegs bam du byas te 'chang ba'i phyogs de ni snang ba dang ldan par rig par bya'o// phyogs de ni 'gon dang khacas shing mun pa dang /
180b7('bum): bral bar rig par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang 'og min gyi bar gyi lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ke'u shi ka de de bzhin no//
181a1('bum): de de bzhin te/ lha'i bu dag de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ji srid du 'dzam bu'i gling gi rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spod pa
181a2('bum): de srid du/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang nub par mi 'gyur la/ dam pa'i chos kyang rnying du gnas shing dge 'dun dkon
181a3('bum): mchog kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang / phyogs bcu kun tu 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar gyi de bzhin gshegs
181a4('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang nub par mi 'gyur la/ dam pa'i chos kyang yun ring du gnas shing / dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang 'jig rten
181a5('bum): du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi spyod pa khyad par du 'phags pa yang yod par 'gyur ro// phyogs gang na rigs kyi bu
181a6('bum): 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing glegs bam du byas te/ 'chang ba'i phyogs de ni snang ba dang ldan par ngas shes so// phyogs
181a7('bum): de ni 'gon dang bcas shing mun pa dang bral bar ngas shes so// de nas lha'i bu de dag gis lha rdzas kyi me tog mang po mngon par sprul nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang
181b1('bum): na ba der mngon par gtor to// 'di skad kyi tshig brjod do// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin
181b2('bum): ba dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid cing tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de la bdud dam bdud kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha glags tshol ba rnams
181b3('bum): kyis glags mi rnyed do// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de la rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par srung ba dang / skyab pa dang / bskyang bar
181b4('bum): bya'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa de 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa
181b5('bum): dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de ni/ ston pa 'am ston pa dang mtshungs pa tsam du bdag cag sems so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das
181b6('bum): la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lang 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub
181b7('bum): bar bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de/ ngag ni dge ba'i rtsab dma' ba dang ldan pa ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo
182a1('bum): / gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun nub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag ni//
182a2('bum): sngon gyi rgyal ba la bgyi bar bgyis par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang /
182a3('bum): klog cing chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag ni sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur bgyis par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'i
182a4('bum): rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag ni dge ba'i/
182a5('bum): bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las rnam pa thams cad mkhyer
182a6('bum): pa nyid btsal bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa btsal bar bya'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/
182a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di lta shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan ljags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
