213b4('bum): gnas gtsang mi'i ris kyi lha dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og min gyi lha dang / de ma yin pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang /
213b5('bum): dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / gzi brjid che bar bya ba mang po dag kyang der dong zhig/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di klag
213b6('bum): ba dang / gzung ba dang / kun chub par bya ba dang / gdud pa byas shing phyir 'dong bar sems so// ke'u shi ka de la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis kyang sems 'di ltar bskyed
213b7('bum): bar bya ste/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul
214a1('bum): dbang byed dang / tshangs ris kyi lha dang / tshangs lha nye phanA dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad med snang ba dang /
214a2('bum): kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dge dang / tshad med dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad med che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog
214a3('bum): ba'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin du mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og min gyi lha dang / de ma yin pa'i lha dang /
214a4('bum): klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gzi brjid chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di klag pa dang / bzung
214a5('bum): ba dang / kun chub par bya ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba'i phyir lhags pa de dag la chos kyi sbyin pa 'di byin par gyur cig ces sems bskyed par bya ste/ de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha
214a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di klags pa dang / bzung ba dang / bcangs pa dang / kun chub par bya ba dang / mchod par byas shing / phyag byas te gdud pa byas nas phyir 'dong ngo // ke'u shi ka rigs
214a7('bum): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan
214b1('bum): dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad
214b2('bum): med snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dge dang / tshad med dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad med che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / mi che ba
214b3('bum): dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og min gyi lha'i bu dag dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang /
214b4('bum): sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mche ming lha dang / dga' ldan gyi lha dang / 'phrul dka'i lha dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha dang / tshangs ris kyi lha dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa
214b5('bum): kun 'khor gyi lha dang / tshangs chen gyi lha dang / snang ba'i lha dang / chung snang gi lha dang / tshad med snang ba'i lha dang / kun snang dang ba'i lha dang / dge ba'i lha dang / chung dge'i lha dang /
214b6('bum): tshad med dge ba'i lha dang / dge rgyas kyi lha dang / che ba'i lha dang / chung che'i lha dang / tshad med che bA lba dang / 'bras bu che ba' che ba'i lha dang / mi che ba'i lha dang / mi gdung ba'i lha dang
214b7('bum): shin du thong ba'i lha dang / gya nom snang ba'i lha dang / 'og min gyi lha de dag kyang bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / bskyang bar byed de/ ke'u shi ka de la las kyi rnam par smin pa ma
215a1('bum): gtog par glags lta ba rnams kyis ni glags mi rnyed de/ ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i tshe 'di'i yon tan de lta bu dag kyang yongs su zin par 'gyur ro//
215a2('bum): lha'i bu gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de dag kyang der shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mchod par bya ba dang / rigs kyi bu
215a3('bum): dad rigs kyi bu mo de dag la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / bskyang ba bya ba'i don du 'dong bar sems so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs
215a4('bum): kyi bu mo de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs te/ sems can thams cad bsgrub pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / sems
215a5('bum): can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don du nye bar gnas pa'i phyir ro// brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des 'dir phyogs bcu kun
215a6('bum): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di klag pa dang / bzung ba dang / kun chub par bya ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / gdud pa bya ba dang / rim 'gror bya ba dang /
215a7('bum): bkur stir bya ba dang / bud dung du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba'i phyir/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams/
215b1('bum): 'ongs so// zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir mche ma'i lha rnams 'ongs so// zhes dgyi ba dang / 'dir dga' ldan gyi lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir 'phrul dga'i lha rnam
215b2('bum): 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir gzhan 'phrul dbang byed gyi lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir tshangs ris kyi lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir
215b3('bum): tshangs la nye phan gyi lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir tshangs chen gyi lha rnams 'ongs so
215b4('bum): zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir snang ba'i lha rnams 'ongs so// zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir chung snang gi lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams 'ongs
215b5('bum): so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir dge ba'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir chung dge'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes 'gyi ba dang /
215b6('bum): 'dir tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir dge rgyas kyi lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir che ba'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang /
215b7('bum): 'dir chung che lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir tshad med che ba'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang /
216a1('bum): 'dir mi che ba'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir mi gdung ba'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams
216a2('bum): 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir 'og min gyi lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi bar ji ltar 'tshal bar 'gyur/ bcom
216a3('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gang du gzhag par snang ba chen po 'byung bar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos mthong na/
216a4('bum): rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo nges 'dir ni lha mthu chen po mthu chen po// rdzu 'phrul che ba/ gzi brjid che ba dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di klag pa dang / bcang ba dang /
216a5('bum): kun chub par byed pa dang / phyag bya ba dang / gdung ba bya ba dang / ris 'gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / bu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bgyi ba'i phyir lhag so zhes bya bar
216a6('bum): nges par khong du chud bar bya'o// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gtsang sgra'i spyod pa dang / ldan de'i gtsang sbra'i spyod pa des lha de dag kyang nye bar 'ongs shing /
216a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di klags pa dang / bzung ba dang / kun chub par bya ba dang / rim 'gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dung du bya ba dang / mchod par
216b1('bum): byas nas shin tu dga' ba'i yid du 'gyur ro// gnas de na lha mthu chung ngu ji snyed cig gnas pa de dag kyang / lha mthu chen po mthu chen po de dag gi gzi brjid dang / dpal dang /
216b2('bum): zil gyis mi bzod pa'i phyir gnas de nas gung du 'dong bar sems so// ji lta ji ltar lha mthu chen po mthu chen po// rdzu 'phrul che ba dang / dbang che ba de dag nye bar 'ong bar
216b3('bum): sems pa de lta de ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu de yang mos pa rgya chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de'i gnas kyi 'khor yug du yang gtsang sbra med pa'i sbyong pa mi rgyu bar bya
216b4('bum): ste/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo ngas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir de'i 'khor gyis yang spos chu'i chag chag gyis gdab bo// me tog
216b5('bum): dang spos kyi gtor to/ gdugs spos 'phrul ba'i snod bzhag go// dar gyi lda ldi dang gos kyi bla re bre'o// sa phyogs rnam pa du mas brgyan par bya'o// ke'u shi ka riH
216b6('bum): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de la ngal zhing mchad par 'gyur ba med de/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i lus bde ba dang / lus yang ba dang / lus gsal ba 'ang nyams
216b7('bum): su myong bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des ni sems bde ba dang / sems yang ba dang / sems gsal ba 'ang nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro// de nas
217a1('bum): nub mo nyal na yang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bsam pas mos par byas na/ sdig to'i rmi lam mthong bar 'gyur ro// des mthong
217a2('bum): na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis mnga' ba/ dpe' byang bzang po brgya bcus kun tu rgyan
217a3('bum): ba sku gser gyi mdog du zhugs pa/ dge slong gyi dge 'dun gyis kun nas bskor ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis mdun du dar ba/ chos ston par mthong bar 'gyur/
217a4('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa de las 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
217a5('bum): phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid
217a6('bum): stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /
217a7('bum): thog ma dang mtha' ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /
217b1('bum): mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang /
217b2('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
217b3('bum): brgyad pa dang / 'phags bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang // gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang //
217b4('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin
217b5('bum): rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byangs pa chen po dang / snying rje
217b6('bum): chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi chos ston pa'ang thos par 'gyur ro// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de'i don rnam par bye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro// tshul khrims
217b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de'i don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de'i don rnams par bye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
218a1('bum): pa de'i don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa de'i don rnam par phye ba 'ang thos par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi
218a2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa de'i don rnam par bye ba 'ang thos par 'gyur ro// nang stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro// phyi stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba'ang thos
218a3('bum): par 'gyur ro// phyi nang stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba 'ang thos par 'gyur ro// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro// chen po stong pa nyid de'i don
218a4('bum): rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro// don dam pa stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba 'ang thos par 'gyur ro// 'dus byas stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro//
218a5('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro// thog ma dang tha ma med
218a6('bum): pa stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par bya phye ba 'ang thos par 'gyur ro// rang bzhin stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par
218a7('bum): phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro// chos thams cad stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba 'ang bos par 'gyur ro// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba 'ang thos par 'gyur//
218b1('bum): mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba 'ang thos par 'gyur ro// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid de'i dor rnam par phye ba 'ang thos par 'gyur ro// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de'i ngon rnam
218b2('bum): bar bye ba'ang thob par 'gyur ro// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye bar 'ang thos par 'gyur ro// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi po de dag gi don rnam par
218b3('bum): phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro// yang dag par spong ba bzhi po de dag gi ngon rnam par bye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bani po dag gi don rnam par bye ba 'ang bong par 'gyura'o//
218b4('bum): dbang po lnga po de dag gi don rnam par bye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro// stobs lnga de dag gi don rnam par phye ba 'ang thos par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun po de dag gi don
218b5('bum): rnam par bye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad po de dag gi don rnam par bye ba thos par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i bden pa bani po de dag gi don rnam
218b6('bum): par bye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro// bsam gtan bzhi po de dag gi don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro// tshad med pa bzhi po de dag gi don rnam par bye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro//
218b7('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi po de dag gi don rnam par bye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro// rnam par mthar pa brgyad po de dag gi don rnam par bye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro//
219a1('bum): mthar gyi gnas pa'i snyom par 'jug pa dgu po de dag gi don rnam par phye ba 'ang thos par 'gyur ro// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma
219a2('bum): med pa dang smon pa med pa de dag gi don rim par phye ba 'ang thos par 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa de dag gi don rnam par phye ba 'ang thos par 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin de dag gi don
219a3('bum): rnam par phye ba 'ang thos par 'gyur ro// gzungs kyi sgo de dag gi don rnam par bye ba 'ang thos par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu po dag gi don rnam par phye ba'ang
219a4('bum): thos par 'gyur ro// mi 'jigs pa bzhi po de dag gi don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi po de dag gi don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur/
219a5('bum): snying rje chen po de dag gi don rnam par bye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi 'os ma 'dres pa bco brgyang po ngadag gi don rnam par bye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi shing
219a6('bum): mthong bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi shing drung du 'gro ba 'ang mthong bar 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
219a7('bum): par 'tshang rgya ba 'ang mthong bar 'gyur ro// de ltar mngon par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba'ang mthong bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong mang po chos yang dag
219b1('bum): par 'gro ba byed cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni 'di ltar yongs su bsgrub par bya'o// sems can mang po ni 'di ltar yongs su smin par bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni 'di ltar
219b2('bum): yongs su bzung bar bya'o// bdud 'khor dang bcas pa ni 'di ltar pham par bya'o zhes zer ba dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro// shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
219b3('bum): mang po'i sgra thos par 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas che ge mo zhig bzhugs te/
219b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di ji snyed cig dang / nyan thos bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di ji snyed cig gis bskor cing mdun du byas te chos ston te zhes bya ba'i
219b5('bum): sgra thos par 'gyur ro// lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po'i sgra thos par 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
219b6('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas che ge mo zhig bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig dang / nyan thos bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di
219b7('bum): snyed cig gis bskor cing mdun du byas te chos ston to zhes bya ba'i sgra thos par 'gyur ro// nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po'i sgra thos par 'gyur te/ 'jig
220a1('bum): / rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas che ge mo zhig bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa'
220a2('bum): bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig dang / nyan thos bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig gis bskor cing mdun du byas te chos ston to zhes bya ba'i sgra thos par 'gyur ro//
220a3('bum): byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po'i sgra thos par 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
220a4('bum): ba'i sangs rgyas che ge mo zhig bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig dang / nyan thos bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig gis bskor cing mdun du byas
220a5('bum): te chos ston to zhes bya ba'i sgra thos par 'gyur ro// byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po'i sgra thos par 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge
220a6('bum): mo zhig na ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas che ge mo zhig bzhugs ste/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig dang /
220a7('bum): nyan thos bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig gis bskor cing mdun du byas te/ chos ston to zhes bya ba'i sgra thos par 'gyur ro// shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas
220b1('bum): bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po'i sgra thos 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas che ge
220b2('bum): mo zhig bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig dang / nyan thos bye ba khrag khrig dad+ya stong 'di snyed cig gis bskor cing mdun du byas te chos
220b3('bum): ston to zhes bya ba'i sgra thos par 'gyur ro// lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po'i sgra thos par 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na
220b4('bum): ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas che ge mo zhig gzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig dang / nyan thos bye ba
220b5('bum): khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed gcig gis bskor cing mdun du byas te/ chos ston to zhes bya ba'i sgra thos par 'gyur ro// nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig
220b6('bum): brgya stong mang po'i sgra thos par 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas che ge mo zhig bzhugs te/ byang
220b7('bum): chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig dang / nyan thos bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig gis bskor cing mdun du byas te chos ston to zhes bya ba'i sgra thos pa 'gyur//
221a1('bum): @'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po'i sgra thos par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
221a2('bum): bcom pa dag dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas che ge mo zhig bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig dang / nyan thos bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
221a3('bum): 'di snyed cig gis bskor cing mdun du byas te/ chos ston to zhes bya ba'i sgra thos par 'gyur ro// steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po'i sgra thos par 'gyur te/
221a4('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams che ge so zhig na ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas che ge mo zhig bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa'
221a5('bum): bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig dang / nyan thos bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig gis bskor cing mdun du byas te chos ston to zhes bya ba'i sgra thos par 'gyur ro// shar
221a6('bum): phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis mchod rten rin po che sna bdun
221a7('bum): las byas pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten de dag kyang me tog dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / gdugs
221b1('bum): spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / mchod pa sna tshogs mang pos rim 'gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud
221b2('bum): du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba mthong bar 'gyur ro// lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin
221b3('bum): gshegs pa de dag gi mchod rten rin po che sna bdun las byas pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten de dag kyang me tog
221b4('bum): dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / gdugs spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / mchod pa sna tshogs mang pos
221b5('bum): rim 'gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba'ang mthong bar 'gyur ro// nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dag kyang
221b6('bum): mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mchod rten rin po che sna bdun las byas pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs
221b7('bum): pa'i mchod rten de dag kyang / me tog dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / gdugs spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang /
222a1('bum): mchod pa sna tshogs mang pos rim 'gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / bu dung du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro// byang phyogs
222a2('bum): kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mchod rten rim po che sna bdun las
222a3('bum): byas pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten de dag kyang / me tog dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / gdugs spos dang /
222a4('bum): byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / mchod pa sna tshogs mang pos rim 'gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba
222a5('bum): dang / mchod par bya ba mthong bar 'gyur ro// byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mya ngan las 'da' ba dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin
222a6('bum): gshegs pa de dag gi mchod rten rin po sna bdun las byas pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten de dag kyang /
222a7('bum): me tog dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / gdugs spos dang / byug pa dang / bye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bdan dang / mchod pa sna tshogs
222b1('bum): mang pos rim 'gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba mthong bar 'gyur ro// shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dag
222b2('bum): kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten de dag kyang / me tog dang / spos dang / 'breng ba dang / gdugs spos dang / byug pa dang / bye ma dang / na bza' dang /
222b3('bum): gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / mchod pa sna tshogs mang pos rim 'gror bya ba dang / bkur sti bya ba dang / bu dung dbya ba dang / mchod par bya ba mthong bar 'gyur/
222b4('bum): lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po yongs su s+ya las 'da' ba dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mchod rten rin
222b5('bum): bo che sna bdun las byas pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten de dag kyang / me dog dang / spos dang / 'phreng
222b6('bum): ba dang / gdugs spos dang / byug pa dang / bye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / mchod pa sna tshogs mang pos rim 'gror bya ba dang / bkur
222b7('bum): stir bya ba dang / bu dung du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba mthong bar 'gyur ro// nub byang phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro//
223a1('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten de dag kyang / me tog dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / gdugs spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang /
223a2('bum): gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / mchod pa sna tshogs mang pos rim 'gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dung du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba dang / 'og gi phyogs
223a3('bum): kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mchod rten ring po che sna bdun las byas
223a4('bum): babye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten de dag kyang / me tog dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / gdugs spos dang /
223a5('bum): byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / mchod pa sna tshogs mang pos rim 'gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dung du rgyu
223a6('bum): ba dang / mchod par bya ba mthong bar 'gyur ro// steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro//
223a7('bum): bzhi gshegs pa de dag gi mchod rter rin po che sna bdun las byas pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten de dag kyang /
223b1('bum): me tog dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / gdugs spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / mchod pa sna tshogs mang pos
223b2('bum): rim 'gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dung du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba mthong bar 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka de ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis rmi lam bzang
223b3('bum): po de lta bu dag mthong bar 'gyur te/ de dag bde bar nyal zhing bde bar ldang bar 'gyur ro// de'i lus kyang mdangs dang ldan par 'gyur/ lus la yang ba'i nyams yod par 'gyur/
223b4('bum): lci ba'i nyams med par 'gyur/ zas la cher chags pa med par 'gyur/ gos la chags pa med par 'gyur/ nad kyi rkyen sman dang yo byad la chags pa med par 'gyur ro// zas
223b5('bum): kyi 'du shes chung bar 'gyur/ gos kyi 'du shes chung bar 'gyur/ nad kyi rkyen sman dang yo byad kyi 'du shes chung bar 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar dper na/ rnal 'byor la
223b6('bum): spyod pa'i dge slong ting nge 'dzin la langs pa'i sems yid la bya bas yongs su brlan pa la/ zas la cher chags pa med pa yin/ zas kyi 'du shes chung ba yin/ ke'u shi ka de bzhin
223b7('bum): du rigs kyi bu 'ab rigs kyi bu mo de dag kyang zas la cher chags pa med par 'gyur ro// zas kyi 'du shes chung bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de la mi ma yin pa rnams lus
224a1('bum): lamadangs nye bar sgrub bo// shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang ji snyed pa dang / lha dang
224a2('bum): klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam kha'i lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lho phye chen po gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang de'i lus la mdangs nye bar sgrub bo//
224a3('bum): lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang ji snyed pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam
224a4('bum): mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto phye chen po gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang de'i lus la mdangs nye bar sgrub po// nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed pa dang /
224a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' gang ji snyed pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lho phye chen po gang ji snyed pa de dag
224a6('bum): kyang de'i lus la mdangs nye bar sgrub po// bang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang ji snyed pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gan/
224a7('bum): sbyin dang / dri ba dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lho phye chen po gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang de'i lus la mngangs nye bar sgrub bo// byang shar gyi phyogs
224b1('bum): mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang ji snyed pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha'
224b2('bum): lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto phye chen po gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang de'i lus la mdangs nye bar sgrub bo// shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed
224b3('bum): ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang ji snyed pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri ba dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lho phye chen po gang
224b4('bum): snyed pa de dag kyang de'i lus la mngangs nye bar sgrub bo// lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang ji snyed pa dang /
224b5('bum): lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lte phye chen po gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang de'i lus la mdangs nye bar sgrub
224b6('bum): po// nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang ji snyed pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang /
224b7('bum): lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto phye chen po gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang de'i lus la mdangs nye bar sgrub bo// 'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
225a1('bum): gang ji snyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang ji snyed pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am
225a2('bum): ci dang / lto phye chen po gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang de'i lus la mngangs nye bar sgrub po// steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang
225a3('bum): ji snyed pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang/ na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang de'i lus la mdangs te
225a4('bum): bar sgrub po// ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo che 'di nyid la yon tan 'di dag yongs su bzung bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid nan tan du gnyam
225a5('bum): bar bye'o// bzung bar bya'o// bcangs par bya'o// klags par bya'o// kun chub par bya'o// tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang
225a6('bum): yong mi 'brel bya'o// ke'u shi ka de ste rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dim bzung ma bcangs ma klags kun chub bar ma byas/
225a7('bum): tshul bzhin du yid la ma byas na'ang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ang bris shing glegs bam du byas te// me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang /
225b1('bum): spos dang / byug pa dang / bye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim 'gror bya'o// bkur stir bya'o// phu dud du bya'o//
225b2('bum): mchod par bya'o// ke'u shi ka de ltar na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag 'gro ba mang po la phan pa dang / 'gro ba mang po la bde ba'i don tu bzhugs pa yin/ ke'u shi ka
225b3('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzungs pa dang / bcangs pa dang / kun chub par bya ba dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba byed cing de bris shing /
225b4('bum): me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim 'gror byed bkur stir
225b5('bum): byed/ phu dung du byed/ mchod par byed na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel gyi/ phyogs bcu'i kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs
225b6('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bzhugs pa rnams la nam tsho'i bar du/ na bza' dang / bshos dang / gzims
225b7('bum): cha dang / snyun gyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad mang pos rim 'gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ phu dung du byas/ mchod par byas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
226a1('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de dag mya ngan las 'das nas kyang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i mchod rten
226a2('bum): brtsigs te/ nam mtsho ba'i bar du me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang /
226a3('bum): sil snyan sna tshogs kyi rim 'gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas pas ni yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las//
226a4('bum): / le'u nyi shu gnyis pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka khyod kyis 'dzam bu gling de bzhin gshegs
226a5('bum): pa'i sku gdung gis byur bur gang ba zhig kyang rnyed la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du bris zhig kyang la las byin na/ de las gang blang bar bya/ brgya byin gyis gsol
226a6('bum): paHbcom ldan 'das gal te 'dzam bu gling 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis byur bur bltam pa zhig kyang la las stsal na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam
226a7('bum): du bris pa zhig kyang la las stsal na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid bdag gis blangs par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung
226b1('bum): de dag la bdag rim 'gro ma mchis pa yang ma lags/ mi rton pa bang ma lags/ btsun par mi bgyid pa'ang ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
226b2('bum): sku gdung la rim 'gror bgyi bar mi 'tshal ba 'am/ bkur stir bgyi bar mi 'tshal ba 'am/ phu dung du bgyi bar mi 'tshal ba 'am/ mchod par bgyi bar mi 'tshal ba 'ang ma lags na/ bcom
226b3('bum): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ste/ de'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams kyang rim 'gror bgyi ba lags
226b4('bum): bkur stir bgyi ba lags/ phu dud du bgyi ba lags/ mchod par bgyi ba lags/ sku gdung de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas bslabs pa ste/ de'i slad du de bzhin gshegs
226b5('bum): pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang mchod par 'ang ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das nam bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung la/ lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rjes kyi 'phreng ba dang / lha rdzas
226b6('bum): kyis spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil
226b7('bum): snyan sna tshogs kyis rim 'gror bgyid cing / bkur stir bgyid pa dang / bu dung du bgyid pa dang / mchod par bgyid pa'i 'tshe yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung 'di ga shes rab kyi pha rol
227a1('bum): @tu phyin pa las byung ba lags pas na/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis rim 'gror bgyi ba lags/ bkur stir bgyid pa dang / phu dung du bgyi
227a2('bum): ba lags/ mchod par bgyi ba lags pas bsrung zhing ris 'gro dang bkur stir dang / bu dud dang mchod par bgyid do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus lha'i dbang po rgya byin la
227a3('bum): la 'di skad ces smras so// ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bzung du med pa gzugs med pa/ ltar med pa/ thogs pa med pa/ mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan
227a4('bum): nyid med pa yin na/ de la khyod ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bzung du med pa/ gzugs med pa/ bltar med pa/ thogs pa med pa/ mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan
227a5('bum): nyid med pa la bzung bar sems/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'dzin pa dang dor bar bya ba'i phyir nye bar gnas pa yin/ 'grib pa'i phyir ma yin/ 'phel ba'i phyir ma yin/
227a6('bum): skyed pa'i phyir ma yin/ sbyang ba'i phyir ma yin/ dbri ba'i phyir ma yin/ bstan pa'i phyir ma yin/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i phyir ma yin/ rnam par byang ba'i phyir ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi
227a7('bum): rnams nye bar bsgrub pa yin/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams 'dor ba ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams smid par byed pa ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/
227b1('bum): nyan thos kyi chos rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ slob pa dang / mi slob pa'i chos rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams 'dor bar byed pa ma yin/ 'dus ma byas
227b2('bum): kyi dbyings rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ 'dus ma byas kyi khams 'dor bar byed pa ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yis/
227b3('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ shes rab kyi
227b4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
227b5('bum): nye bar sgrub pa pa yin/ chen po stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid nye
227b6('bum): bar sgrub pa ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ thog ma dang mtha' ma med pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma
227b7('bum): yid/ rang bzhin stong palci bar sgrub pa ma yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid nye bar
228a1('bum): sgrub pa ma yin/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong nyid nye bar
228a2('bum): sgrub pa ma yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ dbang po rnams
228a3('bum): nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ stobs rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ 'phags
228a4('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ bsam gtan rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ tshad med pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams nye bar sgrub
228a5('bum): pa ma yin/ rnam par thar pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rnam par mthar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa
228a6('bum): dang smon pa med pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ mngon par shes pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ de bzhin
228a7('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ mi 'jigs pa rnam nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ snying rje chen po nye bar sgrub pas
228b1('bum): yin/ sangs rgyas kyis chos ma 'dres pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ phyir mi 'od
228b2('bum): ba'i 'bras bu nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ dgra bcom pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rang byang chub nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
228b3('bum): ba nyid nye bar sgrub pa sa yin/ rgya byiran gyis smras pa/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ brdzun pa sha ra dwa ti'i gang gis de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sangs rgyas
228b4('bum): kyi chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams 'dor bar byed pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams de bar spyad byed pa ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nye bar/
228b5('bum): sgrub pa ma yin/ nyan thos kyi chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ slob pa dang mi slob pa'i chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams 'dor bar byed pa ma yin/ 'dus ma
228b6('bum): byas stong pa nyid kyi dbyings nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dus byas kyi khams 'dor bar byed pa ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar
228b7('bum): sgrub pa ma yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ shes
229a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub
229a2('bum): ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ chen po stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub
229a3('bum): pa ma yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/
229a4('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong po nyid ge bar sgrub
229a5('bum): ba ma yin/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yid/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
229a6('bum): pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin
229a7('bum): dbang po rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ stobs rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/
229b1('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ bsam gtan rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ ched med pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms
229b2('bum): par 'jug pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rnam par mthar pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rnam par ma
229b3('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ mngon par shes pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams nye bar slob pa ma yin/ gzungs kyi skye/
229b4('bum): rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ mi 'jigs rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma
229b5('bum): yin/ snying rje chen po nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras
229b6('bum): bu nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ dgra bcom pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rang byang chub nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid nye bar sgrub
229b7('bum): pa ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad bakhyen pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yino// zhes bya bar shes pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa yin no//
230a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi gnyis pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis
230a2('bum): su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi gnyis pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
230a3('bum): ba ni mi gnyis pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi gnyis pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes
230a4('bum): bar bya ba ma yin te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis la'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi gnyis pa'o//
230a5('bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po rgya byin la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/ ke'u shi ka lags so legs so de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin no// shes rab kyi
230a6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi gnyis pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba
230a7('bum): ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi gnyis pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ brtson
230b1('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi gnyis pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi gnyis pa'o// tshul
230b2('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi gnyis pa'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par
230b3('bum): bya ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi gnyis pa'o// ke'u shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni chos kyi dbyings la gnyis su 'dod/
230b4('bum): du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// ke'u shi ka gang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
230b5('bum): pa la gnyis su 'dong pa de ni chos kyi dbyings la gnyis su 'dong du zad ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings dang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnyis su me de gnyis byar
230b6('bum): ming po/ ke'u shi ka gang brtsor 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa den chos kyi dbyis la gnyis su 'dod dubang ngo // de ci'i phyir zhen/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings pa
230b7('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu byed pa de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// ke'u shi ka gang gabong pa rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod bdeng chos kyi dbyings la gnyis su 'dod dubang ngo //
231a1('bum): / ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings dang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// ke'u shi ka gang tshul khrims kyi/
231a2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni chos kyi dbyings la gnyis su 'dong du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings dang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnyis su
231a3('bum): med de gnyis su byar med do// ke'u shi ka gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni chos kyi dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar chos kyi
231a4('bum): dbyings dang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnyis su meng de gnyis su byar med do// ke'u shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa ni de bzhin nyid la gnyis su 'dong du zad do//
231a5('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang de bzhin nyid la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// ke'u shi ka gang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis
231a6('bum): su 'dod pa de ni de bzhin nyid la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//
231a7('bum): ke'u shi ka gang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni de bzhin nyid la gnyis su 'dong du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
231b1('bum): byin pa dang de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// ke'u shi ka gang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni de bzhin nyid la gnyis su 'deng du zad do// de ci'i
231b2('bum): phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// ke'u shi ka gang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnyis su 'dod
231b3('bum): pa de ni de bzhin nyid la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//
231b4('bum): ke'u shi ka gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni de bzhin nyid la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke 'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang de bzhin
231b5('bum): nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// ke'u shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnyis su 'dong du zad do// de ci'i phyir
231b6('bum): zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang yang dag pa'i mtha' de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// ke'u shi ka gang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyi su
231b7('bum): 'dod pa de ni yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang yang dag pa'i mtha' de la gnyis su med de
232a1('bum): gnyis su byar med do// ke'u shi ka gang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
232a2('bum): ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang yang dag pa'i mtha' de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// ke'u shi ka gang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod
232a3('bum): ba de ni yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang yang dag pa'i mtha' de la gnyis su med de gnyis
232a4('bum): su byar med // ke'u shi ka gang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar tshul
232a5('bum): khrims kyi pa pol tu phyin pa dang yang dag pa'i mtha' de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// ke'u shi ka gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnyis
232a6('bum): su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang yang dag pa'i mtha' de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// ke'u shi ka gang shes rab kyi
232a7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang
232b1('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// ke'u shi ka gang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la/
232b2('bum): gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de la gnyis su me de gnyis su byar med do// ke'u shi
232b3('bum): ka gang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad ngo // de ci'i phyir she na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar
232b4('bum): 'dzin 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// ke'u shi ka gang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni bas
232b5('bum): gyis khyab pa'i dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de la gnyis su med de gnyi su
232b6('bum): byar med do// ke'u shi ka gang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la gnyis su 'dong du zad / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar
232b7('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// ke'u shi ka gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dong pa de ni ba
233a1('bum): gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la gnyis su 'dong du zad ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings pa/
233a2('bum): pa gnyis su mang de gnyis su byar med do// // bam po bcu brtse pa// / de nas lha'i dbang po rgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
233a3('bum): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'dzin rten gyis phyag bgyi bar 'os pa ste/ de la bslabs pas ni byang
233a4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon pa
233a5('bum): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe// bdag chos bzang po'i lha'i 'khor du bdag nyid lha'i dbang po'i stan la mchis par gyur pa de'i tshe/ der lga
233a6('bum): bu gang ji snyed bdag gi rami 'gro la mchis pa de dag kun kyang bdag la mchod pa bgyid de/ nam bdag der ma mchis shing stan de la ma mchis pa de'i tshe 'ang lha'i bu de dag 'kho
233a7('bum): der mchis shing / lha'i dbang po rgya byin stan de la 'dug cing / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams la chos ston to// zhes stan de la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba bgyis shing / phyag
233b1('bum): 'tshal te slar mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du gang ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing 'chang ba dang / kha don du bgyid cing gzhan la'ang rgya cher ston pa de phyogs bcu
233b2('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams na/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag kyang
233b3('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni 'di las byung ngo // nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang 'di las byung ngo // sems can
233b4('bum): thams cad bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyang 'di las byung ngo // zhes shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag bgyid cing gdud pa bgyis nas slar mchi bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan
233b5('bum): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams mchod pa 'ang ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su sgrubs pa'i slad du mchod pa mang ba ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/
233b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi gzhi
233b7('bum): gyur te/ rgyur gyur to// rkyen du gyur to// yongs su sgrub par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na cha de gnyis las bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid
234a1('bum): len to// bcom ldan 'das gi tshe bdag gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di blangs te/ chos kyi khongs su gtogs pa'i yid kyis kha thon bgyid pa de'i tshe/ 'jig
234a2('bum): pa 'am bag tsha ba'i mtshan ma tsam yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das de ci'i srang du zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis brjod
234a3('bum): du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/
234a4('bum): brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma
234a5('bum): mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma ma mchis/
234a6('bum): rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma mchis/
234a7('bum): rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma ma mchis/
234b1('bum): rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das nang stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/
234b2('bum): brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das nang stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das phyi stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/
234b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das phyi stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das phyi nang stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das phyin
234b4('bum): stong pa nyid ni smos su ma chis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid stong pa
234b5('bum): nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chen po stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das chen po stong pa nyid ni smos su mchis
234b6('bum): ba'o// bcom ldan 'das dor dam pa stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis/ rjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das don dam pa stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom
234b7('bum): ldan 'das 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni mtshan pa ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
235a1('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o//
235a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das mtha' las 'das stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis
235a3('bum): pa'o// bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid
235a4('bum): ni spos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni
235a5('bum): smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni smos
235a6('bum): su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad stong pa nyid
235a7('bum): ni smos su pa mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni brtsam ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das rang gi mtshan nyid stong
235b1('bum): pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das mi dmigs pa stong pa
235b2('bum): nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das dngos po med pa/
235b3('bum): stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni mtshan pa ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid stong pa
235b4('bum): nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma mtshachis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das dngos
235b5('bum): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/
235b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das yang dag par spong ba rnams ni mtshan pa ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/
235b7('bum): du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag par spong ba rnams ni spos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags
236a1('bum): ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis paste/ bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni spos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das dbang po rnams ni mtshanam/
236a2('bum): ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das dbang po rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das stobs rnams ni mtshan pa ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/
236a3('bum): brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das stobs rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis// rtags ma mchis// brjod du/
236a4('bum): ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni mtshan ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis//
236a5('bum): brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni mtshan pa ma mchis/ rtags
236a6('bum): ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan rnams ni mtshan ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/
236a7('bum): brjod du ma ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das tshad med pa rnams ni mtshan ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis
236b1('bum): ba ste/ bcom ldan 'das chad med pa rnams ni spos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni mtshan ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod
236b2('bum): du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam par thar pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis// rtags ma
236b3('bum): mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par mthar pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mthar gyis gnas pa'i spros par 'jug pa rnams ni mtshan ma sa
236b4('bum): mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam par thar pa
236b5('bum): sto stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma ma
236b6('bum): pa dang smon pa med pa ni smos su mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mngon par shes pa rnams ni mtshan ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das mngon par
236b7('bum): shis pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin na/
237a1('bum): ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das
237a2('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni spos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/
237a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i stogs rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mi 'jigs pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod dum
237a4('bum): mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das mi 'jigs pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod dum
237a5('bum): mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni mos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das snying rje chen po ni mtshan ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis
237a6('bum): bste/ bcom ldan 'das snying rje chen po ni spos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis
237a7('bum): pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das thams cad shes pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod/
237b1('bum): ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das thams cad shes pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das lam gyis rnam pa shes pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma/
237b2('bum): mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das lam gyis rnam pa shes pa nyid smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis//
237b3('bum): brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtag/
237b4('bum): ma mchis/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa zhig lags te/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa lags na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos
237b5('bum): thams cad la mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / rtags ma mchis pa dang / brjod du ma mchis pa dang / smos su ma mchis par thugs su chud de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
237b6('bum): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can rnams la mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / rtags ma mchis pa dang / brjod du ma mchis pa dang / smos su ma mchis pa'i chos mi bstan te/
237b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis/ smos su ma mchis pas de'i slad du/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos thos
238a1('bum): cad mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / rtags ma mchis pa dang / brjod du ma mchis pa dang / smos su ma mchis par thugs su chud de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
238a2('bum): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can rnams la mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / rtags ma mchis pa dang / brjod du ma mchis pa dang / smos su ma mchis pi chos bstan to// /
238a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das de bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis/ me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na
238a4('bum): bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim 'gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod par bgyi par 'os pa'o// bris shing me tog dang /
238a5('bum): phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lha'i ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim 'gro dang bkur stir dang / phu
238a6('bum): dung dang / mchod par bgyi bar 'os pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid
238a7('bum): ba dang / de bris shing me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim 'gron
238b1('bum): bgyid/ bkur stir bgyid/ phu dung du bgyid/ mchod par bgyid na/ de'i nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du/ des sems can
238b2('bum): dmyal ba'i rgyud kyi dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o// byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi rgyud kyi dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o// nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs
238b3('bum): rgyas kyi sa'i ngogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o// de ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang yang mi bral bar 'gyur/ sems can yongasu smin par bgyi ba dang yang mi bral bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin
238b4('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyab de dag la me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal dang / ba dang
238b5('bum): dang sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim 'gro dang / bkur sti dang / bu dud dang mchod par bgyid cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mchi bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gzhan ya
238b6('bum): gal te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis byur bur bltam pa zhig kyang stsal la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'ang bris te/
238b7('bum): stsal na/ bcom ldan 'das dkon mchog gnyis las/ bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid len to// bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du zhe na/ 'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa
239a1('bum): rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / rim 'gror bgyid pa dang / bkur stir bgyi ba dang /
239a2('bum): bu dung du bgyi zhing / mchod par bgyi ba lags te/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag gis de dag la rim 'gror bgyis/ byu dung du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis na log par ltung ba dang /
239a3('bum): ngan song du 'chi bar mi 'gyur te/ lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs par myong nas/ smon lam gyi tshul bzhin du nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ yang dag par rdzogs
239a4('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na gang de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bris pa
239a5('bum): mthong ba de ni mi 'dra ba ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang de bzhin gshegs la gnyis su ma mchis te/ gnyis su
239a6('bum): bgyir ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum la bzhugs te/ mdo dang dbyas
239a7('bum): kyis snyad pa dang / lung du bstan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng bzhi dang / 'di ltar 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang /
239b1('bum): chos rmad du byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / chos rten la phab pa snyan pa gsungs te/ bshad pa dang / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
239b2('bum): bzung zhing kun chub par bgyis te/ gzhan la snyan pa de gnyis kyang mi 'dra ba ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
239b3('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so// 'di las byung ba ni cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum mo// 'di las byung ba ni mdo dang dbyangs kyis snyad pa dang / lung du bstan pa dang /
239b4('bum): tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng bzhi dang / 'di ltar 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rab dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang /
239b5('bum): chos rten la phab pa snyan pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang shar phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / lho phyogs kyi de bzhin
239b6('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / nub phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang phyogs kyi
239b7('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa ng+yas dang /
240a1('bum): shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
240a2('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / 'og gi phyogs kyi de bzhin
240a3('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / steng gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang gi klung gyi bye ma snye
240a4('bum): mang pos cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum la bzhugs te/ mdo dang dbyangs kyis snyad pa dang / lung du ston pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng bzhi dang / 'di ltar 'das
240a5('bum): pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas dang / chos rbang du byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / chos rten la bab bstan pa gsungs te/ bshad pa dang / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs
240a6('bum): kyi bu 'amo la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung zhing kun chub par bgyis te/ gzhan la bstan pa de gnyis kyang mi 'dra ba ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di las byung ba
240a7('bum): ni phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so// 'di las byung ba ni cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum mo// 'di las byung ba ni mdo dang dbyangs
240b1('bum): kyis snyad pa dang / lung du bstan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng bzhi dang / 'di ltar 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / chos
240b2('bum): rmad dbyung ba dang // rtog pa brjod pa dang / chos rten la bab pa bstan pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing gang gi'i klung gyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten
240b3('bum): gyi khams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang /
240b4('bum): gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyi rim 'gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod par bgyis pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
240b5('bum): 'di glegs bam du bris shing / me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna
240b6('bum): tshogs kyi rim 'gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dung dang / mchod par bgyid pa yang mi 'dra ba ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
240b7('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang /
241a1('bum): @klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid cing / gzhan la yang rgya cher ston pa des ni sems can dmyal ba'i rgyud kyi dogs pa ma mchis
241a2('bum): par bgyi'o// byol song gyi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi rgyud kyi dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o// nyan thos kyi sa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i dogs pa ma mchis par
241a3('bum): bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par rigs par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni shes rab kyi pha rol
241a4('bum): tu phyin pa 'di bris shing 'dzin to// 'chang ngo // glog go// kun chub par bgyid do// tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid do// bris pa de la'ang me tog dang / 'breng ba dang / spos dang /
241a5('bum): byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyi rim 'gror bgyid/ bkur stir bgyid/ phu dung du bgyid/ mchod par
241a6('bum): bgyid de/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'jigs pa thams cad zhi bar bgyid pa'o// nad thams cad rab tu sel ba'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang
241a7('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / de la me tog dang / 'bring ba dang /
241b1('bum): spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyi rim 'gro dang / bkur sti dang / bu dud dang / mchod pa/
241b2('bum): bgyid pa des ni/ gang nas kyang 'jigs pa 'byung ba'i dgos pa ma mchis par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu nor gyi bdag po zhig 'jigs nas/
241b3('bum): rgyal po la gnas shing rgyal po la rten pas sus 'jig pa de dag nyid kyang de la rten pas/ de dag gis 'jig par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gshal
241b4('bum): ste/ gang rgyal po la rten pa ni mthu dang ldan pa la rten pa'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su sgrubs
241b5('bum): pas na mchod pa mnga' 'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes gang lags pa de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su sgrubs par lta'o// bcom ldan
241b6('bum): 'das de bas na bdag gi cha de gnyis las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid blang bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
241b7('bum): sku gdung rnams so// 'di las byung ba ni mi chen po'i mtshan gsum cu rtsa gnyis so// 'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'o//
242a1('bum): / 'di las byung ba ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi'o// 'di las byung ba ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'o// zhi la byung ba ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad do// /
242a2('bum): 'di las byung ba ni byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di las byung ba ni pha rol tu phyin pa lnga ste/ de dag pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming thob po// 'di las byung ba ni de
242a3('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du ste/ bcom ldan 'das grong ngam grong rdal lam/ grong khyer ram/ khams sam/ rgyal po'i gnas sam/ stong
242a4('bum): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / glog cing chub par bgyid pa dang / de bris shing rim 'gro dang bkur sti dang /
242a5('bum): phu dud dang / mchod pa bgyid pa de dag du mi 'am mi lags pa glags lta zhing glags tshol ba rnams kyis kyang glags rnyed par mi 'gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang theg pa gsum las
242a6('bum): theg pa gang yang rung bas mthar gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos can du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don chen po dang ldan pa ste/ stong
242a7('bum): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jigs rten gyi khams de ltar sems can rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi don nye bar gnas so// bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams gang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
242b1('bum): pa 'di mchis pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams der ni sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang 'dra bar lta'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na nor bu rin po che chen po me dpogs rin chen ces bya ba mchis te/
242b2('bum): de ni nor bu rin po che chen po'i yon tan rnam pa 'di lta bu dag dag dang ldan te/ nor bu rin po che chen po de gang dang / gang du bzhag pa de dang der mi ma lags pa rnams kyis glags mi rnyedo//
242b3('bum): mi ma lags pas zin pa'i skyes pa 'am bud med kyang nor bu rin po che chen po de bstan pa na/ mi ma lags pa de nor bu rin po che chen po de'i gzi brjid mi bzod de myur du 'pho zhing mi gan so//
242b4('bum): mkhris pas gdungs pa'i lus la nor bu rin po che chen po de btags na mkhris pa de yang 'byang bar 'gyur ro// rlung gis mnar pa'i lus la nor bu nin po che chen po de btags na'ang rlung
