242b5('bum): de'ang 'byang bar 'gyur ro// bad kan gyis non pa'i lus la nor bu nin po che chen po de btags na bad kan de yang zhi bar 'gyur ro// 'dus pa'i bros btab pa'i lus la nor bu rin po che chen
242b6('bum): po btags na yang 'dus pa'i bro de yang zhi bar 'gyur ro// zhing rnam par mi 'phel lo// nub mo ni snang bar bgyid ngo // tsha ba'i dus na ni nor bu rin po che chen po daphyogs gang du gzhag pa'i
242b7('bum): phyogs de bsil bar bgyid do// grang ba'i dus na ni nor bu rin po che chen po de phyogs gang du bzhag pa'i phyogs de jo bar bgyid ngo // nor bu rin po che chen po de dog sa'i phyogs de 'dra ha cang
242b8('bum): dadu zhag pa'i phyo
243a1('bum): yang mi dro// hacang yang mi mang zhing dang pa phun sum tshogs par bgyid do// nor bu rin po che chen po dog pa'i phyogs gang du gzhag pa'i dog pa'i phyogs des
243a2('bum): sbrul lam de sa lags pa de sdig pa las sogs pa gdug pa gzhan dag kyang rgyu bar mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das skyes pa 'am bud med la la zhig sbrul gdug bas zin pa la nor bu
243a3('bum): rin po che chen po bstan na/ des de mthong ma thag tu drug de'ang byang bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che chen po de ni yon tan gyi rnam pa 'di lta bu dag dang ldan te/ skyes pa
243a4('bum): 'am bud med la la zhig 'brub bus btab pa'am/ mig ba rib can du 'gyur te// mig gis nang das rna ba'i na 'das// sna'i nang ngam/ lce'i nang ngas/ zhog ma'i na dngam/ lus kyin dngas/
243a5('bum): ci byung ba las/ de'i lus la nor bu rin po che chen po de btags na/ de dag gi 'brub bu 'ab ba ri ba'am/ mig gi na dang ma/ rna ba'i nang dam/ sna'i nang ngam/ lce'i nang dam/ rkog mi'i nang dngas/
243a6('bum): lus kyi nang de dag kyang zhi bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das nor bu ring po che chen po de yoran gyi rnam pa 'di lta bu dag dang yang ldan te/ gal te nor bu rin po che chen po che ba rnyog pa can gyi nang du
243a7('bum): sprul na/ de'i modo la chab de thams cad kyang yan lag brgyad dang ldan zhing kha dogacig par 'gyur/ gal te nor bu rin po che chen po gos sngon pos bkris te chab kyi nang du stsal na/ chab de'ang de'i rang bzhin
243b1('bum): du 'gyur ro// gal te nor bu rin po che chen po de gos ser pos bkris te chab kyi nang du sprul pa na/ chab de'ang de'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro// gal te nor bu rin po che chen po de'i gos dmar pos/
243b2('bum): bkris te chab kyi nang du stsal na/ chab de'ang de'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro// gal te nor bu rin po che chen po de gos dkar pos bkris te chab kyi nang du stsal na/ chab de bang de'i rang bzhin
243b3('bum): nyid du 'gyur ro// gal te nor bu rin po che chen po de gos leb rgan gyis bkris te chab kyi nang nu stsal na/ chab de'ang de rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro// gal te nor bu rin po che chen po
243b4('bum): shel gyi kha dog gi gos gyis dkris te chab kyi nang du stsal na/ chab de'ang de'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro// de dag dang gos gzhan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis nor bu rin po che chen po de dkris te
243b5('bum): chab kyi nang du stsal na/ chab de'ang de'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro// chab de la rnyog pa mchis pa 'ang nor bu rin po che chen po des dang ste/ bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che chen po de ni
243b6('bum): yon tan gyi rnam pa de lta bu dag dang gzhan yang rnam pa mang po dag dang ldan no// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po che chen po de dang
243b7('bum): 'dra bar yon tan thams cad kyi 'byung gnas su 'gyur ba ste/ sdig pa thams cad sel ba'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// ke'u
244a1('bum): shi ka de ji snyam du sems nor bu rin po che chen po de lha rdzas zhig yin nam/ 'on tam nor bu rin po che chen po de 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams la yang yod/ rgya byin gyis smras pa/
244a2('bum): btsun pa dga' bo nor bu rin po che chen po de ni lha rdzas te/ btsun pa dga' bo 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams la nor bu rin po che chen po gang yod pa de dag ni chung zhing lci la/ lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po che chen
244a3('bum): be de dag ni che zhing yang ste/ 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams kyi nor bu rin po de dag ni lha rdzas ltar yan lag de dag gis yongs su rdzogs pa ma yin te/ 'dzam bu gling gi nor bu rin po che chen po de dag
244a4('bum): gis ni lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po che'i grangs sam/ cha 'am/ bgrang ba 'am/ dpe' 'am/ rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// de nas yang lha'i dbang po rgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
244a5('bum): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che chen po de stong la la zhig gi nang du stsal pa las snod de nas phyung yang / snod de ni nor bu rin po che chen po de'i yon tan gyis yid du mchi bar 'gyur te/ gzhan
244a6('bum): yang snod de la mos pa skyed do// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gang na mchis pa de'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi lus sam sems kyi sdug bsngal dang /
244a7('bum): gnod mi las gyur pa 'am/ mi ma lags pa las gyur pa thams cad kyang ma mchis par 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che chen po zhes bgyi bar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshig
244b1('bum): bla dgas so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi tshig bla dgas so// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
244b2('bum): tu phyin pa 'di'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snod do// bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon
244b3('bum): tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
244b4('bum): snong ngo // bcom ldan 'das brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan ni tshang ma mchis so// de bzhin
244b5('bum): gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snod do// bcom ldan 'das bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod pa bgyi ste/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu
244b6('bum): phyin pa'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i snod do// bcom ldan 'das tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan
244b7('bum): ni lha ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan ni chang ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
245a1('bum): pa'i snod ngo // bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan ni tshar ma mchis so// de
245a2('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i snod ngo // bcom ldan 'das la stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ nang stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni chang ma mchim
245a3('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang nang stong pa nyid kyi snong ngo // bcom ldan 'das phyi stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lha ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshang ma mchis
245a4('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang phyi stong pa nyid kyi snod ngo do// bcom ldan 'das phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ byi nang stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshang ma mchis//
245a5('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi snong ngo // bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon
245a6('bum): tan ni tshang ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi snong ngo // bcom ldan 'das chen po stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/
245a7('bum): chen po stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni chang ni ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang chen po stong pagi kyi sdong ngo // bcom ldan 'das don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lha 'i
245b1('bum): cig brjod par bgyi ste/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi snod do//
245b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag
245b3('bum): kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so//
245b4('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ mtha'
245b5('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi snod ngo // bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med
245b6('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang thog ma dang tha med pa
245b7('bum): stong pa nyid kyi snod ngo // bcom ldan 'das dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gsheg
246a1('bum): pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi sdong ngo // bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ rang /
246a2('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi snod ngo // bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad stong pa nyid
246a3('bum): kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi
246a4('bum): snod ngo // bcom ldan 'das rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
246a5('bum): sku gdung de dag kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lha ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi yon
246a6('bum): tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni lha ji snyed cig brjod
246a7('bum): par bgyi ste/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni chang ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das
246b1('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshang ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
246b2('bum): kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis//
246b3('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi snang ngo // bcom ldan 'das dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi'i yon tan lha ji snyed cig brjod par
246b4('bum): bgyi ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshang ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi snod ngo do// bcom ldan 'das yang
246b5('bum): dag par spong ba bzhi'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang
246b6('bum): dag par spong ba rnams kyi snod ngo // bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i yon tan lha ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi yon tan ni chang ma mchis/
246b7('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das dbang po lnga'i yon tan lha ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ dbang po na
247a1('bum): kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang dbang po rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das stobs lnga'i yon tan lta
247a2('bum): ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ stobs rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang stobs rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das
247a3('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi yon tan ni tshang ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de
247a4('bum): dag kyang byang chub kyi yon tan rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ 'phags pa'i
247a5('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i snang ngo // bcom ldan 'das
247a6('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi yon tan ni ched ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung
247a7('bum): de dag kyang 'bags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan bzhi'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ bsam gtan rnams kyi yon tan
247b1('bum): ni ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang bsam gtan rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das tshad med pa bzhi'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi
247b2('bum): ste tshad med pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang tshad med pa rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das gzugs med pi
247b3('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi yon tan tshing ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa
247b4('bum): sku gdung de dag kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi yon tan ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ rnam par
247b5('bum): thar pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang rnam par thar pa rnams kyi snod ngo // bcom ldan 'das mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms pa
247b6('bum): 'jug pa dgu'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshang ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag
247b7('bum): kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi snod ngo do// bcom ldan 'das rnam par mthar pa'i stong pa nyid dang nr-i myang ba dang smon pa med pa'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/
248a1('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams kyi yon tan ni tshang ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams kyi sdong ngo // bcom ldan 'das
248a2('bum): bangon par shes pa rnams kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang mngon par shes
248a3('bum): pa rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
248a4('bum): sku gdung de dag kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das gzungs kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so//
248a5('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i yon tan ni lha ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/
248a6('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi yon tan ni chad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan
248a7('bum): 'das mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ mi 'jigs rnams kyi yon tan ni tshang ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang mi 'jigs
248b1('bum): pa rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi yon tan ni ched ma mchis so//
248b2('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi snod ngo // bcom ldan 'das snying rje chen po'i yon tan ni lha ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ snying rje chen po
248b3('bum): yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang snying rje chen po'i snod ngo // bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi yon tan lta
248b4('bum): ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam/
248b5('bum): kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das thams cad shes pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ thams cad shes pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshang ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
248b6('bum): sku gdung de dag kyang thams cad shes pa nyid kyi snod ngo // bcom ldan 'das lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi yon
248b7('bum): tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi sdong ngo // bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod
249a1('bum): par bgyi ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sdod do//
249a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ de bzhin nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang de bzhin nyid kyi
249a3('bum): snong ngo // bcom ldan 'das ma nor pa de bzhin nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ zla nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ga
249a4('bum): de dag kyang ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi yon tan ni chad
249a5('bum): ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi snod ngo // bcom ldan 'das chos nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ chos
249a6('bum): nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang chos nyid kyi snod ngo // bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings kyi yon ta lha ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ chos
249a7('bum): kyi dbyings kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang chos kyi dbyings kyi snong ngo // bcom ldan 'das chos kyi gnas nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par
249b1('bum): bgyi ste/ chos kyi gnas nyid kyi yon tan ni chang ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang chos kyi gnas nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das chos mi 'gyur ba nyid kyi yon tan
249b2('bum): lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ chos mi 'gyur ba nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang chos mi 'gyur ba nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das
249b3('bum): yang dag pa'i mtha'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang yang dag pa'i mtha'i
249b4('bum): snod do// bcom ldan 'das bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi yon tan lnga ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin
249b5('bum): gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi snod // bcom ldan 'das bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spang ba'i yon tan lta
249b6('bum): ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang bag
249b7('bum): chags kyi mtshabs sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa'i snod do// bcom ldan 'das rtag tu gtang snyoms la gnas pa'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjed par bgyi ste/ rtag tu
249b8('bum): btang snyoms la gnas pa'i yon tan ni ched ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang rtag tu btang snyoms la gnas pa'i snod do// bcom ldan 'das mi mnyams
250a1('bum): bya bya/ pa'i chos nyid kyi yon tan ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ mi mnyam pa'i chos nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de
250a2('bum): dag kyang mi mnyam pa'i chos nyid kyi snod do// de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol
250a3('bum): tu phyin pa rin po che'i snod do// de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung dag ni mchod pa mnga'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa kun
250a4('bum): nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i snod do// de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshes
250a5('bum): pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa mi skye mi 'gag pa'i snod de/ de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i
250a6('bum): sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa blang ba ma mchis pa dang / dor ba ma mchis pa'i snod de/ de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga'o// bcom ldan 'das
250a7('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa dbri ba dang / bsnan pa ma mchis pa'i snod de/ de bas ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga'o// bcom
250b1('bum): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa 'ong ba dang 'gro ba dang // gnas pa ma mchis pa'i snod de/ de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod
250b2('bum): ba mnga'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyi snod de de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid
250b3('bum): kyis yongs su bsgom pa'o// de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga'o// gzhan yang stong gsum gyi stong
250b4('bum): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis byur bur yongs su ltam pa lta zhog gi/ bcom ldan 'das gal te phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi
250b5('bum): klung gi bye ma snyed cig de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis byur bur bltam pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris pa zhig stsal na/ bcom ldan 'das rnam pa de gnyis
250b6('bum): ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid len to// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di las byung ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
250b7('bum): kyi sku gdung rnams kyi mchod pa mnga'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su sgoms pas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag mchod pa mnga' ste/ bcom
251a1('bum): ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams la rim 'gror bgyid pa dang / phu dung du bgyid pa dang / mchod par bgyid dang /
251a2('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i mtha' mi dmigs shing / rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba 'am/ bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba 'am/ khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba 'am/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris
251a3('bum): kyi lham/ sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha 'am/ mche ma'i lha 'am/ dga' ldan gyi lha 'am/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i nang du mi dang lha'i phun sum tshogs pa dang / bde ba myong ba
251a4('bum): dge' ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis sdug sngal gyi mthar 'byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung mchod pa'i 'bras bu ni de tsam du bas kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung zhing
251a5('bum): bcangs pa dang / klag shing kun chub par bgyis pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyis na/ ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus kyi pha
251a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// bzod pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// sbyin
251a7('bum): ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// phyi nang stong pa nyid yos
251b1('bum): rdzogs par 'gyur ro// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par
251b2('bum): 'gyur ro// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs
251b3('bum): par 'gyur ro// thog ma dang tha med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa
251b4('bum): 'gyur ro// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su
251b5('bum): rdzogs par 'gyur ro// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
251b6('bum): nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// yang dag par spong ba bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gyi
251b7('bum): rkang pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// dbang po lnga yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// stobs lnga yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yongs su
252a1('bum): rdzogs par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par
252a2('bum): 'gyur ro// bsam gtan bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// tshad med pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su
252a3('bum): rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyems par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rnam par mthar
252a4('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa yongs su rdzog par 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su
252a5('bum): rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// mi 'jigs
252a6('bum): pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// so so yang dag par rigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi
252a7('bum): chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de ched du bsams te lus yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro// lus de dag gis sems can yongs su smin par bgying par
252b1('bum): 'gyur ro// 'khor los sgyur ba'i lus sam/ rgyal rigs mche zhing mtho ba 'am/ bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba 'am/ khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho bar skyed pa'i lus ma
252b2('bum): brgya byin gyi gzugs sam/ tshangs pa'i gzugs sam/ ngal bso po'i gzugs kyang rung ste/ lus de dag gis sems can yongs su smin par bgyid par 'gyur ro// nyan thos
252b3('bum): kyis dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das te// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon meng bar zhugs nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i
252b4('bum): mngon par shes pa thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa thob nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mchi bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de bas
252b5('bum): na bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung la rim 'gro ma mchis pa yang ma lags/ glo ba ma ches pa'ang ma lags/ mchod par mi 'chal pa 'ang ma lags/ gzung ba
252b6('bum): mi 'chal ba'ang ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyis rim 'gro dang / bkur sti dang / pu dung dang /
252b7('bum): mchod par bgyis na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi rgyun shin tu bsags pa lags/ phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyang yongs su zin par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshes
253a1('bum): bya/ pa'i sku gdung rnams la yang rim 'gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod par bgyis par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang phyogs
253a2('bum): bcu'i 'jigs rten gyi khams tshad dang grang ma mchis pa dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho
253a3('bum): skyeng ba dang / chos ston pa de dag chos kyi sku dang gzugs kyi sku dang / ye shes kyi skur mthong bar 'tshal zhing / mchod par 'chal bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid
253a4('bum): bzung bar bgyi/ bcang bar bgyi/ klag par bgyi/ kun chub par bgyi/ mchod par bgyi/ gzhan la rgya cher yang dag par snyan par bgyi/ tshul bzhin du'ang yid la bgyi
253a5('bum): ste/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des ni phyogs bcu'i 'jigs rten gyi khams grangs dang tshad ma mchis pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog
253a6('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod ba des/ chos nyid du sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa
253a7('bum): bsgom par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag mthong ba
253b1('bum): 'tshal bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung bar bgyi/ bcang bar bgyi/ klag par bgyi/ kun chub par bgyi/ mchod par bgyi/ gzhan la brgya cher yang dag
253b2('bum): par bstan par bgyi/ chos nyid tshul bzhin du'ang yid la bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gnyis po 'di dag ni chos nyid do// gnyis gang zhe na/ 'dus byas kyi chos rnams
253b3('bum): kyi chos nyid dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid do// bcom ldan 'das de la 'dus byas kyi chos kyi chos nyid gang lags zhe na/ nang stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /
253b4('bum): phyi stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / chen po stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / don dam pa stong pa
253b5('bum): nyid kyi ye shes dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / thog
253b6('bum): ma dang mtha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ye
253b7('bum): shes dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa
254a1('bum): nyid kyi ye shes dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi'i
254a2('bum): ye shes dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / dbang po lnga'i ye shes dang / stobs lnga'i ye shes dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi ye shes dang / 'phags pa'i
254a3('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ye shes dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / bsam gtan bzhi'i ye shes dang / tshad med pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / gzugs med
254a4('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi ye shes dang / mthar gyi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i ye shes dang / rnam par thar pa'i
254a5('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'i ye shes dang / mngon par shes pa lnga'i ye shes dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi ye shes dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams
254a6('bum): cad kyi ye shes dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i ye shes dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / snying rje
254a7('bum): chen po'i ye shes dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi ye shes dang / dge ba'i chos rnams kyi ye shes dang / mi dge ba'i chos rnams kyi ye shes dang / zag
254b1('bum): pa med pa'i chos rnams kyi ye shes dang / 'jig rten gyi rnams kyi ye shes dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams kyi ye shes gang lags pa de ni 'dus byas kyi chos rnam
254b2('bum): kyi chos nyid ces bgyi'o// de la 'dus byas kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang lags zhe na/ de ni gang la skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / gnas pa ma mchis
254b3('bum): pa dang / gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba ma mchis pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa dang / 'phel ba ma mchis pa dang /
254b4('bum): 'grib pa ma mchis pa ste/ de ni chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid do// chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid gang lags zhe na/ chos thams cad kyi dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo tshad de na
254b5('bum): 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid ces bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ 'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin
254b6('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig byung ba de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rten te/ bla na med pa yang dag par
254b7('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji
255a1('bum): snyed cig 'byung ba de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid rten cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du mngon
255a2('bum): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// da ltar byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
255a3('bum): rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang chos ston pa de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la rten te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du mngon
255a4('bum): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// 'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos gang ji snyed cig
255a5('bum): byung ba dang / ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos gang dzin cig 'byung ba dang / da ltar byung ba
255a6('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag gis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid
255a7('bum): la rten te/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob po 'thob po thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob po 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'gra
255b1('bum): bu thob/ 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob po// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// 'das pa'i dus kyi rang sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig byung ba dang /
255b2('bum): ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi rang sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig byung ba dang / da ltar byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag na/ rang sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig 'khod
255b3('bum): cing mtsho skyong ba de dag gis kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la rten te/ rang byang chub thob po// 'thob po thob par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shes
255b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las theg pa gsum po thams cad rgya cher bstar te/ de dag kyang mtshan ma med pa'i tshul dang / dmigs pa'i tshul dang / skye ba med pa'i tshul
255b5('bum): dang / 'gag pa med pa'i tshul dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i tshul dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i tshul dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i tshul dang / len pa
255b6('bum): med pa'i tshul dang / 'der ba med pa'i tshul dang / dbri ba med pa'i tshul dang / bstan pa med pa'i tshul dang / blang ba med pa'i tshul dang / spang ba med pa'i tshul gyis
255b7('bum): bstan te/ don dam par ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ring du song ba ma yin/ pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol
255b8('bum): de yang 'jig rten gyi skad kyi rgyas kyi bstan gyi/
256a1('bum): tu phyin pa ni tshu rol ma yin/ pha rol ma yin/ thang du 'dug pa ma yin/ gshong du 'dug pa ma yin/ mnyam pa ma yin/ mi mnyam pa ma yin/
256a2('bum): mtshan ma yin/ mtshan ma med pa ma yin/ 'jig rten pa ma yin/ 'jig rten las 'das pa ma yin/ 'dus byas ma yin/ 'dus ma byas ma yin/ dge ba ma yin//
256a3('bum): mi dge ba ma yin/ 'das pa ma yin/ ma 'ong ba ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yin/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin//
256a4('bum): ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni lan cig byin 'ong ba'i chos rnams
256a5('bum): nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams nye bar sgrub ma yin/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dgra bcom pa'i
256a6('bum): chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams 'dor ba ma mi no//
256a7('bum): / bam po bcu zhi pa// // brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa chen po
256b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa rnams ni sems cad thams cad kyi sems dang / spyod pa 'ang 'tshal te/
256b2('bum): sems can du dmigs pa ma mchis so// sems can gdags par dmigs pa ma mchis so// bdag tu dmigs pa ma mchis so// sems can du dmigs pa mchis so// srog
256b3('bum): du dmigs pa ma mchis so// 'gro bar dmigs pa ma mchis so// gso bar dmigs pa ma mchis so// skyes bur dmigs pa ma mchis so// gang zag du dmigs pa ma
256b4('bum): mchis so// sheng can du dmigs pa ma mchis so// shed bdag tu dmigs pa ma mchis so// byed pa por dmigs pa ma mchis so// tshor ba por dmigs pa ma mchis so//
256b5('bum): shes pa por dmigs pa ma mchis so// mthong ba por dmigs pa ma mchis so// gzugs su dmigs pa ma mchis so// tshor bar dmigs pa ma mchis so// 'du shes su dpas
256b6('bum): ba ma mchis so// 'du byed du dmigs pa ma mchis so// rnam par shes par dmigs pa ma mchis so// mig du dmigs pa ma mchis so// rna bar dmigs pa ma mchis so// /
256b7('bum): sder dmigs pa ma mchis so// lcer dmigs pa ma mchis so// lus su dmig pa ma mchis so// yid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// gzugs su dmigs pa ma mchi so//
257a1('bum): / sgrar dmigs pa ma mchis so// drir dmigs pa ma mchis so// ror dmigs pa ma mchis so// reg du dmigs pa ma mchis so// chos su dmig
257a2('bum): pa ma mchis so// mig gi rnam par shes par dmigs pa ma mchis so// rna ba'i rnam par shes par dmigs pa ma mchis so// sna'i rnam par shes par dmigs pa ma mchis so// /
257a3('bum): lce'i rnam par shes par dmigs pa ma mchis so// lus kyi rnam par shes pa dmigs pa ma mchis so// yid kyi rnam par shes par dmigs pa ma mchis so// mig gi 'dus
257a4('bum): te reg par dmigs pa ma mchis so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg par dmigs pa ma mchis so// sna'i 'dus te reg par dmigs pa ma mchis so// lce'i 'dus te reg par
257a5('bum): dmigs pa ma mchis so// lus kyi 'dus te reg par dmigs pa ma mchis so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dmigs pa ma mchis so// mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung
257a6('bum): ba'i tshor bar dmigs pa ma mchis so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar dmigs pa mchis so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar dmigs pa
257a7('bum): ma mchis so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar dmigs pa ma mchis so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar dmigs pa ma mchis so//
257b1('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar dmigs pa ma mchis so// sa'i khams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// chu'i khams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// me'i
257b2('bum): khams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// rlung gi khams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// na mkha'i khams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// rnam par shes pa'i khams su dmigs
257b3('bum): pa ma mchis so// ma rig par dmigs pa ma mchis so// 'du byed du dmigs pa ma mchis po// rnam par shes par dmigs pa ma mchis so// ming dang gzugasu dmigs
257b4('bum): pa ma mchis so// skye mched drug du dmigs pa ma mchis so// reg par dmigs pa ma mchis so// tshor bar dmigs pa ma mchis so// sred par dmigs pa ma mchis
257b5('bum): so/ len par dmigs pa ma mchis so// sred par dmigs pa ma mchis so// skye bar dmigs pa ma mchis so// rga shir dmigs pa ma mchis so// sbyin pa'i
257b6('bum): pha rol tu phyin par dmigs pa ma mchis so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin par dmigs pa ma mchis so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par dmigs pa ma mchis so// brtson 'grus kyi pha
257b7('bum): rol tu phyin par dmigs pa ma mchis so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin par dmigs pa ma mchis so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par dmigs pa ma mchis so// nang stong pa nyid du
258a1('bum): / dmigs pa ma mchis so// phyi stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// phyi nang stong pa nyid du dmigs par ma mchis so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du dmigs
258a2('bum): pa ma mchis so// chen po stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// don pa stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// 'dus ma bas
258a3('bum): stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// dor ba med pa stong
258a4('bum): pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid du mamigs pa ma mchis so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// rang gi man+da nying du dmigs pa ma mchis
258a5('bum): so// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// dngos po med pa'i
258a6('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du dmigs pas mchis so// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// yang dag par spong ba rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// rdzu 'phrul gyi
258a7('bum): rkang pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// dbang po rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// stobs rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams su dmigs pa
258b1('bum): ma mchis so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par dmigs pa ma mchis so// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// bsam gtan rnams su dmigs
258b2('bum): pa ma mchis so// tshang med pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// rnam par thar pa brgyad du
258b3('bum): dmigs ma mchis so// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgur dmigs pa ma mchis so// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med par
258b4('bum): dmigs pa ma mchis so// mngon par shes pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// ting nge 'dzin rnam su dmigs pa ma mchis so// gzungs kyi sgo rnams su ma migs pa ma mchis
258b5('bum): so// te de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// mi 'jigs pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchim/
258b6('bum): snying rje chen por dmigs pa ma mchis so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bur dmigs pa ma mchis so// lan cig
258b7('bum): phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bur dmigs pa ma mchis so// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bur dmigs pa ma mchis so// dgra bcom pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// rang byang chub
259a1('bum): tu dmigs pa ma mchis so// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// byang chub tu dmigs pa ma mchis so// sangs rgyas su
259a2('bum): dmigs pa ma mchis so// sangs rgyas kyi chos su dmigs pa ma mchis ste// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dmigs pa'i tshul du nye bar gnas pa ma yin no// de ci'i slad du
259a3('bum): zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gyis dmigs par bgyi ba dang / gang la dmigs par bgyi ba dang / gang du dmigs par bgyi ba de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid de la ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das
259a4('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nges/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
259a5('bum): pa la yun ring por spyad pas/ des byang chub kyang mi dmigs na sangs rgyas lta ci smos/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
259a6('bum): rjen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyi/ des lags pa'i pha rol tu phyid pa gzhan la me sbyong sa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shika byang chub
259a7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug kun la'ang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis spong de/ des sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang mi dmigs gtong ba 'ang
259b1('bum): mi dmigs/ len pa'ang mi dmigs so// tshul khrims kyang mi dmigs tshul khrims dang ldan pa'ang mi dmigs/ tshul khrims ngan pa'ang mi dmigs so//
259b2('bum): bzod pa'ang mi dmigs/ bzod pa dang ldan pa'ang mi dmigs/ gnod sems kyang mi dmigs so// brtson 'grus kyang mi dmigs/ brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'ang mi
259b3('bum): dmigs/ le lo yang mi dmigs so// bsam gtan yang mi dmigs/ bsam gtan dang ldan pa yang mi dmigs/ 'khrug pa yang mi dmigs so// shes rab mi dmig
259b4('bum): shes rab dang ldan pa yang mi dmigs/ shes rab 'chal pa yang mi dmigs so// ke'u shi ka 'on kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gzugs mi dmigs pa'i tshul
259b5('bum): dang / tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'du shes mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'du byed mi dmigs pa'i tshul/ rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mig mi dmigs
259b6('bum): pa'i tshul dang / rna ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sna mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lce mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lus mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / yid mi dmigs pa'i
259b7('bum): tshul dang / gzugs mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sgra mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dri mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / ro mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / reg mi dmigs pa'i rgya
260a1('bum): chos mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mig gi dam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
260a2('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / yid kyi rnam par shes
260a3('bum): pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul
260a4('bum): dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mig gi
260a5('bum): 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rna 'a'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul
260a6('bum): dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las
260a7('bum): byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sa'i kham mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / chu'i khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / me'i kham mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rlung gi khams/
260b1('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / namakha'i khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / ma rig pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'du byed mi
260b2('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / ming dang gzugs mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / skye mched drug mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / reg pa me das
260b3('bum): pa'i tshul dang / tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sred pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / len pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / srid pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / skye ba mi dmigs
260b4('bum): pa'i tshul dang / rga shi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / bzod
260b5('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / shes
260b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / phyi stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i
260b7('bum): tshul dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / chen po stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'dus byas sto
260b8('bum): pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa
261a1('bum): nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / chos thams/
261a2('bum): cad stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dngos po med pa stong
261a3('bum): ba nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
261a4('bum): bzhi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dbang po lnga mi dmigs pa'i tshul
261a5('bum): dang / stobs lnga mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lags rgyad pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'phags
261a6('bum): pa'i bden pa bzhi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / bsam gtan bzhi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / tshad med pa bzhi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par yu
261a7('bum): pa bzhi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam par/
261b1('bum): thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mngon par shes pa lnga mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad mi dmigs
261b2('bum): pa'i tshul dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi mi dmigs pa'i tshul
261b3('bum): dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi mi dmigs tshul dang / snying rje chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
261b4('bum): rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang //
261b5('bum): dgra bcom pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rang byang chub mi dmigs pa'i tshu la dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i chu la dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
261b6('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa'i
261b7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
261b8('bum): phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa yongs su sgrub pa'i
262a1('bum): @bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems/
262a2('bum): dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi brtsom pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ byang chub se
262a3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyir yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu
262a4('bum): phyin pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos la rnam par lta ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o// ke'u shi ka 'di lta
262a5('bum): ste dper na 'dzam bu gling gi shing rnams lo ma sna tshogs can/ me tog sna tshogs can/ 'bras bu sna tshogs can/ dbyibs sna tshogs can/ chu zhe nga sna tshogs can du 'khod
262a6('bum): kyang / de dag gi grib pa ma la khyad par ram bye brag mi dmigs te/ gzhan du na grib ma zhe bya ba'i grangs su 'gro bar zad do// ke'u shi ka de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga shes
262a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su zin pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su yongs su sngos pa rnams la yang khyad par dang bye brag mi dmigs so// brgya byin gyis gsol pa/
262b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa'i srang du yon tan chen po dang ldan pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi
262b2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa ni yon tan tshad ma mchis pa dang ldan pa'i slad du tshad ma mchis pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yon tan brjod du ma
262b3('bum): mchis pa dang ldan pa'i slad du yon tan kun tu mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
262b4('bum): bris shing grags bam du bgyis te bcang ba dang / me tog dang 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na baba' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang /
262b5('bum): sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim 'gror bgyis/ bkur stir bgyis/ pu dung du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis te/ de nas gong du ji snyed du bstan pa bzhin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
262b6('bum): phyin pa la tshul bzhin du yid la bgyis pa dang / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du bgyis te/ gzhan stsal na/ de gnyis
262b7('bum): las gang gyi bsod nams cher 'phel bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka bas na khyod nyid la dris/ khyod kyi ji ltar bzod pa de ltar lung ston cig/
263a1('bum): ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung mang po la me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos
263a2('bum): dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim 'gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ phu dud du byas/
263a3('bum): mchod par byas pa dang / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las de bzhin gshegs pa'i skra gdung yungs kar kyi 'bru tsam zhig gzhan la byin te/ bgo ba shar byas pa dang /
263a4('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bulnga las de bzhin gshegs pa yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam po de blangs te/ me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza
263a5('bum): dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim 'gror byas/ bkur bstir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mched par byas na de dag las gang
263a6('bum): gi bsod nams cher 'phel ba yin/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal te/ de la rigs kyi bu 'am/
263a7('bum): rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung mang po la/ me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / bye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang /
263b1('bum): rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim 'gror bgyis/ bkur stir bgyis/ phu dud du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis pa pas gang la las de bzhin gshegs
263b2('bum): pa'i sku gdung yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam zhig gzhan stsal na/ 'di ni de bas bsod nams cher 'phel lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa
263b3('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis kyang don de nyid gzigs te/ rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag nas/ rdo rje lta bu'i sku bshig/ te/ sems can gyi ris na de bzhi
263b4('bum): gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyis 'dul ba'i sems can ma mchis pa rnams kyi slad du thugs rje chen po sked de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung byin gyis brlabs so// bco
263b5('bum): ldan 'das gang la las chung du na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdang yungs kar kyi 'bru tsam la mchod pa sna tshogs kyis mchod par bgyis na/ de dag thams cad kyang dge
263b6('bum): ba'i rtsa ba de dag gi mthar ma thug par sdug bsngal mthar 'byin par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ke'u
263b7('bum): shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa// 'di glegs zam du byas te/ me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos pa dang / byug pa dang /
264a1('bum): bya bya/ phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim 'gror byas bkur stir byas/ bu dung du
264a2('bum): byas/ mchod par byas pa bas/ gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bris te/ chos kyi dga' bas gzhan byin na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams che
264a3('bum): 'phel bar 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ji skad du bstan pa bzhin du gzhan gyi drung du song ba ste/
264a4('bum): bshad cing bstan pa dang / bshad cing bkrol ba dang / rnam par phye ste gsal bar byas na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni rigs kyi bu mo snga ma dag pas bsod
264a5('bum): nams cher 'phel te/ de ni ston pa yin par bsam mo// bla ma'i gnas mkhas pa/ tshangs pa chungs par spod ba la la zhig yin par bsam so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi
264a6('bum): ka 'di la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston pa yin te/ ston pa ni gzhan/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gzhan zhes bya ba med kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
264a7('bum): nyid kyang ston pa/ ston pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs pas/ 'das pa dang ma byon pa
264b1('bum): dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
264b2('bum): par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa de dag kyang phyir mi ldog pa'i
264b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' rnams las gud na med de/ de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
264b4('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs shing nyan thos kyi theg
264b5('bum): 'ju mas pa'i bras dum ga/ ga/ ba gyul/ ma tha ga// kham par
264b6('bum): phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob po// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa
264b7('bum): rnams kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs shing / byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mdo
265a1('bum): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs
265a2('bum): shing byang chub sems dpa'i skyod med par zhugs so// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon
265a3('bum): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
265a4('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la me tog dang / 'breng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil
265a5('bum): snyan sna tshogs kyis mngon tu rim 'gror bya bar 'dod pa dang / bkur stir bya bar 'dod pa dang / phu dud du bya bar 'dod pa dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha
265a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di bris te/ me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan
265a7('bum): sna tshogs kyis rim 'gror bya'o// bkur stir bya'o// phu dud du bya'o// mchod par bya'o// ke'u shi ka ngas don de nyid kyi dbang yang dag par mthong ste/ bla na med pa yang dag
265b1('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 'di snyam ste/ gang zhig la gang gis rim 'gro dang / bkur sti dang / pu dud dang / mchod par byas te/ brten
265b2('bum): cing rnam par spyad par bya snyam na/ ke'u shi de la ngas 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/ bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram ze bcas pa'i skye dgu dang /
265b3('bum): mi dang lha dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i nang na nga dang 'dra ba 'am/ lhag pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong nas de la ngas 'di snyam du bsdams te/ de lta yin na bdag gis chos zhi ba
265b4('bum): bzang po gang dag nyid kyis mngon par sangs rgyas pa de nyid la rim 'gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dung dang / mchod pa byas te/ rten cing rnam par spang bar bya'o snyam du bsam so//
265b5('bum): ke'u shi ka chos de'ang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yin te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar nga nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la rim 'gror byed/
265b6('bum): bkur stir byed/ bu dud du byed/ mchod par byed/ de ltar rim 'gro dang / bkur sti dang / pu dud dang / mchod par byas shing rnam par spyad na/ ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu
265b7('bum): 'am rigs kyi bu mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang /
266a1('bum): spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim 'gror bya
266a2('bum): ba dang / bkur sIr bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba lta ci smos/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi
266a3('bum): theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza'
266a4('bum): dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim 'gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dung du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba lta ci smos/
266a5('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams so// byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni/ de bzhin
266a6('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas las byung ba ni/
266a7('bum): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams so// ke'u shi ka de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/
266b1('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang /
266b2('bum): na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim 'gror bya'o// bkur sti bya'o// bu dud du bya'o// mchod par bya'o// de ltar
266b3('bum): de la slobs pa'i rigs kyi bu ma rigs kyi bu mo dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'chang
266b4('bum): rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang dgra bcom pa nyid thob bo// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs
266b5('bum): rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang / rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob bo// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang / rang sa
266b6('bum): rgyas kyi byang chub thob po// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las// / le'u nyi shu gsum pa'o//
266b7('bum): / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po rgya byin la bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bum+ba rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis gal te dzam bu gling gi sems can de dag
267a1('bum): / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod par gyur na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi me de'i rgyus bsod nams mang du 'phel
267a2('bum): bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas kyang la la zhig gis shes rab
267a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du klag pa 'am/ bri ba 'am kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
267a4('bum): pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos gang la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu po slob cing yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par 'gyur ba dang / 'jug pa dang / 'jug par 'gyur ba dang /
267a5('bum): rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur pa dang / 'thob pa dang / thob par 'gyur ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur pa dang / 'thob pa dang / thob par
267a6('bum): 'gyur ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur pa dang / 'thob pa dang / thob par gyur pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur pa dang / 'thob pa dang / thob par 'gyur
267a7('bum): ba dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob par gyur pa/ 'thob nga// thob par 'gyur ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
267b1('bum): chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur pa dang / 'jug pa dang / 'jug par gyur pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
267b2('bum): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos mang po rgya cher bstan to// ke'u
267b3('bum): shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos rgya cher bstan pa de dag gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /
267b4('bum): dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong
267b5('bum): pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong
267b6('bum): pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog pa dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams
267b7('bum): cad stong pa nyi dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i
268a1('bum): / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
268a2('bum): dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / 'di dag ni zag pa med pa'i chos rnams te/ de dag ni shes
268a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las rgya cher bstan to// de dag la bslabs shing / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
268a4('bum): rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka sems can gcig cig rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras
268a5('bum): bu la bzhag na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel gyi/ 'dzam bu gling gi sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pas ri ma yin no//
268a6('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa'i sems can rnams ni/ sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten
268a7('bum): nas yongs su grol ba ma yin no// ke'u shi ka rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod pa'i sems can ni/ sems can dmyal ba dang // byol gi skye gnas dang / ga
268b1('bum): rje'i 'jig rten nas yongs su grol ba'i phyir te/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod pa lta ci mas/ ke'u
268b2('bum): shi ka gang la las 'jam bu gling gi sems can rnams rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i
268b3('bum): 'bras bu la bkod pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod pas la la zhig gis/ sems can gcig cig rang byang chub la gzhag na/ 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phe'o//
268b4('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis 'dzam bu gling gi sems can thams cad rang byang chub la bkod pa bas/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis sems
268b5('bum): can gcig cig/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bzhag na/ 'di bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can gcig po// bla na
268b6('bum): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu gzhog pa de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun mi 'chad pa'i don du zhugs pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'i shi ka byang chub sems
268b7('bum): dpa' las byung ba ni/ rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir blo dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams so// ke'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa'
269a1('bum): las byung ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so// ke'u shi ka rnams grangs des na/ 'di ltar
269a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' rnams mchod cing rim 'gror bya ba yin te/ 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas dang / dge sbyong dang bram
269a3('bum): zer bcas pa'i skye dgus me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / brgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna chog
269a4('bum): kyis rim 'gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / pu dud du bya ba yin par shes par bya'o// ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ 'dzam bu'i
269a5('bum): gling gi sems can thams cad dge bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod par gyur na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de ni rgyus snga
269a6('bum): du 'phel lam/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bco ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas rigs
269a7('bum): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs bam bris pa 'am/ klag pa 'am/ kha don du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ bsod nams ches mang
269b1('bum): du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan to// de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu
269b2('bum): mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go/ 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par
269b3('bum): 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob pa
269b4('bum): 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob po// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub par gyur to// 'thob po// thob
269b5('bum): par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa
269b6('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ke'u shi
269b7('bum): ka zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na 'di lta ste sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus
270a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyis pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi
270a2('bum): nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha'
270a3('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
270a4('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran
270a5('bum): pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phag
270a6('bum): pa'i las yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtad bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam
270a7('bum): par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang mngon par shes pa drug
270b1('bum): dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jig pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
270b2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / tang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med
270b3('bum): pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher stan to// ke'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi du l+ya las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du byas te klag pa dang / brib
270b4('bum): dang kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las rgya cher bstan
270b5('bum): te// de dag yod pas/ rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal
270b6('bum): chen bzhi'i ris kyi rnams yod do// suM bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe mi'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams
270b7('bum): yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do//
271a1('bum): tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i
271a2('bum): lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// char med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams
271a3('bum): yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshang med che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do//
271a4('bum): shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do// na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched gyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas
271a5('bum): skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod ngo // 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang//
271a6('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod// brtson 'gru pha rol tu phyin pa long ngo // bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod ngo do// shes rab kyi pha rol
271a7('bum): tu phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do//
271b1('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid med do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha/
271b2('bum): ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong
271b3('bum): pa nyid yod do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran
271b4('bum): pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub
271b5('bum): kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad med pa rnams yod do//
271b6('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar gyi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa/
271b7('bum): nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
272a1('bum): stobs rnams yod do// mi 'jig pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
272a2('bum): 'dres pa rnams yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod
272a3('bum): do/ rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams
272a4('bum): yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs
272a5('bum): ba dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// ke'u shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams lta shog gi/ ke'u shi ka gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams
272a6('bum): kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs
272a7('bum): kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u
272b1('bum): shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton bya bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin nas bsod nam
272b2('bum): ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs
272b3('bum): shing / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par
272b4('bum): gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur
272b5('bum): to'athob bo// thob par gyur to// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi rang byang chub thob par
272b6('bum): gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug//
272b7('bum): 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzog
273a1('bum): par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims
273a2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
