305a1('bum): @kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i
305a2('bum): skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go/ 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir
305a3('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom
305a4('bum): pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// byang
305a5('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'dug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
305a6('bum): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka zag pa med pa'i
305a7('bum): chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
305b1('bum): tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid
305b2('bum): stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang // 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
305b3('bum): dang thog ma dang tha med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /
305b4('bum): mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gnag pa bzhi dang /
305b5('bum): yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'bags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
305b6('bum): pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dag/
305b7('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
306a1('bum): bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen
306a2('bum): po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// ke'u shi ka
306a3('bum): rnams grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton tu bya ba'i
306a4('bum): phyir gzhan byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
306a5('bum): las zag pa med pa'i chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// /
306a6('bum): khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mche mi'i lha rnams
306a7('bum): yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// /
306b1('bum): tshangs lnga nye pan gyis lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi wa
306b2('bum): rnams yod do// tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// rlung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tsa
306b3('bum): med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod de// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// chad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu rtse
306b4('bum): ba'i lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og
306b5('bum): min gyi lha rnams yod do// na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi
306b6('bum): lha rnams yod do// 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//
306b7('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//
307a1('bum): nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid
307a2('bum): yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus pas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' yas 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma
307a3('bum): dang ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do// der ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan
307a4('bum): nyid stong pa nyid yod do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
307a5('bum): stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do//
307a6('bum): stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyud pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam/
307a7('bum): gtan rnams yod do// tshad med pa rnams yod do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i
307b1('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin
307b2('bum): rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rigs pa rnams
307b3('bum): yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// /
307b4('bum): phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
307b5('bum): yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas
307b6('bum): rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod//
307b7('bum): ke'u shi ka nub phyogs kyi 'jigs rten gyi khams gang gib klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan
308a1('bum): bzhi la bkod de/ tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/
308a2('bum): ke'u shi ka de ji snyams du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gsheg
308a3('bum): pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam
308a4('bum): klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton tu bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi
308a5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te// de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med
308a6('bum): par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go/ 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// lan ci
308a7('bum): phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro//
308b1('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thab bo//
308b2('bum): thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug pa
308b3('bum): 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs
308b4('bum): par 'chang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang she na 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
308b5('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang /
308b6('bum): phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
308b7('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang
309a1('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong
309a2('bum): pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
309a3('bum): bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par
309a4('bum): thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa
309a5('bum): drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa
309a6('bum): bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dang / byams pa chen po// snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
309a7('bum): tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// ke'u shi ka rnams grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris
309b1('bum): shing klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton tu bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ de bas 'di'i bson nams mang du 'phel bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar
309b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams
309b3('bum): yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i
309b4('bum): lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yi do// /
309b5('bum): tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams
309b6('bum): yod do// tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med dge ba'i
309b7('bum): lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yong ngo // chang med che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che da'i
310a1('bum): lha rnams yod do// mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams med do// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang
310a2('bum): ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// cung
310a3('bum): zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
310a4('bum): pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//
310a5('bum): na stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do//
310a6('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba med pa stong
310a7('bum): pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos
310b1('bum): po med pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba
310b2('bum): rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan
310b3('bum): lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad med pa rnams yod do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
310b4('bum): yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgra stong pa nyid dang mtshan mi med dang smon pa med pa
310b5('bum): yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// mi 'jigs
310b6('bum): ba rnams yod // soso yang dag par rig/ pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po rnams yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yo dang // rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras
310b7('bum): bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa
311a1('bum): nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir mi 'ong
311a2('bum): ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
311a3('bum): ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// ke'u shi ka byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am
311a4('bum): rigs kyi mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/
311a5('bum): ke'u shi ka de ji snyams du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol ba bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs
311a6('bum): pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs pam klag pa dang / dri
311a7('bum): ba dang / kha ton bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las
311b1('bum): mag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug
311b2('bum): par 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par
311b3('bum): 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs
311b4('bum): rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i
311b5('bum): skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go/ 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
311b6('bum): rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha/
311b7('bum): rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
312a1('bum): nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /
312a2('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /
312a3('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang // dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid
312a4('bum): stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po
312a5('bum): lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /
312a6('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge
312a7('bum): 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / se so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sang/
312b1('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan
312b2('bum): ngag kyang rgya cher bstan te/ ke'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing klag pa dang /
312b3('bum): bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka di ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi
312b4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing ma'o ba rnams yod do//
312b5('bum): khyims bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi rigs lha rnams yod do// sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams ya
312b6('bum): do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams bod do// 'phrul dga' lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yong ngo // tshangs su
312b7('bum): ban gyi lha rnams long po/ yangs bkun 'khar gyi lha rnams med // tshangs chen gyi lha rnams mdzod// snang ba'i lha rnams yong ngo // chung snang gi lha rnams me dang /
313a1('bum): tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// rlung dge'i lha rnams yod do// chang
313a2('bum): ming snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu
313a3('bum): che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og
313a4('bum): min gyi lha rnams yod do// namakha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi
313a5('bum): lha rnams yod do// 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// / bam po btso bkun pa// / sbyin pa'i
313a6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bsam ga/
313a7('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod de// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyinang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa
313a8('bum): nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus pas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong
313b1('bum): kha nyid yod de// thog ma dang rdzas med pa stong pa nyid yod de// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod// rang gi
313b2('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// mi dmigs stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
313b3('bum): yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yod do// yang dag par spong ba bzhi yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yod do// dbang po lnga yod do// stobs lnga rnams yod do//
313b4('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad
313b5('bum): med pa rnams yod do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu
313b6('bum): yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs
313b7('bum): kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rigs pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen
314a1('bum): po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do//
314a2('bum): phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// /
314a3('bum): rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do//
314a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// ke'u shi ka
314a5('bum): byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan
314a6('bum): bzhi la bkod de/ tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la ba tu bkod na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyams
314a7('bum): du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //
314b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bas klag pa dang / bri ba
314b2('bum): dang / kha ton bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las
314b3('bum): zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug
314b4('bum): go/ 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to//
314b5('bum): 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob bo//
314b6('bum): thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnam kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
314b7('bum): chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
315a1('bum): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka zag pa
315a2('bum): med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
315a3('bum): byin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / byi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /
315a4('bum): chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa
315a5('bum): stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /
315a6('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po meng pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bani dang /
315a7('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa ba'i dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /
315b1('bum): rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang / mngon par
315b2('bum): shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag
315b3('bum): par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag
315b4('bum): ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// ke'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
315b5('bum): ba glegs bam du bris shing klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i
315b6('bum): phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams can rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// /
315b7('bum): bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum bcu rtsa gsum
316a1('bum): gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang
316a2('bum): byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams
316a3('bum): yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams
316a4('bum): yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do//
316a5('bum): tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i lha
316a6('bum): rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do// na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha'
316a7('bum): las skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha
316b1('bum): rol tu phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// gtan gyi pha rol tu
316b2('bum): phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// /
316b3('bum): chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' yas 'das pa stong pa nyid yod de/
316b4('bum): 'og ma dang ba ma med pa stong pa nyid yod// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid sto
316b5('bum): ba nyid yod do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod de// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do//
316b6('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod de
316b7('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do//
317a1('bum): sa pa // bajun la pa ga 'arnams pa // smra phyu ba dang /
317a2('bum): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams
317a3('bum): yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// mi 'jigs pa rnams yo // sa
317a4('bum): yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod ngo do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig
317a5('bum): phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang bying chu'i yod do// las kyi rnam pa shes pa nyid sa
317a6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yongang // lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa
317a7('bum): rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa ya dag par rdzog
317b1('bum): ba'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// ke'u shi ka shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs
317b2('bum): kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/
317b3('bum): ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar
317b4('bum): gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin bya glegs
317b5('bum): bam klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab
317b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya tshor bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par
317b7('bum): zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go/ 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir
318a1('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob
318a2('bum): par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob
318a3('bum): po/ thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par
318a4('bum): 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
318a5('bum): bar 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i
318a6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong
318a7('bum): pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong
318b1('bum): pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams
318b2('bum): cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med
318b3('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par slob bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga
318b4('bum): dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar
318b5('bum): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang /
318b6('bum): ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi
318b7('bum): dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas
319a1('bum): kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// ke'u shi ka nam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes
319a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing / klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton tu bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel
319a3('bum): bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te// de dag yod pas rgyal
319a4('bum): rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs tshe zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i
319a5('bum): ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum bcu cu gsum gyi lharnams yod do// mche ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams
319a6('bum): yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnam
319a7('bum): yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod de// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lnga rnams yod de// tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba rje
319b1('bum): lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha
319b2('bum): rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi gdung ba'i
319b3('bum): lha rnams yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do// nams kha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi
319b4('bum): lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched
319b5('bum): kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi
319b6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do//
319b7('bum): byi nang stong pa nyid yod// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen pa stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod de// 'dus byas stong po nyid yod do// 'dus
320a1('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do// /
320a2('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid
320a3('bum): yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do//
320a4('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod/
320a5('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad med pa rnams yod do// gzugs mem pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par
320a6('bum): thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa yod do// mngon
320a7('bum): par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do//
320b1('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir/
320b2('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad
320b3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas
320b4('bum): rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do//
320b5('bum): ke'u shi ka lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan
320b6('bum): bzhi la bkod de/ tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyams du sems/
320b7('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das
321a1('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam klag pa
321a2('bum): dang / bri ba dang / kha ton tu bya ba'i phyir kun byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
321a3('bum): 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu ma dag yang dag pa'i sbyin par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug/
321a4('bum): 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i bzas bu thob par gyur to// 'thaza ba// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// bco
321a5('bum): po thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob pa
321a6('bum): 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyang rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
321a7('bum): rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
321b1('bum): rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang 'di lta ste/
321b2('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
321b3('bum): phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa ston
321b4('bum): pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid
321b5('bum): dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo
321b6('bum): nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po
321b7('bum): lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /
322a1('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon
322a2('bum): par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang
322a3('bum): dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag
322a4('bum): ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// ke'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu
322a5('bum): phan pa glegs bam du bris shing klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton tu bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o//
322a6('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan to// de dag yod pas rgyal rigs cha zhing mtho bo rnams
322a7('bum): yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum bcu
322b1('bum): cha gsum gyi lha rnams med do// mche ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod/
322b2('bum): tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod de// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do//
322b3('bum): chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun sdang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do//
322b4('bum): tshad mid dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// tshung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad ming che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras
322b5('bum): bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lnga rnams yod do//
322b6('bum): 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do// namakha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// cung zad med pa'i skye ma
322b7('bum): gyi lhan pas yod do// 'du shes med 'du shes med mon skye mched kyi lha rnams yod de// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod // tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//
323a1('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod de// shes rab kyi pha
323a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod de// byi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid med do//
323a3('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma med
323a4('bum): bstong pa nyid yod do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
323a5('bum): yod do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do//
323a6('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod de/
323a7('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yid do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do//
323b1('bum): tshad med pa rnams yod do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
323b2('bum): pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do//
323b3('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen
323b4('bum): po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir mi 'ong 'bras
323b5('bum): bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa
323b6('bum): rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems
323b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// ke'u shi ka nub bying gi phyogs
324a1('bum): mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las bas
324a2('bum): gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyems par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ ke'u shi ka de ji
324a3('bum): snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs
324a4('bum): pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs
324a5('bum): bam klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton tu bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes
324a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i
324a7('bum): skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro//
324b1('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong bla bras bu thob par 'gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro//
324b2('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid thob par 'gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyuraro//
324b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon blar zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par
324b4('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka zag pa med
324b5('bum): pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi
324b6('bum): rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong
324b7('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /
325a1('bum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang
325a2('bum): gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /
325a3('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /
325a4('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /
325a5('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /
325a6('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bani dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang / byams pa chen
325a7('bum): bo dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// ke'u shi ka rnam
325b1('bum): grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing / klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir
325b2('bum): gzhan byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos
325b3('bum): thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing
325b4('bum): mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do//
325b5('bum): 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs
325b6('bum): pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod
325b7('bum): do/ kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung gre'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod de// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod//
326a1('bum): che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi
326a2('bum): che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do//
326a3('bum): nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes
326a4('bum): med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
326a5('bum): yod do// brtson gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong
326a6('bum): pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// /
326a7('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod de// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin
326b1('bum): stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do//
326b2('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul
326b3('bum): gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad yod do//
326b4('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad med pa rnams yod de// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do//
326b5('bum): rnam par thar pa brgyad do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa yod do//
326b6('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// mi 'jigs
326b7('bum): pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu
327a1('bum): yod do// lan cig phyir 'od 'bras bu yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do//
327a2('bum): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba
327a3('bum): rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
327a4('bum): bcom yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// kye'u shi ka 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs
327a5('bum): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu
327a6('bum): bkod na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde ba
327a7('bum): gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs pam klag pa
327b1('bum): dang / bri ba dang / kha ton tu bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
327b2('bum): 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to//
327b3('bum): 'jug go/ 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par
327b4('bum): gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// /
327b5('bum): 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to// ba thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems
327b6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go/ 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag
327b7('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ke'u shi
328a1('bum): ka zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha
328a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang /
328a3('bum): phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang // 'dus ma
328a4('bum): byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang // dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang // rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang //
328a5('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med
328a6('bum): pa'i ngo ba nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang
328a7('bum): chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i
328b1('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnams par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams
328b2('bum): cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi
328b3('bum): chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan
328b4('bum): ngag kyang rgya cher bstan to// ke'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing klag pa dang /
328b5('bum): bri ba dang / kha ton tu bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar
328b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i
328b7('bum): rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim dag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod de// sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi
329a1('bum): lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul
329a2('bum): dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod de// tshangs chen
329a3('bum): gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod de// tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i
329a4('bum): rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod de/
329a5('bum): chad meng che ba'i lha rnams yo dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lharnams yod// mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi gdung ba'i lharnams yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod de/
329a6('bum): gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do// namakha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yodapa/
329a7('bum): cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha ro//
329b1('bum): tu phyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol
329b2('bum): tu phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong
329b3('bum): pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do//
329b4('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid
329b5('bum): yod do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod de// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do//
329b6('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do//
329b7('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod de// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad med pa rnams yod do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms
330a1('bum): par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar
330a2('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang // mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod//
330a3('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// mi 'jigs pa rnams yod de// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas
330a4('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod de// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcu
330a5('bum): pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan
330a6('bum): cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems
330a7('bum): dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// ke'u shi ka steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten
330b1('bum): gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad med pa bzhi dang /
330b2('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bum
330b3('bum): de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
330b4('bum): ke'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha thon tu bya ba'i phyir gzhan
330b5('bum): la byen na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams
330b6('bum): rgya tshor bstan te// de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu 'am kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro//
330b7('bum): rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par
331a1('bum): 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob bo//
331a2('bum): thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
331a3('bum): po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
331a4('bum): sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di
331a5('bum): ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi
331a6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa
331a7('bum): nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa
331b1('bum): stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid
331b2('bum): dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong
331b3('bum): ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /
331b4('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyems par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
331b5('bum): ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
331b6('bum): bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po/
331b7('bum): dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// ke'u shi ka rnam gras des kyang
332a1('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing / klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton tu bya ba'i/
332a2('bum): phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
332a3('bum): 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te// de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim
332a4('bum): bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do//
332a5('bum): dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs
332a6('bum): lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams
332a7('bum): yod do// tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod de// tshad med/
332b1('bum): dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'azas
332b2('bum): bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams
332b3('bum): yod do// 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do// namakha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// cung zad
332b4('bum): med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi
332b5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod de// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// shes
332b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid
332b7('bum): yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma
333a1('bum): dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong
333a2('bum): pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod de// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// rangs
333a3('bum): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod de// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do//
333a4('bum): dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden
333a5('bum): pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad med pa rnams yod do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod de// rnam par thar pa brgyad
333a6('bum): yod do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa yod do//
333a7('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod de// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// mi 'jigs
333b1('bum): pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras
333b2('bum): bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam
333b3('bum): bshes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba rnam
333b4('bum): yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
333b5('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// / bam po brgya 'phyang pa// / ke'u shi ka gzhan
333b6('bum): yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul
333b7('bum): bzhin du yid la byed na/ de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel gyi/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa dang / bsam gtan
334a1('bum): bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod pas ni/
334a2('bum): ma yin no// gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa
334a3('bum): bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod pas ni ma yin// stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can
334a4('bum): thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon
334a5('bum): par shes pa lnga la bkod pas ni ma yin no// stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa dang /
334a6('bum): bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod pas ni ma yin no// stong gsu
334a7('bum): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang /
334b1('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod pas ni ma yin no// de la tshul bzhin yid la byed pa ni 'di yin te/ gnyis la spyod
334b2('bum): pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa dang / kun nub par byed pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / tshul
334b3('bum): bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa dang / kun chu
334b4('bum): par byed pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog po dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa 'ang ma yin pa'i blos
334b5('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa
334b6('bum): 'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa 'ang ma yin pa'i blos bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang /
334b7('bum): tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa 'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa dang /
335a1('bum): kun chub par byed pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa 'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la
335a2('bum): spyod pa 'ang ma yin pa'i blos sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / tshu la bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis
335a3('bum): l-i spyod pa 'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ba yin pa'i blos nang stong pa nyid 'dzin pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / tshul ba ni
335a4('bum): du yod la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa 'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ ba'i blos phyi stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa
335a5('bum): 'angs yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa 'ang ma yin pa'i blos phyi nang stong po nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ stong pa
335a6('bum): nyid stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ chen po stong pa nyid tshul bzhin
335a7('bum): du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa 'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ don dam pa stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis
335a8('bum): la spyod pa 'ang
335b1('bum): la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos// 'dus byas stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi
335b2('bum): gnyis pa la spyod pa 'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa nyid ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa
335b3('bum): 'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i
335b4('bum): blos/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa bang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa 'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ dor
335b5('bum): ba med pa stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa 'ang ma yin ma gnyis pa la spyod pa 'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid tshul bzhin
335b6('bum): du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o//
335b7('bum): gnyis la spyod pa 'ang ma yin mi gnyis pa la spyod pa ma yin pa'i blos/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa 'ang ma
336a1('bum): yin mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa
336a2('bum): 'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa 'ang ma yin po'i blos/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin mi gnyis
336a3('bum): pa la spyod pa 'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa 'ang ma yin mi gnyis pa la spyod pa 'ang ma yin pa'i
336a4('bum): blos/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ dran
336a5('bum): pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin ma gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ yang dag par spong ba rnams
336a6('bum): tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams tshul bzhin du yid la
336a7('bum): byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa 'ang ma yin mi gnyis pa la spyod pa 'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ dbang po rnams tshul bzhin du ying la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang
336b1('bum): ma yin mi gnyis pa la spyod pa 'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ stobs rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa 'ang ma yin mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma/
336b2('bum): yin pa'i blos/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa 'ang ma yin mi gnyis pa la spyod pa 'ang ma yin pa'i blos/
336b3('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa 'ang ma yin mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ 'phags
336b4('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin mo gnyis pa la spyod pa 'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ bsam gtan rnams tshul
336b5('bum): bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa 'ang ma yin mi gnyis pa blang ma yin pa'i blos/ tshad med pa rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis
336b6('bum): la spyod pa 'ang ma yin mi gnyis pa la spyod pa 'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis
336b7('bum): la spyod pa 'ang ma yin mi gnyis pa la spong ba 'ang ma yin pa'i thos/ rnam par thar pa brgyad tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin
